1a1('bum): (na) @#/ ! /sher phyin stong phrag brgya pa bzhugs so/ /
1a2('bum): (黃) 大般若經第十二部
1b1('bum): @##/ /shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po gcig pa/
1b2('bum): rab 'byord kyis gsold pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rold tu
1b3('bum): phyind pa ni zab bo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsald pa/ rab 'byord
1b4('bum): gzugs zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa zab bo/ /rab 'byord
1b5('bum): tshor ba zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa zab bo/ /rab 'byord
1b6('bum): 'du shes zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa zab bo/ /rab 'byord
1b7('bum): 'du byed zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa zab bo/ /rab 'byord
1b8('bum): rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa
2a1('bum): zab bo/ /rab 'byord myig zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa zab bo/ /rab 'byord rna ba zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /
2a2('bum): rab 'byor sna zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor lce zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor lus zab pa'i
2a3('bum): phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor yid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor gzugs zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab
2a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor sgra zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor dri zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /
2a5('bum): rab 'byor ro zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor reg zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor chos zab pa'i phyir/
2a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor myig gi rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor rna ba'i rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir/
2a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor sna'i rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor lce'i rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir/
2a8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor lus kyi rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor yid kyi rnam par shes pa zab
2b1('bum): pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor myig gi 'dus te reg pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor rna ba'i 'dus
2b2('bum): te reg pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor sna'i 'dus te reg pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor lce'i 'dus te
2b3('bum): reg pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor yid kyi 'dus te
2b4('bum): reg pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor
2b5('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol
2b6('bum): tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis
2b7('bum): tshor ba zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin zab bo/ /rab 'byor yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
2b8('bum): zab bo/ /rab 'byor sa'i khams zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor chu'i khams zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
3a1('bum): phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor mye'i khams zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor rlung gi khams zab pa'i phyir/ shes
3a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor nam mkha'i khams zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor rnam par shes pa'i khams zab
3a3('bum): pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor ma rig pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor 'du byed zab pa'i phyir/ shes
3a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor rnam par shes pa'i zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor mying dang gzugs zab pa'i phyir/ shes
3a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor skye mched drug zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor reg pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab
3a6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin zab bo/ /rab 'byor tshor ba zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor sred pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol
3a7('bum): tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor len pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor srid pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
3a8('bum): pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor skye ba zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor rga shi zab pa'i phyir/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor
3b1('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
3b2('bum): zab bo/ /rab 'byor bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes
3b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol
3b4('bum): tu phyin pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor phyi stong
3b5('bum): pa nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor phyi nang stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor stong pa nyid
3b6('bum): stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor chen po stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor don
3b7('bum): dam pa stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor 'dus byas stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab
3b8('bum): 'byor 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha
4a1('bum): rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor dor ba myed pa stong pa
4a2('bum): nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor rang bzhin stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor chos
4a3('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /
4a4('bum): rab 'byor myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
4a5('bum): phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir/
4a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin zab bo/ /rab 'byor dran pa nye bar gzhag pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor yang dag par spong ba zab pa'i
4a7('bum): phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor dbang po zab pa'i phyir/
4a8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor stobs zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor byang chub kyi yan lag zab pa'i phyir/ shes
4b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor 'phags pa'i bden pa zab pa'i
4b2('bum): phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor bsam gtan zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor tshad myed pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi
4b3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor rnam par thar pa brgyad zab pa'i
4b4('bum): phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor rnam
4b5('bum): par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor mngon par shes pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab
4b6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor gzungs kyi sgo zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
4b7('bum): pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor myi 'jigs pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi
4b8('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor so so yang dag par rig pa zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor snying rje chen po zab pa'i phyir/
5a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab
5a2('bum): 'byor thams cad shes pa nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /rab 'byor lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /
5a3('bum): rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rin po che'i
5a4('bum): phung po ste/ chos rin po che'i phung po rnams sgrub pa'o/ /'di lta ste/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam sgrub pa'o/ /bsam gtan bzhi sgrub pa'o/ /tshad myed pa bzhi sgrub pa'o/ /
5a5('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi sgrub pa'o/ /mngon par shes pa lnga sgrub pa'o/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi sgrub pa'o/ /yang dag par spong ba bzhi sgrub pa'o/ /
5a6('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi sgrub pa'o/ /dbang po lnga sgrub pa'o/ /stobs lnga sgrub pa'o/ /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun sgrub pa'o/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgrub
5a7('bum): pa'o/ /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi sgrub pa'o/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad sgrub pa'o/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu sgrub pa'o/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong
5a8('bum): pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa sgrub pa'o/ /mngon par shes pa rnams sgrub pa'o/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams sgrub pa'o/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams sgrub pa'o/ /
5b1('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu sgrub pa'o/ /myi 'jigs pa bzhi sgrub pa'o/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi sgrub pa'o/ /snying rje chen po sgrub pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos
5b2('bum): ma 'dres pa bco brgyad sgrub pa'o/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sgrub pa'o/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sgrub pa'o/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sgrub pa'o/ /
5b3('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid sgrub pa'o/ /rang byang chub sgrub pa'o/ /thams cad shes pa nyid sgrub pa'o/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid sgrub pa'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
5b4('bum): nyid sgrub pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das gzugs dag pa dang / tshor ba dag pa dang /
5b5('bum): 'du shes dag pa dang / 'du byed dag pa dang / rnam par shes pa dag pa dang / myig dag pa dang / rna ba dag pa dang / sna dag pa dang / lce dag pa dang / lus dag pa dang /
5b6('bum): yid dag pa dang / gzugs dag pa dang / sgra dag pa dang / dri dag pa dang / ro dag pa dang / chos dag pa dang / myig gi rnam par shes pa dag pa dang / rna ba'i
5b7('bum): rnam par shes dag pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dag pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dag pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dag pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dag pa
5b8('bum): dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa dag pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dag pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dag pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dag pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa
6a1('bum): dag pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dag pa dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dag pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dag pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i
6a2('bum): rkyen kyis tshor ba dag pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dag pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dag pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dag pa
6a3('bum): dang / sa'i khams dag pa dang / chu'i khams dag pa dang / mye'i khams dag pa dang / rlung gi khams dag pa dang / nam mkha'i khams dag pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams dag pa dang /
6a4('bum): ma rig pa dag pa dang / 'du byed dag pa dang / rnam par shes pa dag pa dang / mying dang gzugs dag pa dang / skye mched drug dag pa dang / reg pa dag pa dang / tshor ba dag pa dang / sred pa dag pa
6a5('bum): dang / len pa dag pa dang / srid pa dag pa dang / skye ba dag pa dang / rga shi dag pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dag pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dag pa dang / bzod
6a6('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dag pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dag pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dag pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dag pa dang / nang stong pa
6a7('bum): nyid dag pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid dag pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dag pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dag pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid dag pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dag pa dang / 'dus
6a8('bum): byas stong pa nyid dag pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dag pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dag pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dag pa dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa
6b1('bum): nyid dag pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dag pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dag pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dag pa dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dag pa dang / dngos po
6b2('bum): myed pa stong pa nyid dag pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dag pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dag pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dag pa dang /
6b3('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dag pa dang / dbang po dag pa dang / stobs dag pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dag pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dag pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden
6b4('bum): pa dag pa dang / bsam gtan dag pa dang / tshad myed pa dag pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag pa dang / rnam par thar pa dag pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i
6b5('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dag pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dag pa dang / mngon par shes pa dag pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dag
6b6('bum): pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo dag pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dag pa dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dag pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dag pa dang /
6b7('bum): snying rje chen po dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag pa dang / thams cad shes pa nyid dag pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dag pa dang / rnam pa
6b8('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dag pa'i phung po'o/ /bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo de lta bu bstan
7a1('bum): pa'i tshe/ bar chad mang du myi 'byung ba ni ngo mtshar che'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol
7a2('bum): tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la bar chad mang po 'byung ste/ de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bri ba dang / klag pa dang / bstan pa dang /
7a3('bum): tshul bzhin du yid la bya ba dang / bsgom par bya ba la bar chad du myi 'gyur bar bri na yang myur du bri bar bya'o/ /klag na yang myur du klag go/ /bstan na yang myur du bstan to/ /tshul bzhin
7a4('bum): du yid la bya na yang myur du tshul bzhin du yid bya'o/ /bsgom na yang myur du bsgom mo/ /rab 'byor de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
7a5('bum): zab mo 'di zla ba gcig gis bri bar bya na yang des de bzhin du bri bar bya'o/ /gal te zla ba gnyis sam/ gal te zla ba gsum 'am/ gal te zla ba bzhi 'am/ gal te zla ba lnga
7a6('bum): 'am/ gal te zla ba drug gam/ gal te lo'i bar gyis bri bar bya na yang de bzhin du bri bar bya'o/ /gal te zla ba gcig gis bstan pa dang / lung dbog pa dang / kha ton bya
7a7('bum): ba dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bya ba dang / bsgom par bya na yang de bzhin du bsgom par bya'o/ /gal te lo'i bar gyis bsgom par bya na/ yang de bzhin du bsgom par bya'o/ /
7a8('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni nor bu rin po che chen po la bar chad mang du 'byung ngo / /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ji nas kyang myi
7b1('bum): bri ba dang / myi klag pa dang / myi bstan pa dang / kha ton myi bgyi ba dang / yid la myi bgyi ba dang / myi bsgom pa'i slad du bdud sdig to can dag bar chad myi bgyid pa ngo mtshar che'o/ /
7b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la ci nas kyang myi bri ba dang / myi klag pa dang / myi bstan pa dang / kha ton myi bya ba dang /
7b3('bum): tshul bzhin du yid la myi bya ba dang / myi bsgom pa'i slad du bdud sdig to can bar chad myi byed pa yang ma yin mod kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
7b4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bri ba dang / klog pa dang / kha ton du byed pa dang / bsgom pa rnams la bar chad bya bar myi nus so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/
7b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ci'i mthus na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bri
7b6('bum): ba dang / klag pa dang / kha ton du bgyi ba dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyi ba dang / bsgom pa la bdud sdig to can bgegs bgyid par myi 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
7b7('bum): stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / kha ton du byed pa dang /
7b8('bum): tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / sgom pa dag la bdud sdig to can gyis bar chad bya bar myi nus so/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu phyogs bcu kun kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag na/ sangs rgyas
8a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs shing / 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag gi mthus kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol
8a2('bum): tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'bri ba dang / klog pa dang / ston pa dang / kha ton du byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / sgom pa de dag la bdud sdig to can gyis bar chad bya bar myi nus
8a3('bum): so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la dgongs shing yongs su 'dzin pa mdzad de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag
8a4('bum): gis yongs su bzung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'bri ba dang / klog pa dang / ston pa dang / kha ton du byed pa
8a5('bum): dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / sgom pa de dag la bdud sdig to can gyis bar chad bya bar myi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu sangs rgyas kyis yongs su
8a6('bum): zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i chos yongs su btsal ba la/ bdud sdig to can gyis bar chad bya bar myi nus so/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni gang
8a7('bum): de ltar phyogs bcu kun kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad myed grangs myed pa dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshad myed grangs myed pa
8a8('bum): bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'bri ba la dgongs pa mdzad pa dang /
8b1('bum): klog cing ston pa dang / kha ton du byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / sgom pa la dgongs pa mdzad pa ni chos nyid kyis de bzhin te/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi
8b2('bum): bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'bri zhing klog pa dang / ston cing tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / sgom pa des kyang bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi mthus shes rab kyi pha rol
8b3('bum): tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri'o/ /klog go/ /ston to/ /kha ton du byed do/ /tshul bzhin du yid la byed do/ /sgom mo zhes bya bar khong du chud par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan
8b4('bum): 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang su yang rung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'bri ba dang / klog pa dang / kha ton du bgyid pa dang / tshul
8b5('bum): bzhin du yid la bgyid pa dang / sgom mo 'tshal kun kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthu lags sam/ kun kyang sangs rgyas kyi gzungs lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
8b6('bum): stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo gang su yang rung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'bri zhing klog pa
8b7('bum): dang / ston cing kha ton du byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing sgom pa de thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthu yin par rig par bya'o/ /de thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi
8b8('bum): gzungs yin par rig par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'bri zhing klog pa dang / ston
9a1('bum): cing kha ton du bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid cing sgom pa de dag ni shar phyogs nas phyogs bcu kun kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad dang grangs ma mchis pa na
9a2('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad dang grangs ma mchis pa bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag gis mkhyen te/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri zhing
9a3('bum): klog pa dang / ston cing kha ton du bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid cing sgom pa de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis spyan gyis gzigs so/ /
9a4('bum): thugs su chud do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
9a5('bum): phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri zhing klog pa dang / ston cing kha ton du byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing sgom pa de dag ni/ shar phyogs dang / lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang /
9a6('bum): byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang
9a7('bum): steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad myed grangs myed pa de dag gis mkhyen to/ /sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs shing thugs su chud do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu de
9a8('bum): la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par
9b1('bum): byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / sgom pa dang / de bzhin nyid du nan tan du byed pa de dag gis kyang / 'di ltar bdag cag ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
9b2('bum): tu nye bar gyur to/ /zhes bya bar rig par bya'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di
9b3('bum): bris te glegs bam du byas te/ 'chang ba de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos pa mang bar 'gyur te/ de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la me tog
9b4('bum): dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan mang pos rim gror byed bkur stir byed/ phu dud du byed/ mchod
9b5('bum): par byed do/ /de ltar rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bris shing 'chang ba de dag kyang don che ba dang / legs pa che ba dang / 'bras bu che
9b6('bum): ba dang / rnam par smyin pa che bar 'gyur te/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni phyir myi ldog pa'i sa yongs su mnod kyi bar du dge ba'i rtsa ba des nam yang ngan
9b7('bum): song du skye bar myi 'gyur ro/ /nam yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang 'bral bar myi 'gyur ro/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag bla na myed pa
9b8('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang nam yang 'bral bar myi 'gyur ro/ /tshul khrims
10a1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang nam yang bral bar myi 'gyur ro/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang nam yang bral bar myi 'gyur ro/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang nam yang
10a2('bum): bral bar myi 'gyur ro/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang nam yang bral bar myi 'gyur ro/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang nam yang bral bar myi 'gyur ro/ /nang stong pa nyid
10a3('bum): dang nam yang bral bar myi 'gyur ro/ /phyi stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar myi 'gyur ro/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar myi 'gyur ro/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang nam
10a4('bum): yang bral bar myi 'gyur ro/ /chen po stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar myi 'gyur ro/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar myi 'gyur ro/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid dang nam
10a5('bum): yang bral bar myi 'gyur ro/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar myi 'gyur ro/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar myi 'gyur ro/ /thog ma dang tha
10a6('bum): ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar myi 'gyur ro/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar myi 'gyur ro/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /
10a7('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar myi 'gyur ro/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar myi 'gyur ro/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral
10a8('bum): bar myi 'gyur ro/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar myi 'gyur ro/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar myi 'gyur ro/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
10b1('bum): dang nam yang bral bar myi 'gyur ro/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang nam yang bral bar myi 'gyur ro/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / nam yang bral bar myi 'gyur ro/ /
10b2('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang nam yang bral bar myi 'gyur ro/ /dbang po rnams dang nam yang bral bar myi 'gyur ro/ /stobs rnams dang nam yang bral bar myi 'gyur ro/ /byang chub
10b3('bum): kyi yan lag rnams dang nam yang bral bar myi 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang nam yang bral bar myi 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang nam yang
10b4('bum): bral bar myi 'gyur ro/ /bsam gtan rnams dang nam yang bral bar myi 'gyur ro/ /tshad myed pa rnams dang nam yang bral bar myi 'gyur ro/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug
10b5('bum): pa rnams dang nam yang bral bar myi 'gyur ro/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang nam yang bral bar myi 'gyur ro/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang nam yang bral bar
10b6('bum): myi 'gyur ro/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang nam yang bral bar myi 'gyur ro/ /mngon par shes pa rnams dang nam yang bral bar myi
10b7('bum): 'gyur ro/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang nam yang bral bar myi 'gyur ro/ /gzugs kyi sgo rnams dang nam yang bral bar myi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang nam yang bral
10b8('bum): bar myi 'gyur ro/ /myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang nam yang bral bar myi 'gyur ro/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang nam yang bral bar myi 'gyur ro/ /snying rje chen po dang nam yang
11a1('bum): bral bar myi 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang nam yang bral bar myi 'gyur ro/ /thams cad shes pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar myi 'gyur ro/ /
11a2('bum): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar myi 'gyur ro/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nam yang bral bar myi 'gyur ro/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
11a3('bum): pa 'di de bzhin gshegs pa 'das nas/ lho phyogs kyi rgyud na spyod par 'gyur te/ de na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge
11a4('bum): bsnyen ma dag mos pa dam pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri bar 'gyur/ 'dzin par 'gyur/ 'chang bar 'gyur/ klog par 'gyur/ kun chub par byed par
11a5('bum): 'gyur/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed par 'gyur te/ me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan
11a6('bum): mang pos rim gror byed/ bkur stir byed/ phu dud du byed/ mchod par byed par 'gyur ro/ /de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba des nam yang ngan song log par ltung bar myi 'dong ste/ de dag
11a7('bum): gis lha dang myi'i phun sum tshogs pa myong zhing / pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis mngon par 'phags par 'gyur ro/ /de dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis mngon par 'phags par gyur
11a8('bum): nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa byed cing / nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/
11b1('bum): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'am/ theg pa gsum pos rim gyis mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
11b2('bum): pa zab mo 'di lho phyogs kyi rgyud nas yul bar ta ni na spyod par gyur te/ de na yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma
11b3('bum): dag mos pa dam pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri bar 'gyur/ 'dzin par 'gyur/ 'chang bar 'gyur/ klog par 'gyur/ kun chub par byed par 'gyur/ tshul
11b4('bum): bzhin du yid la byed par 'gyur te/ me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan mang pos rim gror byed/
11b5('bum): bkur stir byed/ phu dud du byed/ mchod par byed par 'gyur te/ de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba des nam yang ngan song log par ltung bar myi 'dong ste/ de dag gis lha dang myi'i phun sum tshogs
11b6('bum): pa myong zhing / pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis mngon par 'phags par 'gyur ro/ /de dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis mngon par 'phags par gyur nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
11b7('bum): 'das rnams la rim gro dang / bkur bsti dang / phu dud dang / mchod par byed cing / nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
11b8('bum): rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ theg pa gsum pos rim gyis mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yul bar ta ni nas byang phyogs kyi rgyud
12a1('bum): na spyod par 'gyur te/ de na yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dag mos dam pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
12a2('bum): pa zab mo 'di 'dri bar 'gyur/ 'dzin par 'gyur/ 'chang bar 'gyur/ klog par 'gyur/ kun chub par byed par 'gyur/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed par 'gyur te/ me tog dang / phreng ba dang /
12a3('bum): spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan mang pos rim gror byed/ bkur stir byed/ phu dud du byed/ mchod par byed par 'gyur
12a4('bum): te/ de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba des nam yang ngan song log par ltung bar myi 'dong ste/ de dag gis lha dang myi'i phun sum tshogs pa myong zhing / pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis mngon par 'phags par 'gyur
12a5('bum): ro/ /de dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis mngon par 'phags par gyur nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa byed cing /
12a6('bum): nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ theg pa gsum pos rim gyis mya ngan las 'da' bar
12a7('bum): 'gyur ro/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di lho phyogs kyi rgyud dang / byang phyogs kyi rgyud na phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe/ lnga brgya tha ma la sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byed par
12a8('bum): 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin
12b1('bum): pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos dang 'dul ba dar la bab pa'i tshe/ dam pa'i chos nub par myi 'gyur te/ chos de yang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab
12b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par
12b3('bum): byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / de bzhin nyid du nan tan du byed pa de dag la ni ngas dgongs so/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
12b4('bum): pa zab mo 'di 'dri shing bris nas kyang / me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan mang pos rim gror
12b5('bum): byed/ bkur stir byed/ phu dud du byed/ mchod par byed pa de dag kyang dgongs te/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba des nam yang ngan song log
12b6('bum): par ltung bar myi 'dong ste/ de dag lha dang myi'i phun sum tshogs pa myong zhing / pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis mngon par 'phags par 'gyur ro/ /de dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis mngon par
12b7('bum): 'phags par gyur nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rim gro dang / bkur stir dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa byed cing / nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am
12b8('bum): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ theg pa gsum pos rim gyis mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu dang rigs
13a1('bum): kyi bu mo de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs so/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas brjod do/ /
13a2('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas bstod do/ /bsngags so/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shar phyogs kyi de bzhin
13a3('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
13a4('bum): rgyas de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs so/ /rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
13a5('bum): de dag gis brjod do/ /bstod do/ /bsngags so/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni lho phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
13a6('bum): bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs so/ /
13a7('bum): rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis brjod do/ /bstod do/ /bsngags so/ /rigs kyi bu dang /
13a8('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni nub phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
13b1('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs so/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
13b2('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis brjod do/ /bstod do/ /bsngags so/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni byang phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
13b3('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi
13b4('bum): spyan gyis gzigs so/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis brjod do/ /bstod do/ /bsngags
13b5('bum): so/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang /
13b6('bum): chos ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs so/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni
13b7('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis brjod do/ /bstod do/ /bsngags so/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shar lho'i phyogs
13b8('bum): mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
14a1('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs so/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
14a2('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis brjod do/ /bstod do/ /bsngags so/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
14a3('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis
14a4('bum): gzigs so/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis brjod do bstod do/ /bsngags so/ /rigs
14a5('bum): kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni nub byang phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i
14a6('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs so/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni de bzhin
14a7('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis brjod do/ /bstod do/ /bsngags so/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni 'og gi phyogs de bzhin
14a8('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
14b1('bum): de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs so/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag
14b2('bum): gis brjod do/ /bstod do/ /bsngags so/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni steng gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
14b3('bum): bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs so/ /
14b4('bum): rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis brjod do/ /bstod do/ /bsngags so/ /gsol pa/
14b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di slad ma'i dus slad ma'i tshe na/ byang phyogs su rgyas par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa
14b6('bum): ti'i bu de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe na/ byang phyogs su rgyas par 'gyur te/ de la sha ra dwa ti'i
14b7('bum): bu phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe na/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan par 'gyur te/ thos nas kyang mos par 'gyur ro/ /mos par
14b8('bum): byas nas kyang 'dri ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing / de bzhin nyid du nan tan du byed par 'gyur ro/ /
15a1('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan cing thos nas mos par byed pa dang / mos par byas nas 'dri zhing
15a2('bum): 'dzin pa dang / 'chang zhing klog pa dang / kun chub par byed cing / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa de dag ni yun ring po nas theg pa la yang dag par
15a3('bum): zhugs pa dang / sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par rig par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom
15a4('bum): ldan 'das slad ma'i dus slad ma'i tshe/ byang gi phyogs cha der byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan cing
15a5('bum): thos nas mos par bgyid pa dang / mos par bgyis nas 'dri zhing 'dzin pa dang / 'chang zhing klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid cing / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa dang / de bzhin
15a6('bum): nyid du nan tan du bgyid pa de lta bu ji snyed cig 'byung bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe/ byang gi phyogs cha der byang chub
15a7('bum): sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo ni mang du 'byung ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha
15a8('bum): rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ myi 'jum yongs su myi 'jum/ myi 'jigs myi sngang / skrag par myi 'gyur ba de lta bu ni mang ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu dang /
15b1('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mang po'i rjes su 'brangs pa dang / rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis/
15b2('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mang po la yongs su zhus/ yongs su dris pa'i phyir te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo
15b3('bum): de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /
15b4('bum): rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
15b5('bum): yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de
15b6('bum): dag ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang
15b7('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu
15b8('bum): dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /
16a1('bum): rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs
16a2('bum): su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni mtha' las 'das
16a3('bum): pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu
16a4('bum): mo de dag ni dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu
16a5('bum): dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /
16a6('bum): rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs
16a7('bum): par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
16a8('bum): nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni yang dag
16b1('bum): par spong ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag
16b2('bum): ni dbang po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni stobs yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni byang chub kyi yan
16b3('bum): lag yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag
16b4('bum): ni 'phags pa'i bden pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni bsam gtan yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo
16b5('bum): de dag ni/ tshad myed pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs bu mo de dag ni/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /
16b6('bum): rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms
16b7('bum): par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa yongs su
16b8('bum): rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ mngon par shes pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ ting nge 'dzin yongs
17a1('bum): su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni gzungs kyi sgo yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni
17a2('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni myi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /
17a3('bum): rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni snying rje chen po yongs su
17a4('bum): rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu dang rigs
17a5('bum): kyi bu mo de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa bas nye bar brtan par 'gyur te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi don du skye bo mang po'i don byed par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
17a6('bum): de ni 'di ltar sha ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la ni ngas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i gtam brjod do/ /'das pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
17a7('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag ji snyed cig byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis kyang / rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
17a8('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i gtam brjod do/ /de dag tshe 'das nas kyang 'di lta ste/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi don du spyod pa nyid du 'gyur te de dag gzhan la yang 'di lta
17b1('bum): ste/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi don tu rnam pa de lta bu nyid brjod par 'gyur ro/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni mnyam par bzhag par gyur te/
17b2('bum): de dag ni bdud dam bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis kyang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las bzlog par myi nus na/ sdig to la mos pa dang / sdig to'i spyod pa can shes rab kyi pha
17b3('bum): rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spong ba gzhan gyis lta ci smos/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo
17b4('bum): 'di thos nas/ dga' zhing nyams bde ba rgya chen po skye bar 'gyur ro/ /'di ltar bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi don du skye bo mang po yang dge ba'i chos la 'god par 'gyur ro/ /
17b5('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis ni nga'i mdun du 'di skad du bcom ldan 'das bdag cag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ srog chags brgya phrag mang po dang / srog chags
17b6('bum): stong phrag mang po dang / srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po byang chub tu rab tu dgod par bgyi'o/ /yang dag par bstan par bgyi'o/ /yang dag par bskul bar bgyi'o/ /yang dag par gzeng bstod
17b7('bum): par bgyi'o/ /yang dag par dga' bar bgyi'o/ /phyir myi ldog par lung bstan par bgyi'o zhes bya ba'i tshig smras so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ra dwa ti'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag
17b8('bum): gi tshig ni sems la sems kyis rnam par blta ste/ ngas rjes su dgyes par mdzad do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
18a1('bum): rnams kyi spyan sngar yang / rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis 'di skad du bdag cag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ srog chags brgya phrag mang po dang /
18a2('bum): srog chags stong phrag mang po dang / srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po byang chub tu dgod par bgyi'o/ /yang dag par bstan par bgyi'o/ /yang dag par bskul bar bgyi'o/ /
18a3('bum): yang dag par gzeng bstod par bgyi'o/ /yang dag par dga' bar bgyi'o/ /phyir myi ldog par lung bstan par bgyi'o zhes bya ba'i tshig smras so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'das pa'i
18a4('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang / rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi tshig ni sems la thugs kyis rnam par gzigs te
18a5('bum): rjes su dgyes par mdzad do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ srog chags brgya phrag mang po dang / srog chags stong phrag mang
18a6('bum): po dang / srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu rab tu 'god par 'gyur/ yang dag par ston par 'gyur/ yang dag par bskul bar 'gyur/
18a7('bum): yang dag par gzeng stod par 'gyur/ yang dag par dga' bar byed par 'gyur/ phyir myi ldog par lung ston par 'gyur ro/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni
18a8('bum): gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg la mos pa rlabs po cher 'gyur te/ de dag sbyin pa rlabs po che gtong bar 'gyur ro/ /sbyin pa rlabs po cher gtang zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
18b1('bum): rlabs po che mngon par 'du byed par 'gyur ro/ /de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba rlabs po che mngon par 'du byas nas/ rnam par smyin pa rlabs po che yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur te/
18b2('bum): rnam par smyin pa rlabs po che yongs su bzung nas/ sems can de dag nyid kyi don tu rnam par smyin pa rlabs chen po las de bas kyang ches rlabs che ba'i rnam par smyin pa yongs su 'dzin
18b3('bum): par 'gyur ro/ /'di ltar phyi 'am nang gi dngos po de dag kyang / sems can de dag nyid la yongs su gtong bar 'gyur te/ de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan gang na/
18b4('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid kyi chos ston pa mngon
18b5('bum): du gyur pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag la rten par 'gyur ro/ /de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de rnams las/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
18b6('bum): pa zab mo 'di mngon sum du thos nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu yang srog chags brgya phrag mang po dang / srog chags stong phrag mang po dang / srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po bla na myed pa
18b7('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par ston par 'gyur ro/ /yang dag par skul bar 'gyur ro/ /yang dag par gzeng stod par 'gyur ro/ /yang dag par dga' bar byed par 'gyur ro/ /
18b8('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams las/ chos gang
19a1('bum): thugs su ma chud pa de lta bu gang yang ma mchis te/ de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid gang thugs su ma chud pa de lta bu gang yang ma mchis so/ /sems can rnams kyi sems
19a2('bum): thugs su ma chud pa de lta bu gang yang ma mchis pa ni ngo mtshar che ste/ 'di ltar 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang yongs su mkhyen to/ /'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang
19a3('bum): yongs su mkhyen to/ /'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang nyan thos rnams kyang yongs su mkhyen to/ /ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub
19a4('bum): sems dpa' rnams kyang yongs su mkhyen to/ /ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang nyan thos rnams kyang yongs su mkhyen to/ /da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin
19a5('bum): gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang nyan thos rnams kyang yongs su mkhyen to/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
19a6('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi byang chub
19a7('bum): sems dpa' rnams kyang yongs su mkhyen to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang nyan thos rnams kyang yongs su mkhyen to/ /bcom ldan 'das gang yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
19a8('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag gi slad du brtson par bgyid cing / pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag tshol ba dang yongs su tshol ba'i tshe/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo pha rol tu phyin pa
19b1('bum): drug po 'di dag tshol ba dang / yongs su tshol ba las kyang la las ni btsal ba las pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag thob par 'gyur/ la las ni thob par myi 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan
19b2('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni de lta ma yin te/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo brtson 'grus myi gtong ba de dag kun kyis kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag
19b3('bum): thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag gi don du brtson par byed pa'i phyir ro/ /
19b4('bum): gsol pa ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis mdo sde zab mo zab mo pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa 'di dag kun kyang 'grub par 'gyur ram/
19b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis mdo sde zab mo zab mo pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa 'di dag myi 'grub par 'gyur ba de
19b6('bum): lta bu'i gnas skabs myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems can rnams yang dag par ston cing / yang dag par
19b7('bum): bskul ba dang / yang dag par gzeng bstod pa dang / yang dag par dga' bar byed pa dang / 'god cing rab tu gzhogs pa las kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu dang
19b8('bum): rigs kyi bu mo tshe 'das nas kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de dag ni nam sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par ma byas/ sems can yongs su smyin
20a1('bum): par ma byas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par ma gyur gyi bar du ji skad du bstan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag
20a2('bum): las brtson 'grus nyams par myi byed do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u sum cu gcig go/ //
20a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po gnyis pa/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das
20a4('bum): rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa/ sems can yongs su smyin par bgyid pa/ sangs rgyas
20a5('bum): kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin par bgyid pa de dag gi yon tan yongs su brjod pa ni 'di dag lags na/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
20a6('bum): byang chub tu spyod pa de dag la bar chad du 'gyur ba ji lta bu dag mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor spobs pa ha cang 'phyi ste skye na/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems
20a7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du spobs pa ha cang 'phyi ste skye bar 'gyur/ de ni ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa'
20a8('bum): sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
20b1('bum): pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dka' bar yongs su rdzogs par byed/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dka' bar yongs su rdzogs par byed/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dka'
20b2('bum): bar yongs su rdzogs par byed/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dka' bar yongs su rdzogs par byed/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dka' bar yongs su rdzogs par byed/ sbyin pa'i pha rol
20b3('bum): tu phyin pa dka' bar yongs su rdzogs par byed na/ rab 'byor rnam grangs des shin tu 'phyi ste skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par
20b4('bum): bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang shin tu myur bar spobs pa skye na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du
20b5('bum): shin tu myur bar spobs pa skye bar 'gyur/ de ni ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
20b6('bum): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /
20b7('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs myi mkhas pas ha cang myur bar
20b8('bum): spobs pa skye la des rlom sems su byed na/ rab 'byor rnam grangs des na spobs pa ha cang myur bar skye ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par
21a1('bum): bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang glal cing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'bri na/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par
21a2('bum): bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang dgod cing 'bri na/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor phan tshun steg cing 'bri na/
21a3('bum): rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /sems g.yeng zhing 'bri na/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
21a4('bum): pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /yi ge gzhan la chags shing tshig gi don myi shes par 'bri na/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las
21a5('bum): su rig par bya'o/ /'di'i ro ma myong nas stan las langs te 'gro na/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan
21a6('bum): yang glal cing lung 'bog na/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /glal cing kha ton byed dam/ 'dzin tam klog gam/
21a7('bum): ston pa dang / glal cing tshul bzhin du yid la byed na/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang phan tshun
21a8('bum): dgod cing 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed na/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las
21b1('bum): su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang phan tshun steg cing 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed na/ rab 'byor de yang
21b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang sems g.yeng pas 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed
21b3('bum): dam/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed na/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang yi ge gzhan dang
21b4('bum): gzhan la chags shing 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed na/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
21b5('bum): pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
21b6('bum): gang 'di skad du 'di'i ro ma myong nas stan las langs te 'gro na/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o zhes bka' stsal na/ bcom
21b7('bum): ldan 'das ci'i slad du 'di'i ro mi myong bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sngon shes rab kyi pha
21b8('bum): rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
22a1('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las bdag cag lung ma bstan to zhes/
22a2('bum): ma dad pa'i yid kyis stan las langs shing 'dong ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
22a3('bum): ci'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las lung ma bstan pa de dag stan las langs shing mchi bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
22a4('bum): sems dpa' chen po skyon myed par ma chud pa ni/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung myi bstan to/ /de la bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las myi 'byung ngo / /
22a5('bum): bdag gi mying yang yongs su ma brjod do zhes dad par ma gyur na/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan
22a6('bum): 'das ci'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi mying yongs su ma brjod pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
22a7('bum): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lung ma bstan pa rnams kyi mying ni yongs su myi brjod de/ de la bdag gi mying yang 'di las myi 'byung / bdag gang du
22a8('bum): skyes ba'i grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal gyi mying 'di yang myi 'byung ngo zhes/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myi mnyan to snyam byed cing / 'khor de nas 'gro bar sems na
22b1('bum): sems bskyed pa des ji lta ji ltar 'gro bar sems shing gom pa ji snyed cig bor ba de snyed kyi bskal pa yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur te/ de dag la bzod brtson par bya dgos so/ /de shes rab
22b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bor zhing mdo sde gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes yongs su myi sgrub pa de dag kun chub par bya bar sems te/ des na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i
22b3('bum): rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi shing gi rtsa ba spangs te de nyid kyi yan lag dang / 'dab ma dang / lo ma la 'ju bar sems par gyur pa dag ste/
22b4('bum): rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes yongs su myi
22b5('bum): sgrub pa'i mdo sde kun chub par bgyi bar sems par 'gyur ba de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mdo sde gang nyan thos dang ldan pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas dang ldan
22b6('bum): pa dag ste/ 'di ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong pa bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /
22b7('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa rnams te/ de dag la gnas shing rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag
22b8('bum): rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'thob pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid 'thob pa dang / rang byang chub 'thob pa 'gyur gyi/ bla na
23a1('bum): myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob par myi 'gyur ba ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde gang la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bor
23a2('bum): zhing kun chub par bya bar sems dpa' ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes yongs su myi sgrub pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
23a3('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams kyis 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa'i
23a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams la slob pa yin no/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ khyi la la zhig rje bo'i
23a5('bum): zan nar ma bor te las myi las zan btsal bar sems pa dang 'dra bar de bzhin du/ rab 'byor ma 'ongs pa'i dus na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo shes
23a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi rtsa bar gyur pa 'di bor te/ yal ga dang / lo ma dang / 'dab ma lta bu'i mdo sde nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan
23a7('bum): pa dag la bsten par sems pa 'byung ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na
23a8('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bor nas khe dang bkur sti'i phyir nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan
23b1('bum): pa'i mdo sde rnams kun chub par bya bar sems dpa' 'byung ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na
23b2('bum): myi la la zhig glang po 'dod la des glang po rnyed na glang po'i rjes btsal bar sems dpa' yod na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ skyes bu de mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam/ gsol pa/
23b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab
23b4('bum): mo 'di bor zhing mdo sde gang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa de dag btsal bar sems dpa' dag kyang dpe de dang 'dra bar rig par bya ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems
23b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ myi zhig rgya mtsho chen po blta bar 'dod la/ ba lang gi rjes btsal bar sems
23b6('bum): shing / des ba glang gi rjes mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du rgya mtsho chen po'i tshad 'di dang mnyam 'am myi mnyam snyam na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ skyes bu de mkhas pa'i ngang tshul
23b7('bum): can yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin
23b8('bum): du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos shing rnyed kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo
24a1('bum): bor zhing spangs te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag gzung ba dang kun chub par bya bar sems pa de dag kyang rnam pa de ltar rig par bya ste/ rab 'byor
24a2('bum): de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ phya mkhan nam phya mkhan gyi slob ma rnam par rgyal ba'i khang pa'i
24a3('bum): tshad du khang pa zhig dbub cing bslang bar 'dod de nyi ma dang zla ba'i gzhal myed khang yongs su btsal bar sems shing / nyi ma dang zla ba'i gzhal myed khang las tshad blang bar sems na/
24a4('bum): rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ skyes bu des nyi ma dang zla ba'i gzhal myed khang gi tshad kyis rnam par rgyal ba'i khang pa'i tshad dang dpe tshul bzung ste/ de dang 'dra bar khang pa dbub par
24a5('bum): nus sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ phya mkhan nam/ phya mkhan gyi slob ma de
24a6('bum): mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das skyes bu de ni byis pa'i ngang tshul can du rig par bgyi ste/ mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das
24a7('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos
24a8('bum): shing rnyed nas kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo bor zhing spangs te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag las rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su btsal
24b1('bum): bar sems dpa' 'byung na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam/ gsol pa/
24b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
24b3('bum): chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu la la zhig 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mthong bar 'dod la/ des khams kyi rgyal phran mthong nas
24b4('bum): 'di snyam du 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de kha dog dang / dbyibs kyis ji 'dra ba zhig yod ces khams kyi rgyal phran mthong ba'i kha dog dang dbyibs kyi mtshan ma bzung bar bsams te/
24b5('bum): 'di skad du 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de'i kha dog dang / dbyibs dang tshul dang mtshan ma yang sa'i bdag po 'di 'dra ba zhig yod grang zhes zer na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ skyes bu de
24b6('bum): mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
24b7('bum): de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang la la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos shing rnyed kyang / shes rab
24b8('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo bor zhing spangs te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag las/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su btsal bar sems dpa' 'byung
25a1('bum): na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni
25a2('bum): ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/
25a3('bum): skyes bu shin tu bkres pa la la zhig gis ro brgya dang ldan pa'i kha zas rnyed kyang drug cu pa'i kha zas btsal bar sems shing / des kha zas ro brgya dang ldan pa de bor nas/ drug cu pa'i kha zas
25a4('bum): la bza' bar bsams na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ skyes bu de mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das
25a5('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab
25a6('bum): mo 'di thos shing rnyed kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bor zhing spangs te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag las rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
25a7('bum): yongs su btsal bar sems dpa' 'byung na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam/
25a8('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /
25b1('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu la la zhig gis nor bu rin po che rin thang myed pa rnyed nas/ nor bu mching bu dang bsgrun par bsams na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ skyes bu de
25b2('bum): mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ byang chub
25b3('bum): sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos shing rnyed nas kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo bor zhing spangs te/
25b4('bum): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag las/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su btsal bar sems pa 'byung na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/ byang chub
25b5('bum): sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
25b6('bum): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag shes
25b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba'i tshe/ spobs pa mang po gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba'i dkrugs mar 'gyur ba de lta bu skye bar 'gyur ba ste/
25b8('bum): 'di ltar gzugs kyi spobs pa dang / sgra'i spobs pa dang / dri'i spobs pa dang / ro'i spobs pa dang / reg gi spobs pa dang / chos kyi spobs pa dang / sbyin pa'i spobs pa dang / tshul
26a1('bum): khrims kyi spobs pa dang / bzod pa'i spobs pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi spobs pa dang / bsam gtan gyi spobs pa dang / shes rab kyi spobs pa dang / 'dod pa'i khams kyi
26a2('bum): spobs pa dang / gzugs kyi khams kyi spobs pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams kyi spobs pa dang / lung dbog pa dang / kha ton bya ba'i spobs pa dang / rim gror bya ba'i spobs pa dang /
26a3('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / yang dag par spong ba'i spobs pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i spobs pa dang / dbang po'i spobs pa dang / stobs kyi spobs pa dang / byang chub kyi yan
26a4('bum): lag gi spobs pa dang / lam gyi spobs pa dang / bsam gtan gyi spobs pa dang / rnam pa thar pa'i spobs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi spobs pa dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i spobs pa dang /
26a5('bum): nang stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / don
26a6('bum): dam pa stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / thog ma
26a7('bum): dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / rang gi
26a8('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / dngos po
26b1('bum): myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spobs pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spobs pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spobs pa
26b2('bum): dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spobs pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spobs pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spobs pa dang / stobs bcu'i spobs
26b3('bum): pa dang / myi 'jigs pa'i spobs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa'i spobs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i spobs pa dang /
26b4('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i spobs pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i spobs pa dang / dgra bcom pa'i spobs pa dang / rang byang chub kyi spobs pa dang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
26b5('bum): pa'i byang chub kyi spobs pa skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyin zhe na/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni spobs pa myed pas rnam par byang ba'o/ /rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu
26b6('bum): phyin pa ni bsam gyis myi khyab pa'o/ /rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sems myed pa'o/ /rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni skye ba myed cing 'gag pa myed pa'o/ /
26b7('bum): rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni kun nas nyon mongs pa myed cing rnam par byang ba myed pa'o/ /rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'khrug pa myed pa'o/ /rab 'byor
26b8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni brjod du myed pa'o/ /rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rnam par byang ba myed pa'o/ /rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dmyigs pa myed
27a1('bum): pa'o/ /rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la myed cing myi dmyigs te/ rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa'i theg
27a2('bum): pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba'i tshe/ chos de dag gis 'khrug par gyur na/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i
27a3('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
27a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bri bar nus sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de lta ma yin no/ /rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol
27a5('bum): tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa
27a6('bum): ma yin te myi dmyigs so/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so/ /
27a7('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so/ /phyi stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs
27a8('bum): so/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so/ /chen po stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyi yod pa ma yin
27b1('bum): te myi dmyigs so/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi
