27b2('bum): ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi yod pa ma yin te myi
27b3('bum): dmyigs so/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo
27b4('bum): nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so/ /
27b5('bum): dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo yod
27b6('bum): pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so/ /
27b7('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi ngo bo yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so/ /dbang po rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so/ /stobs rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi
27b8('bum): dmyigs so/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so/ /
28a1('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so/ /bsam gtan rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so/ /tshad myed pa rnams kyi
28a2('bum): ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par thar pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod
28a3('bum): pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so/ /rnam pa thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
28a4('bum): ma myed pa dang / smyon pa myed pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so/ /mngon par shes pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi ngo bo nyid
28a5('bum): yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi
28a6('bum): dmyigs so/ /myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so/ /snying rje chen po'i
28a7('bum): ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so/ /thams cad shes pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te
28a8('bum): myi dmyigs so/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te myi dmyigs so/ /ngo bo nyid myi
28b1('bum): dmyigs pa gang yin pa de ni dngos po myed pa'o/ /dngos po myed pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ dngos po myed pas dngos po myed pa bri bar myi nus so/ /rab 'byor gal te byang chub
28b2('bum): sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di dngos po myed ces bya bar 'du shes na/ de yang bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /
28b3('bum): gsol pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger bris nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
28b4('bum): zab mo 'di bdag gis bris so zhes mchi na/ de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la yi ger mngon par chags pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni
28b5('bum): yi ger ma mchis pa'o/ /bsam gtan kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni yi ge
28b6('bum): ma mchis pa'o/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das gzugs ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /
28b7('bum): tshor ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /'du shes ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /'du byed ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /rnam par shes pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /myig ni yi ge ma mchis
28b8('bum): pa'o/ /rna ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /sna ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /lce ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /lus ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /yid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /gzugs
29a1('bum): ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /sgra ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /dri ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /ro ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /reg ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /chos ni yi ge ma mchis
29a2('bum): pa'o/ /myig gi rnam par shes pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa
29a3('bum): ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /
29a4('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni yi ge ma
29a5('bum): mchis pa'o/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor
29a6('bum): ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg
29a7('bum): pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /sa'i khams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /chu'i khams ni yi ge ma
29a8('bum): mchis pa'o/ /mye'i khams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /rlung gi khams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /nam mkha'i khams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /rnam pa shes pa'i khams ni yi
29b1('bum): ge ma mchis pa'o/ /ma rig pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /'du byed ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /rnam par shes pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /mying dang gzugs ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /
29b2('bum): skye mched drug ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /reg pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /tshor ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /sred pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /len pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /srid pa ni
29b3('bum): yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /skye ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /rga shi ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /nang stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /phyi stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /phyi nang
29b4('bum): stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /chen po stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /'dus
29b5('bum): byas stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa
29b6('bum): nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /
29b7('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
29b8('bum): ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams ni
30a1('bum): yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /dbang po rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /stobs rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /byang chub
30a2('bum): kyi yan lag rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /
30a3('bum): bsam gtan rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /tshad myed pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /rnam par
30a4('bum): thar pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa
30a5('bum): dang / smon pa myed pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /mngon par shes pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni yi ge ma mchis
30a6('bum): pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa stobs rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /myi 'jigs pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /
30a7('bum): snying rje chen po ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /thams cad shes pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa
30a8('bum): nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo yi
30b1('bum): ge ma mchis pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags par bgyid la/ yi ge ma mchis pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags par bgyid cing / yi ge ma
30b2('bum): mchis pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge
30b3('bum): ma mchis pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma
30b4('bum): mchis pa'i nang stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i phyi stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i phyi nang stong pa nyid la
30b5('bum): mngon pa chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i chen po stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par
30b6('bum): bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i don dam pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i 'dus byas stong pa nyid la mngon pa chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma
30b7('bum): mchis pa'i 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i
30b8('bum): thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin stong
31a1('bum): pa nyid la mngon pa chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i chos thams cad stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i rang gi mtshan nyid
31a2('bum): stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i dngos po myed pa stong pa
31a3('bum): nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la
31a4('bum): mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i yang dag par spong ba rnams la
31a5('bum): mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i dbang po rnams la mngon par chags
31a6('bum): par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i stobs rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa
31a7('bum): dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la mngon par chags
31a8('bum): par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i bsam gtan rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i tshad myed pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang /
31b1('bum): yi ge ma mchis pa'i gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i rnam par thar pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid
31b2('bum): pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
31b3('bum): mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i mngon par shes pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i
31b4('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i de bzhin gshegs
31b5('bum): pa'i stobs rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i myi 'jigs pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i so so yang dag
31b6('bum): par rig pa rnams la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i snying rje chen po la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams
31b7('bum): la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i thams cad shes pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la mngon par chags
31b8('bum): par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid na/ de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su
32a1('bum): rig par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi
32a2('bum): bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / kha ton byed pa dang / zhu ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du
32a3('bum): yid la byed pa dang / sgom pa'i tshe yul gyi yid la bya ba mang po skyed na/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan
32a4('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / kha ton byed pa dang / zhu ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang /
32a5('bum): kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang sgom pa'i tshe/ grong gi yid la bya ba dang / grong rdal gyi yid la bya ba dang / khams kyi yid la bya ba dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor
32a6('bum): gyi yid la bya ba dang / khyim gyi yid la bya ba dang / bla ma dang / mkhan po'i yid la bya ba dang / ma dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / pha dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / phu nu dang ldan pa'i
32a7('bum): yid la bya ba dang / sring mo dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / gnyen bshes dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / kun po dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / phyag dar ba dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
32a8('bum): dang / 'jig rten pa dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / smad 'tshong ma dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / bud myed dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / yid la bya ba gzhan mang po skye na/ rab 'byor
32b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / lung bstan pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i tshe/ bar
32b2('bum): chad bya ba'i phyir bdud sdig to can 'khrug par 'gyur ba nye bar sbyor te/ de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor
32b3('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'bri ba'i tshe/ khe dang bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang /
32b4('bum): chos gos dang zas dang / mal cha dang / nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad mang po byung la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo
32b5('bum): 'di 'dri ba dang lung dbog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i tshe/ de dag gi ro myong bar byed na/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
32b6('bum): pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung dbog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i tshe/ bar chad
32b7('bum): de lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /
32b8('bum): lung dbog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / sgom pa'i tshe bdud sdig to can dag mdo sde zab mo zab mo gang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa
33a1('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan
33a2('bum): lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dag nye bar bsnyen par byed de/ de dag
33a3('bum): ni byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo thabs mkhas pas bdud kyis bsnyen pa'i mdo sde zab mo zab mo de dag la 'dod pa myi skyed do/ /rab 'byor de ci'i phyir
33a4('bum): zhe na/ de dag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed pa ma yin no/ /rab 'byor de la byang chub sems dpa' thabs myi mkhas pa dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo
33a5('bum): 'di thos nas spang bar sems te/ de la ngas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la thabs mkhas pa yang rgya cher bstan te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las kyang
33a6('bum): thabs mkhas pa rgya che bar btsal bar bya'o/ /rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bor
33a7('bum): zhing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag las thabs mkhas pa btsal bar sems dpa' yod na/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
33a8('bum): pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u sum cu rtsa gnyis so// //
33b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po gsum pa/ rab 'byor gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang /
33b2('bum): kha ton bya bar dga' la chos smra ba ni phyi shol byed na/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni/
33b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton bya bar phyi shol myi byed la/ chos nyan pa ni yul gzhan du 'gro na/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa'
33b4('bum): sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton bya bar 'dod la/ chos smra ba
33b5('bum): ni yul gzhan du 'gro na/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni khe dang bkur bsti dang / tshigs
33b6('bum): su bcad pa lhur len cing gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad lhur len la chos nyan pa ni 'dod pa nyung zhing chog shes la rab tu dben zhing brtson 'grus brtsams pa/
33b7('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa myi g.yeng ba sems rtse gcig tu 'dus pas shes rab dang ldan pa zhig ste/ khe dang bkur bstis 'jigs na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri
33b8('bum): ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen dang myi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang chos
34a1('bum): smra ba ni 'dod pa chung zhing chog shes la rab tu dben zhing brtson 'grus brtsams pa/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa myi g.yeng ba/ sems rtse gcig tu 'dus pa/ shes rab dang ldan pa zhig ste/ khe dang
34a2('bum): bkur bstis 'jigs la chos nyan pa ni 'dod pa che zhing sdig to 'dod la/ khe dang bkur bsti dang / tshigs su bcad pa lhur len cing / gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad
34a3('bum): lhur len na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen myi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
34a4('bum): pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni dgon pa pa/ bsod snyoms pa/ phyag dar khrod pa/ zas phyis myi len pa/ stan gcig pa/ ci thob pa'i bsod snyoms len
34a5('bum): pa/ dur khrod pa/ bla gab myed pa/ shing drung pa/ cog pu pa/ gzhi ji bzhin pa/ chos gos gsum par gyur la/ chos nyan pa ni dgon pa pa ma yin/ bsod snyoms pa ma yin/ phyag dar khrod pa
34a6('bum): ma yin/ zas phyis myi len pa ma yin/ stan cig pa ma yin/ ci thob pa'i bsod snyoms len pa ma yin/ dur khrod pa ma yin/ bla gab myed pa ma yin/ shing drung pa ma yin/ cog pu pa ma
34a7('bum): yin/ gzhi ji bzhin pa ma yin/ chos gos gsum pa ma yin na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen myi ldan pa ste/

34b2('bum): gos gsum par gyur la/ chos smra ba ni dgon pa pa ma yin/ bsod snyoms pa ma yin/ phyag dar khrod pa ma yin/ zas phyis myi len pa ma yin/ stan cig pa ma yin/ ci thob pa'i
34b3('bum): bsod snyoms len pa ma yin/ dur khrod pa ma yin/ bla gab myed pa ma yin/ shing drung pa ma yin/ cog pu pa ma yin/ gzhi ji bzhin pa ma yin/ chos gos gsum pa ma yin na/ rab

34b6('bum): kha ton byed par 'dod la/ chos smra ba ni ma dad pa/ tshul khrims ngan pa can/ sdig pa'i chos can zhig ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bri bar myi 'dod/ lung 'bog par myi 'dod/
34b7('bum): kha ton byed par myi 'dod na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen myi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa'

35a1('bum): par 'dod/ kha ton byed par 'dod la/ chos nyan pa ni ma dad na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed

35b7('bum): pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang / 'di ltar 'das pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / chos rmad du byung ba dang / rtogs pa

37a8('bum): bral the tsom dang bral la/ chos nyan pa ni 'dod pa'i sred pa dang bcas/ gnod sems dang snyom pa dang / gnyid dang / 'gyod pa dang bcas the tsom dang bcas par gyur na/ rab 'byor de yang shes

37b3('bum): sred pa dang bcas/ gnod sems dang / snyom pa dang / gnyid dang / 'gyod pa dang bcas/ the tsom dang bcas par gyur na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /
37b4('bum): lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen myi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab
37b5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / 'chang ba dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i tshe/ la la zhig der 'ongs te/ sems can
37b6('bum): dmyal ba'i myi snyan pa rjod/ byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / yi dags kyi yul gyi myi snyan pa rjod cing / sems can dmyal ba ni 'di ltar sdug bsngal lo/ /byol song gi
37b7('bum): skye gnas ni 'di ltar sdug bsngal lo/ /yi dags kyi yul ni 'di ltar sdug bsngal lo/ /khyod kyis sdug bsngal 'di nyid du mthar phyin par gyis shig /gang la sdug bsngal stong phrag mang po nyams su
37b8('bum): myong bar 'gyur bas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis khyod la ci zhig bya/ khyod yun ring por 'khor ba na 'khor bar gyur ta re zhes zer na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha
38a1('bum): rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen myi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig
38a2('bum): par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / 'chang ba dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i tshe/
38a3('bum): la la zhig der 'ongs te/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi legs pa brjod cing / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi legs pa rjod/ 'tshe ma'i lha rnams kyi legs pa rjod/ dga' ldan gyi lha
38a4('bum): rnams kyi legs pa rjod/ 'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyi legs pa rjod/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi legs pa rjod/ tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyi legs pa rjod/ tshangs lha nye phan gyi
38a5('bum): lha rnams kyi legs pa rjod/ tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams kyi legs pa rjod/ tshangs chen gyi lha rnams kyi legs pa rjod/ snang ba'i lha rnams kyi legs pa rjod/ chung snang gi lha rnams
38a6('bum): kyi legs pa rjod/ tshad myed snang ba'i lha rnams kyi legs pa rjod/ kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams kyi legs pa rjod/ dge ba'i lha rnams kyi legs pa rjod/ chung dge'i lha rnams kyi legs pa rjod/
38a7('bum): tshad myed dge ba'i lha rnams kyi legs pa rjod/ dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyi legs pa rjod/ che ba'i lha rnams kyi legs pa rjod/ chung che'i lha rnams kyi legs pa rjod/ tshad myed che ba'i lha rnams
38a8('bum): kyi legs pa rjod/ 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyi legs pa rjod/ myi che ba'i lha rnams kyi legs pa rjod/ myi gdung ba'i lha rnams kyi legs pa rjod/ shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams kyi legs
38b1('bum): pa rjod/ gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams kyi legs pa rjod/ 'og myin gyi lha rnams kyi legs pa rjod/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skyes mched kyi lha rnams kyi legs pa rjod/ rnam shes mtha' yas
38b2('bum): skye mched kyi lha rnams kyi legs pa rjod/ chung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams kyi legs pa rjod/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi lha rnams kyi legs pa rjod cing / 'dod pa'i
38b3('bum): khams ni 'dod pa la longs spyod pas 'di ltar bde'o/ /gzugs kyi khams ni bsam gtan dang snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'di ltar bde'o/ /gzugs myed pa'i khams ni snyoms par
38b4('bum): 'jug pa zhi ba rnams kyis 'di ltar bde ste/ de dag kyang myi rtag cing sdug bsngal la bdag myed pa'o/ /rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can zad pa'i chos can/ 'jigs pa'i chos can/ skye ba'i
38b5('bum): chos can/ 'gag pa'i chos can yin gyis/ khyod kyis 'di nyid du rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyis shig /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /
38b6('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyis shing / 'di nyid du rang byang chub thob par gyis shig /phyin chad 'khor ba na ma 'khor bar gyis shig ces zer na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
38b7('bum): phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen myi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /
38b8('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni gcig pu ste/ zla myed cing bdag gis byed pa yin la chos nyan pa ni 'khor gyi nang na gnas na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di
39a1('bum): 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen myi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor
39a2('bum): gzhan yang chos nyan pa gcig pu ste/ zla myed cing bdag gis byed pa yin la/ chos smra ba ni 'khor gyi nang na gnas na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri
39a3('bum): ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen myi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan
39a4('bum): yang chos smra ba ni gcig pu ste/ zla myed cing bdag gis byed pa yin la/ chos nyan pa ni tshogs yongs su sdud na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung
39a5('bum): 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen myi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang chos nyan
39a6('bum): pa ni gcig pu ste/ zla myed cing bdag gis byed pa yin la/ chos smra ba ni tshogs yongs su sdud na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa
39a7('bum): dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen myi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni 'di skad du/
39a8('bum): su nga'i phyi bzhin 'brang ba de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'drir sbyin no zhes zer la/ chos nyan pa ni phyi bzhin myi 'brang na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di
39b1('bum): 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen myi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor
39b2('bum): gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni chos smra ba'i phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'dod la chos smra ba ni drung du 'gro ba'i skabs myi 'byed na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /

39b4('bum): chos smra ba ni zang zing chung zad kyi phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'drir gzhug par 'dod/ klog tu gzhug par 'dod/ lung 'bog par 'dod/ kha ton byed tu gzhug par
39b5('bum): 'dod la/ chos nyan pa ni zang zing chung zad kyi phyir drung du 'gro bar ma mos na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed
39b6('bum): pa'i rgyu rkyen myi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni zang zing chung zad
39b7('bum): kyi phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bri bar 'dod/ klog par 'dod/ lung 'bog par 'dod/ bsgom par 'dod/ nyan par 'dod la chos smra ba ni zang zing
39b8('bum): chung zad kyi phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sbyin par myi 'dod/ 'drir gzhug par myi 'dod/ klog tu gzhug par myi 'dod/ lung 'bog par myi 'dod/ kha ton byed du gzhug par myi 'dod/
40a1('bum): sgom du gzhug par myi 'dod/ nyan du gzhug par myi 'dod na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen myi ldan pa ste/
40a2('bum): rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni gang du srog gi bar chad du 'gyur ba'i phyogs der 'gro bar
40a3('bum): 'dod la/ chos nyan pa ni der 'gro bar myi 'dod na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen myi ldan pa ste/
40a4('bum): rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni gang du srog gi bar chad du 'gyur ba'i phyogs der 'gro bar
40a5('bum): 'dod la/ chos smra ba ni der 'gro bar myi 'dod na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen myi ldan pa ste/
40a6('bum): rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni gang na zas dkon pa dang / gang na chu dkon pa'i phyogs
40a7('bum): der 'gro bar 'dod la/ chos nyan pa ni der 'gro bar myi 'dod na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen myi ldan
40a8('bum): pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' ches pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang chos nyan pa ni gang na zas dkon pa dang / chu dkon pa'i
40b1('bum): phyogs der 'gro bar 'dod la/ chos smra ba ni der 'gro bar myi 'dod na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen
40b2('bum): myi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang chos smra ba ni gang na zas mod pa dang / chu mod
40b3('bum): pa'i phyogs der 'gro bar 'dod la/ chos nyan pa yang rjes su 'brang na/ des de la 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod zang zing gi don tu song ste ji rung / legs par bsam pa sems par gyis shig /
40b4('bum): zas thob ma thob dang bsod myi bsod kyis 'gyod par gyur ta re zhes zer na/ de'i phyir chos ston pa des kyang / thabs phra mos chos la spang ba byas par 'gyur te/ de yang myi dga' zhing 'di
40b5('bum): snyam du 'du shes te/ 'di ni sbyin par 'dod pa'i mtshan ma ma yin gyi/ spong ba'i mtshan ma yin no snyam na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa
40b6('bum): dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen myi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' ches pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang dge slong chos smra ba ni
40b7('bum): gang na rkun po'i 'jigs pa dang / chom po'i 'jigs pa dang / rngon pa'i 'jigs pa dang / gcan zan khro bo'i 'jigs pa dang / sbrul gyi 'jigs pa dang / 'brog dgon pa'i 'jigs pa yod
40b8('bum): pa der 'gro bar 'dod la/ chos nyan pa dag kyang chos kyi don tu chos kyis skom zhing rjes su 'brang na/ dge slong chos smra bas chos nyan pa de dag la 'di skad smras te/ rigs kyi bu dag khyod gang na rkun
41a1('bum): po'i 'jigs pa dang / chom po'i 'jigs pa dang / rngon pa'i 'jigs pa dang / gcan zan khro bo'i 'jigs pa dang / sbrul gyi 'jig pa dang / 'brog dgon pa'i
41a2('bum): 'jigs pa yod pa der dong ste/ ji rung zhes de ltar dge slong chos smra ba des chos myi bstan pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'drir gzhug par myi 'dod/ klog tu
41a3('bum): gzhug par myi 'dod/ lung 'bog par myi 'dod/ kha ton byed du gzhug par myi 'dod/ nyan du gzhug par myi 'dod par gyur la/ de dag gis dge slong chos smra ba'i tshig de dag thos
41a4('bum): nas/ myi dga' zhing myi dga' ba'i tshul can du gyur te/ dge slong chos smra ba gang na ba der 'gro bar myi 'dod na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang /
41a5('bum): lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen myi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan
41a6('bum): yang dge slong chos smra ba ni bsod snyoms gtong ba'i grong khyer gtso bor byed par 'gyur te/ de bsod snyoms gtong ba'i grong khyer gtso bor gyur pas gsod snyoms gtong ba'i grong khyer de
41a7('bum): dag yang dang yang blta bar sems shing / der yang dang yang blta bas chos nyan pa zlog cing / tshe dang ldan pa dag ngas ni bsod snyoms gtong ba'i grong blta dgos te/ bsod snyoms
41a8('bum): gtong ba'i grong du 'gro dgos so zhes zer nas/ des chos nyan pa de dag phyir bzlog pas phyir 'dod na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog
41b1('bum): pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen myi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can
41b2('bum): dge slong gi cha byad du byas shing / ji nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di su yang 'dri bar myi 'gyur ba dang / lung 'bog par myi 'gyur ba dang / kha ton byed par myi 'gyur
41b3('bum): ba dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed par myi 'gyur ba de lta de ltar thabs sbyor ro/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
41b4('bum): to/ /bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du bdud sdig to can dag dge slong gi cha byad du bgyis shing / ji nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di su yang 'dri bar myi 'gyur ba dang / lung
41b5('bum): 'bog par myi 'gyur ba dang / kha ton byed par myi 'gyur ba dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid par myi 'gyur ba de lta de ltar thabs sbyor ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
41b6('bum): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la bdud sdig to can dag dge slong gi cha byad du byas shing / 'di skad du nged kyis ji ltar khong du chud pa 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yin te
41b7('bum): ji skad du khyed klog pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no zhes dben byed cing zlog la mos pa myed par byed do/ /rab 'byor de la bdud sdig to can gyis de ltar dbyen byas pa'i tshe/
41b8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' gang lung ma bstan pa de dag ni the tsom skye bar 'gyur te/ de dag the tsom du gyur nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di myi 'dri bar 'gyur/ myi klog par
42a1('bum): 'gyur/ lung myi 'bog par 'gyur/ kha ton myi byed par 'gyur/ myi sgom par 'gyur/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed par myi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi
42a2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen myi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig
42a3('bum): par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag dge slong gi cha byad du byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs shing 'di skad du/ byang chub
42a4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa de ni yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon tu byed par 'gyur te/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu
42a5('bum): 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /de ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /de ni rang byang chub 'thob
42a6('bum): par 'gyur ro zhes zer na/ des tshig de thos nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa
42a7('bum): dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen myi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab
42a8('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin zab mo 'di ston pa'i tshe/ bar chad du 'gyur ba'i bdud kyi las mang du 'byung ste/ bdud kyi las de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud
42b1('bum): kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rig par byas nas rnam par spang bar bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
42b2('bum): to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdud kyi las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rig par bgyi ste/ spang bar bgyi ba de dag gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
42b3('bum): rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ni bdud kyi las/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ni bdud kyi las/ rab 'byor brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
42b4('bum): gzugs brnyan ni bdud kyi las/ rab 'byor bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ni bdud kyi las/ rab 'byor tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ni bdud kyi
42b5('bum): las/ rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ni bdud kyi las te/ de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rig par bya ste/ rnam par spang bar bya'o/ /
42b6('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang nyan thos kyi theg pa dag ldan pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rig par bya ste rnam par
42b7('bum): spang bar bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa
42b8('bum): stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong
43a1('bum): pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong
43a2('bum): pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi
43a3('bum): dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam pa thar pa'i sgo
43a4('bum): stong pa nyid dang / rnam pa thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma myed pa dang / rnam pa thar pa'i sgo smon pa myed pa gang gis/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / lan cig
43a5('bum): phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub 'thob par 'gyur ba de dag kyang bdud sdig to can dag dge slong gi cha byed du byas shing /
43a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la nye bar snyen te/ de yang de la dga' ba skyed na/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa
43a7('bum): dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen myi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to
43a8('bum): can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du lus gser gyi kha dog dang / myi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / 'od 'dom gang ba dang ldan par byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems
43b1('bum): dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs te/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mos pa skyed do/ /des mos pa bskyed nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las yongs su nyams
43b2('bum): par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen myi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub
43b3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i mdun du sangs rgyas las stsogs
43b4('bum): pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun nye bar ston te/ des de la 'dod pa bskyed cing / bdag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
43b5('bum): rgyas 'di lta bur shog shig / ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa 'dis tshogs yongs su bsdus pa de bzhin du bdag gis kyang tshogs yongs su bsdu bar bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa
43b6('bum): 'dis chos ji ltar ston pa de bzhin du bdag gis kyang bstan par bya'o zhes de de la 'dod pa skyed pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su nyams par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab
43b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa'i rgyu rkyen myi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su
43b8('bum): rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag byang chub sems dpa' brgya phrag du ma/ byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag du ma/ byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong phrag du ma/ sbyin pa'i pha
44a1('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /
44a2('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de lta bu dag nye bar ston te/ de yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i de dag la 'dod
44a3('bum): pa skyed par 'gyur ro/ /des de dag la 'dod pa bskyed nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las yongs su nyams par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab
44a4('bum): mo 'di 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / sgom pa dang tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i rgyu rkyen myi ldan pa ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems
44a5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la gzugs myed do/ /tshor ba myed do/ /
44a6('bum): 'du shes myed do/ /'du byed myed do/ /rnam par shes pa myed do/ /myig myed do/ /rna ba myed do/ /sna myed do/ /lce myed do/ /lus myed do/ /yid myed do/ /gzugs myed do/ /
44a7('bum): sgra myed do/ /dri myed do/ /ro myed do/ /reg myed do/ /chos myed do/ /myig gi rnam par shes pa myed do/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa myed do/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa myed do/ /
44a8('bum): lce'i rnam pa shes pa myed do/ /lus kyi rnam pa shes pa myed do/ /yid kyi rnam pa shes pa myed do/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa myed do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa myed do/ /sna'i
44b1('bum): 'dus te reg pa myed do/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa myed do/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa myed do/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa myed do/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed do/ /
44b2('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed do/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed do/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed do/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg
44b3('bum): pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed do/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myed do/ /sa'i khams myed do/ /chu'i khams myed do/ /mye'i khams myed do/ /rlung gi khams myed do/ /
44b4('bum): nam mkha'i khams myed do/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams myed do/ /ma rig pa myed do/ /'du byed myed do/ /rnam par shes pa myed do/ /mying dang gzugs myed do/ /skye mched drug
44b5('bum): myed do/ /reg pa myed do/ /tshor ba myed do/ /sred pa myed do/ /len pa myed do/ /srid pa myed do/ /skye ba myed do/ /rga shi myed do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /tshul khrims
44b6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
44b7('bum): myed do/ /nang stong pa nyid myed do/ /phyi stong pa nyid myed do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid myed do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myed do/ /chen po stong pa nyid myed do/ /don dam stong pa nyid myed do/ /'dus byas
44b8('bum): stong pa nyid myed do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid myed do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid myed do/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid myed do/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid myed do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid myed do/ /
45a1('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid myed do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myed do/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myed do/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid myed do/ /ngo bo nyid stong
45a2('bum): pa nyid myed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams myed do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams myed do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
45a3('bum): myed do/ /dbang po rnams myed do/ /stobs rnams myed do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams myed do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myed do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa
45a4('bum): rnams myed do/ /bsam gtan rnams myed do/ /tshad myed pa rnams myed do/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams myed do/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad myed do/ /mthar
45a5('bum): kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu myed do/ /rnam pa thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa myed do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams
45a6('bum): myed do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams myed do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams myed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu myed do/ /myi 'jigs pa bzhi myed do/ /so so yang dag
45a7('bum): par rig pa bzhi myed do/ /byams pa chen po myed do/ /snying rje chen po myed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad myed do/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu
45a8('bum): myed do/ /len cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myed do/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myed do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid myed do/ /rang byang chub myed do/ /thams cad shes pa nyid
45b1('bum): myed do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid myed do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid myed do/ /rab 'byor gang la gzugs myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do/ /byang chub sems dpa'
45b2('bum): myed do/ /rang sangs myed do/ /nyan thos myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /gang la tshor ba myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do/ /
45b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /rang sangs rgyas myed do/ /nyan thos myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ /rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /gang la 'du shes myed
45b4('bum): pa de la sangs rgyas myed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /rang sangs rgyas myed do/ /nyan thos myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ /rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis
45b5('bum): stong ngo / /gang la 'di byed myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /rang sangs rgyas myed do/ /nyan thos myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor
45b6('bum): chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /gang la rnam par shes pa myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /rang sangs rgyas myed do/ /nyan thos
45b7('bum): myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /gang la myig myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /rang
45b8('bum): sangs rgyas myed do/ /nyan thos myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /gang la rna ba myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do/ /byang chub
46a1('bum): sems dpa' myed do/ /rang sangs rgyas myed do/ /nyan thos myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /gang la sna myed pa de la sangs
46a2('bum): rgyas myed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /rang sangs rgyas myed do/ /nyan thos myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /gang la lce myed pa

46a4('bum): lus myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /rang sangs rgyas myed do/ /nyan thos myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /
46a5('bum): gang la yid myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /rang sangs rgyas myed do/ /nyan thos myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /
46a6('bum): gang la gzugs myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /rang sangs rgyas myed do/ /nyan thos myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin
46a7('bum): gyis stong ngo / /gang la sgra myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /rang sangs rgyas myed do/ /nyan thos myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang
46a8('bum): bzhin gyis stong ngo / /gang la dri myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /rang sangs rgyas myed do/ /nyan thos myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad
46b1('bum): ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /gang la ro myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /rang sangs rgyas myed do/ /nyan thos myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos
46b2('bum): thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /gang la reg myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /rang sangs rgyas myed do/ /nyan thos myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/

46b4('bum): phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /gang la myig gi rnam par shes pa myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /rang sangs rgyas
46b5('bum): myed do/ /nyan thos myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /gang la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do/ /byang chub sems dpa'

46b8('bum): de la sangs rgyas myed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /rang sangs rgyas myed do/ /nyan thos myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /gang la lus kyi
47a1('bum): rnam par shes pa myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /rang sangs rgyas myed do/ /nyan thos myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad

47a4('bum): nyan thos myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /gang la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do/ /byang chub sems dpa'

47b8('bum): ba myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /rang sangs rgyas myed do/ /nyan thos myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis

48b8('bum): gang la tshor ba myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /rang sangs rgyas myed do/ /nyan thos myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin
49a1('bum): gyis stong ngo / /gang la sred pa myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /rang sangs rgyas myed do/ /nyan thos myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos
49a2('bum): thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /gang la len pa myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /rang sangs rgyas myed do/ /nyan thos myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
49a3('bum): rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /gang la srid pa myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /rang sangs rgyas myed do/ /nyan thos myed do/ /
49a4('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /gang la skye ba myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /rang sangs rgyas myed do/ /nyan thos myed
49a5('bum): do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /gang la rga shi myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /rang sangs rgyas myed do/ /nyan thos myed do/ /
49a6('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /gang la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /rang sangs rgyas myed do/ /nyan thos myed
49a7('bum): do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /gang la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /rang sangs rgyas myed do/ /
49a8('bum): nyan thos myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /gang la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /rang sangs rgyas
49b1('bum): myed do/ /nyan thos myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /gang la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' myed
49b2('bum): do/ /rang sangs rgyas myed do/ /nyan thos myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /gang la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do/ /

49b4('bum): sangs rgyas myed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /rang sangs rgyas myed do/ /nyan thos myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /gang la nang
49b5('bum): stong pa nyid myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /rang sangs rgyas myed do/ /nyan thos myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis
49b6('bum): stong ngo / /gang la phyi stong pa nyid myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /rang sangs rgyas myed do/ /nyan thos myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos
49b7('bum): thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /gang la phyi nang stong pa nyid myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /rang sangs rgyas myed do/ /nyan thos myed do/ /
49b8('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /gang la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do/ /byang chub sems dpa'
50a1('bum): myed do/ /rang sangs rgyas myed do/ /nyan thos myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /gang la chen
50a2('bum): po stong pa nyid myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /rang sangs rgyas myed do/ /nyan thos myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad
50a3('bum): ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /gang la don dam pa stong pa nyid myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /rang sangs rgyas myed do/ /nyan thos myed do/ /

51a1('bum): bzhin gyis stong ngo / /gang la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /rang sangs rgyas myed do/ /nyan thos myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams
51a2('bum): cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /gang la dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /rang sangs rgyas myed do/ /nyan thos myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab

51b7('bum): par thar pa brgyad myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /rang sangs rgyas myed do/ /nyan thos myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong

52a1('bum): chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /gang la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /

52a8('bum): par rig pa rnams myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /rang sangs rgyas myed do/ /nyan thos myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /gang la

52b3('bum): rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /gang la rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /rang sangs rgyas myed do/ /nyan thos myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor

52b8('bum): myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /gang la bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub myed pa de la sangs rgyas myed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /
53a1('bum): rang sangs rgyas myed do/ /nyan thos myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bzhi pa/
53a2('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bar chad du 'gyur ba mang ste/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / lung
53a3('bum): 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / ston pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag la yang bar chad du 'gyur ba mang ngo / /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'di rin po che gser dang /
53a4('bum): nor bu dang / mu tig dang / be dur+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / dngul dang / sa le sbram gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag ni bar chad du 'gyur ba mang zhing phyir rgol ba mang ba dag go/ /rab 'byor
53a5('bum): de bzhin du rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / ston pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa
53a6('bum): de dag la yang bdud kyi las mang po 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /bar chad mang po 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /phyir rgol ba mang po 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni de
53a7('bum): bzhin te/ bde bar gshegs pa de ni de bzhin te/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'di rin po che gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / be dur+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / dngul dang / sa le sbram
53a8('bum): gang ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag ni bar chad du 'gyur ba mang zhing slar rgol ba mang ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
53b1('bum): zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / ston pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag la yang bdud kyi las mang po 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /bar chad mang po
53b2('bum): 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /slar rgol ba mang po 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das skyes bu glen pa gang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di
53b3('bum): 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton bgyid pa dang / ston pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa dag gi bar chad bgyid pa ni bdud kyi byin kyis brlabs pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das
53b4('bum): skyes bu glen pa de dag ni blo chung zhing blo zhan par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das skyes bu glen pa gang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang /
53b5('bum): lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton bgyid pa dang / ston pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag gi bar chad bgyid pa de dag ni blo rgya shin tu chung bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rlabs po che dag la de dag
53b6('bum): gi sems myi 'jug go/ /de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di myi 'dri myi klog /lung myi 'bog /kha ton myi bgyid/ /tshul bzhin du yid la myi bgyid de/ gzhan 'dri zhing klog pa
53b7('bum): dang / kha ton bgyid pa dang / ston pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa dag la yang bar chad bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/
53b8('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di myi 'dri myi klog /lung myi 'bog /kha ton myi byed/ myi sgom/ tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing / gzhan 'dri ba dang /
54a1('bum): klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / ston pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dag gi bar chad byed pa de dag ni bdud kyi byin gyis brlabs pa ste/ theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa
54a2('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu chung ba/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bsgrubs pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su ma zin pa sha stag 'byung ste/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs
54a3('bum): kyi bu mo de dag ni blo chung zhing blo zhan par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di myi 'dri/ myi klog /lung myi 'bog /kha ton myi byed/ myi sgom/ tshul bzhin du yid
54a4('bum): la myi byed cing / gzhan 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / ston pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dag gi bar chad byed pa dag ni blo rgya shin tu chung bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas
54a5('bum): kyi chos rlabs po che dag la de dag gi sems myi 'jug go/ /rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / ston pa dang / tshul
54a6('bum): bzhin du yid la byed pa dag la bdud kyi las 'di dag kyang 'byung mod kyi 'on kyang / rab 'byor rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri zhing klog pa dang /
54a7('bum): lung 'bog cing kha ton byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing / gong du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par
54a8('bum): byed pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed
54b1('bum): pa dang / gong du nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su
54b2('bum): rdzogs par byed pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / 'dus
54b3('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / dor ba
54b4('bum): myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
54b5('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par
54b6('bum): byed pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / gong du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su rdzogs par
54b7('bum): byed pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / dbang po rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / stobs rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag
54b8('bum): rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / gong du 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / bsam
55a1('bum): gtan rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / tshad myed pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /
55a2('bum): rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang /
55a3('bum): smon pa myed pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs
55a4('bum): par byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / myi 'jigs pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su rdzogs
55a5('bum): par byed pa dang / snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /
55a6('bum): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed na/ rab 'byor de ni sangs rgyas kyi mthu yin par shes par bya ste/ des rigs
55a7('bum): kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri'o/ /klog go/ /lung 'bog go/ /kha ton byed do/ /tshul bzhin du yid la byed do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di
55a8('bum): nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /gong du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu
55b1('bum): phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /gong du nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs
55b2('bum): par byed do/ /phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs
55b3('bum): par byed do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mtha' las 'das
55b4('bum): pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid
55b5('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs
55b6('bum): par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /
55b7('bum): gong du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /dbang po rnams
55b8('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /stobs rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs
56a1('bum): par byed do/ /gong du 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /bsam gtan rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /tshad myed pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /
56a2('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs
56a3('bum): su rdzogs par byed do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /
56a4('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /myi 'jigs pa rnams yongs
56a5('bum): su rdzogs par byed do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par
56a6('bum): byed do/ /thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /shar phyogs
56a7('bum): kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag kyang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bri ba dang / klag pa dang / lung
56a8('bum): 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / ston pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bya ba'i phyir dgongs pa mdzad do/ /lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag
56b1('bum): kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'bri ba dang / klag pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton bya ba dang / bstan pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bya ba'i
56b2('bum): phyir dgongs pa mdzad do/ /nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag kyang / rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
56b3('bum): pa 'di bri ba dang / klag pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton bya ba dang / bstan pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bya ba'i phyir dgongs pa mdzad do/ /byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed
56b4('bum): cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag kyang / rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bri ba dang / klag pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton bya ba dang / bstan pa dang /
56b5('bum): tshul bzhin du yid la bya ba'i phyir dgongs pa mdzad do/ /byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag kyang / rigs kyi bu dang
56b6('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bri ba dang / klag pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton bya ba dang / bstan pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bya ba'i phyir dgongs pa mdzad do/ /shar
56b7('bum): lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag kyang / rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bri ba dang /
56b8('bum): klag pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton bya ba dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bya ba'i phyir dgongs pa mdzad do/ /lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed
57a1('bum): cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag kyang / rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bri ba dang / klag pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton bya ba dang / bstan
57a2('bum): pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bya ba'i phyir dgongs pa mdzad do/ /nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag kyang / rigs kyi bu dang rigs
57a3('bum): kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bri ba dang / klag pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton bya ba dang / bstan pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bya ba'i phyir dgongs pa mdzad do/ /'og gi phyogs
57a4('bum): kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag kyang / rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bri ba dang / klag pa dang / lung 'bog pa
57a5('bum): dang / kha ton bya ba dang / bstan pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bya ba'i phyir dgongs pa mdzad do/ /steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag kyang / rigs
57a6('bum): kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bri ba dang / klag pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton bya ba dang / bstan pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bya ba'i phyir dgongs pa mdzad do/ /shar
57a7('bum): phyogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir myi ldog pa gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang / rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri zhing / klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang /
57a8('bum): kha ton byed pa dang / ston pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag gi don tu brtson par byed cing yongs su 'dzin par byed do/ /lho phyogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir myi ldog pa
57b1('bum): gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang / rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri zhing / klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / bsten pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de
57b2('bum): dag gi don tu brtson par byed cing yongs su 'dzin par byed do/ /nub phyogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir myi ldog pa gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang / rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes
57b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri zhing / klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / ston pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag gi don tu brtson par byed cing yongs su 'dzin par byed do/ /
57b4('bum): byang phyogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir myi ldog pa gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang / rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri zhing klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang /
57b5('bum): kha ton byed pa dang / ston pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag gi don tu brtson par byed cing yongs su 'dzin par byed do/ /byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir
57b6('bum): myi ldog pa gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri zhing klog pa dang lung 'bog pa dang kha ton byed pa dang / ston pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag gi don
57b7('bum): tu brtson par byed cing yongs su 'dzin par byed do/ /shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir myi ldog pa gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab
57b8('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri zhing klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / ston pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag gi don tu brtson par byed cing yongs su 'dzin par byed do/ /lho nub kyi
58a1('bum): phyogs mtshams kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir myi ldog pa gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri zhing klog pa dang / lung
58a2('bum): 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / ston pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag gi don tu brtson par byed cing yongs su 'dzin par byed do/ /nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems
58a3('bum): dpa' chen po phyir myi ldog pa gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri zhing klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / ston pa dang / tshul bzhin du
58a4('bum): yid la byed pa de dag gi don tu brtson par byed cing yongs su 'dzin par byed do/ /'og gi phyogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir myi ldog pa gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu
58a5('bum): mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri zhing klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / ston pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag gi don tu brtson par byed cing yongs su 'dzin par byed do/ /steng gi
58a6('bum): phyogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir myi ldog pa gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang / rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri zhing / klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang /
58a7('bum): kha ton byed pa dang / ston pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag gi don tu brtson par byed cing yongs su 'dzin par byed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ bud myed la la zhig la bu lnga 'am/ bcu 'am nyi
58a8('bum): shu 'am/ sum cu 'am/ bzhi bcu 'am/ lnga bcu 'am/ brgya 'am/ stong zhig yod na/ de dag gi ma de ci nas kyang myi na bar bya ba'i phyir brtson par byed cing / bdag cag gi ma 'di ji ltar na nad myed par 'gyur/ bdag
58b1('bum): cag gi ma 'di la ji ltar na bar chad du myi 'gyur/ bdag cag gi ma 'di ji ltar na ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur/ bdag cag gi ma 'di ring du 'tsho bar bya na ji ltar bya/ bdag cag gi ma 'di lus la myi bde ba'i nyams
58b2('bum): myed par bya na ji ltar na/ 'di ni bdag cag skyed skyed pa ste/ srog gi sbyin bdag go zhes de dag ma de la rim gro legs par bya bas rim gro byed do/ /de dag ni 'di'i srog gi bar chad du gyur du 'ong ngo / /lus nyams
58b3('bum): chung bar gyur du 'ong ngo / /lus la sha sbrang dang / sbrang bu dang / sbrul gyis gtse ba'i myi bde bas bab tu 'ong ngo / /tsha ba dang / grang ba dang / bkres pa dang / skom pas myi bde bar 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes phu dud legs par bya
58b4('bum): bas phu dud du byed do/ /de ltar bu de dag ma de la 'di ni bdag cag skyed skyed pa'o/ /'di ni 'jig rten 'di ston pa'o zhes bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rgyun tu rim gro byed cing / sti stang dang / bkur sti cher byed do/ /
58b5('bum): rab 'byor de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rtag tu rgyun myi 'chad pa gzigs shing
58b6('bum): dgongs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bdag cag gi sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad skyed skyed pa'o/ /'jig rten 'di ston ston pa'o zhes rgyun tu gzigs shing dgongs so/ /shar
58b7('bum): phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i
58b8('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rtag tu rgyun myi 'chad par gzigs shing dgongs so/ /lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
59a1('bum): gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom
59a2('bum): ldan 'das de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rtag tu rgyun myi 'chad par gzigs shing dgongs so/ /nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye
59a3('bum): ma snyed na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang shes rab kyi
59a4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rtag tu rgyun myi 'chad par gzigs shing dgongs so/ /byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
59a5('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la sangs
