84a1('bum): chod pa'i mtshan nyid de/ de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid myed par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /byams pa chen po ni phan pa sgrub
84a2('bum): pa'i mtshan nyid de/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid myed par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /snying rje chen po ni skyob pa'i mtshan nyid de/ de ni de bzhin
84a3('bum): gshegs pas mtshan nyid myed par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /dga' ba chen po ni rab tu dga' ba'i mtshan nyid de/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid
84a4('bum): myed par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /btang snyoms chen po ni ma 'dres pa'i mtshan nyid de/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid myed par mngon par
84a5('bum): rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni myi 'phrogs pa'i mtshan nyid de/ de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid myed par
84a6('bum): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes ni mngon sum gyi mtshan nyid de/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid myed par
84a7('bum): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /lha'i bu dag de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mtshan nyid myed par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas
84a8('bum): de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa ni chags pa myi mnga' ba'i ye shes can zhes bya'o/ / //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/
84b1('bum): bam po drug pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de
84b2('bum): bzhin gshegs pa skyed pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'jig rten 'di ston pa'o/ /de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
84b3('bum): sangs rgyas ni/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos 'di la rten cing rnam par spyod do/ /chos de la rim gror mdzad cing / mchod pa mdzad do/ /
84b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rim gro mdzad pa dang / bkur sti mdzad pa dang / phu dud mdzad pa dang / mchod pa mdzad pa de ni
84b5('bum): chos dang ldan pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las byung ste/ rab 'byor de bzhin
84b6('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni byas pa mkhyen pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
84b7('bum): ni byas pa dgongs pa'o/ /rab 'byor gang la la zhig yang dag par smra bas byas pa shes shing / byas pa dran pa'o/ /zhes smra na/ de bzhin gshegs
84b8('bum): pa la byas pa mkhyen cing byas pa dgongs pa'o/ /zhes yang dag par smra bas yang dag par smra'o/ /rab 'byor ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa byas pa mkhyen
85a1('bum): cing byas pa dgongs pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas theg pa gang gis byon pa dang /
85a2('bum): lam gang gis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur pa'i theg pa de nyid dang / lam de nyid la de bzhin
85a3('bum): gshegs pa rim gro mdzad pa dang / bkur sti mdzad pa dang / phu dud du mdzad pa dang / mchod pa mdzad pa dang / yongs su srung ba mdzad pa'i phyir te/
85a4('bum): rab 'byor de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byas pa mkhyen pa dang / byas pa dgongs par blta'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas/ chos thams
85a5('bum): cad mtshan ma myed pa la brten te/ byed pa po myed pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad ma byas par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /lus myed
85a6('bum): pa'i phyir/ ma byas pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /rab 'byor de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten
85a7('bum): te/ chos thams cad la bya ba myed par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byas pa mkhyen pa dang / byas pa dgongs pa'o/ /
85a8('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes byas pa myed pa
85b1('bum): chos thams cad la 'jug pa myed pa'i brdas 'jug ste/ rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa skyed pa'o/ /
85b2('bum): 'jig rten 'di ston pa'o/ /rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar chos thams cad la shes pa po ma mchis shing / mthong ba po ma mchis
85b3('bum): na ji ltar na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa skyed cing / 'jig rten 'di ston pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
85b4('bum): rab 'byor de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ chos thams cad ni shes pa po myed cing mthong ba po myed pa'o/ /rab 'byor chos thams cad ni stong pa gsog
85b5('bum): gsob dbang myed pa snying po myed pa ste/ rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/ chos thams cad ni shes pa po myed cing mthong ba po myed pa'o/ /rab 'byor
85b6('bum): gzhan yang chos thams cad ni shes pa po myed cing mthong ba po myed pa ste/ rab 'byor ji ltar na/ chos thams cad shes pa po myed cing mthong ba po myed pa yin
85b7('bum): zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni myi gnas shing khongs su chud pa ma yin pa ste/ rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/ chos thams cad shes pa po myed cing
85b8('bum): mthong ba po myed pa ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa skyed cing 'jig rten ston pa'o/ /de yang gzugs mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /tshor ba mthong ba myed pa'i phyir
86a1('bum): ston pa'o/ /'du shes mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /'du byed mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /rnam par shes pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /myig mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /
86a2('bum): rna ba mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /sna mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /lce mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /lus mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /yid mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /gzugs
86a3('bum): mthong ba myed pa'i ston pa'o/ /sgra mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /dri mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /ro mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /reg mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /chos mthong ba myed pa'i
86a4('bum): phyir ston pa'o/ /myig gi rnam par shes pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /lce'i rnam
86a5('bum): par shes pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa mthong ba myed
86a6('bum): pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /lus kyi
86a7('bum): 'dus te reg pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i
86a8('bum): rkyen kyis tshor ba mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /lus kyi
86b1('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /sa'i khams mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /chu'i khams
86b2('bum): mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /mye'i khams mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /rlung gi khams mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam mkha'i khams mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /rnam par shes
86b3('bum): pa'i khams mthong ba myed pa'i ston pa'o/ /ma rig pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /'du byed mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /rnam par shes pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /mying dang
86b4('bum): gzugs mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /skye mched drug mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /reg pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /tshor ba mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /sred pa mthong ba myed
86b5('bum): pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /len pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /srid pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /skye ba mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /rga shi mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /sbyin pa'i
86b6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
86b7('bum): phyin pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nang stong pa nyid mthong ba myed
86b8('bum): pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /phyi stong pa nyid mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /chen po stong pa nyid
87a1('bum): mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mthong ba myed
87a2('bum): pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /
87a3('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid
87a4('bum): mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mthong ba myed pa'i phyir
87a5('bum): ston pa'o/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /dbang po
87a6('bum): rnams mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /stobs rnams mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mthong
87a7('bum): ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /bsam gtan rnams mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /tshad myed pa rnams mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /
87a8('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mthong ba myed pa'i
87b1('bum): phyir ston pa'o/ /stong pa nyid mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /mtshan ma myed pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /smon pa myed pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /mngon par shes pa rnams mthong ba myed
87b2('bum): pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa stobs bcu mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /
87b3('bum): myi 'jigs pa bzhi mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /snying rje chen po mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
87b4('bum): brgyad mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
87b5('bum): mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /dgra bcom pa nyid mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /rang byang chub mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /
87b6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa skyed cing 'jig rten ston pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji
87b7('bum): ltar na gzugs mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na tshor ba mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na 'du shes mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/
87b8('bum): ji ltar na 'du byed mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na rnam par shes pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na myig mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/
88a1('bum): ji ltar na rna ba mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na sna mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na lce mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar
88a2('bum): na lus mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na yid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na gzugs mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na sgra
88a3('bum): mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na dri mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na ro mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na reg mthong ba ma mchis
88a4('bum): pa'i slad du ston lags/ ji ltar na chos mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na myig gi rnam par shes pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na rna ba'i rnam par
88a5('bum): shes pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na sna'i rnam par shes pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na lce'i rnam par shes pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston
88a6('bum): pa lags/ ji ltar na lus kyi rnam par shes pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na yid kyi rnam par shes pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na myig gi 'dus te
88a7('bum): reg pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na sna'i 'dus te reg pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston
88a8('bum): pa lags/ ji ltar na lce'i 'dus te reg pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na yid kyi 'dus te reg
88b1('bum): pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mthong
88b2('bum): ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis mthong ba ma mchis
88b3('bum): pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mthong ba ma mchis pa'i
88b4('bum): slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na sa'i khams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na chu'i khams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na mye'i khams mthong ba ma mchis
88b5('bum): pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na rlung gi khams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na nam mkha'i khams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na rnam par shes
88b6('bum): pa'i khams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na ma rig pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na 'du byed mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na
88b7('bum): rnam par shes pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na mying dang gzugs mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na skye mched drug mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa
88b8('bum): lags/ ji ltar na reg pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na tshor ba mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na sred pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa
89a1('bum): lags/ ji ltar na len pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na srid pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na skye ba mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston
89a2('bum): pa lags/ ji ltar na rga shi mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston lags/ ji ltar na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
89a3('bum): mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du
89a4('bum): ston pa lags/ ji ltar na bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar
89a5('bum): na nang stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na phyi stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na phyi nang stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa
89a6('bum): lags/ ji ltar na stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na chen po stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na don dam pa stong pa nyid
89a7('bum): mthong ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na 'dus byas stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du
89a8('bum): ston pa lags/ ji ltar na mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa
89b1('bum): lags/ ji ltar na dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na rang bzhin stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na chos thams cad
89b2('bum): stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i
89b3('bum): slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na
89b4('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na yang dag
89b5('bum): par spong ba rnams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na dbang po rnams mthong ba ma mchis
89b6('bum): pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na stobs rnams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na
89b7('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na bsam gtan
89b8('bum): rnams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na tshad myed pa rnams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mthong ba
90a1('bum): ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na rnam par thar pa brgyad mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mthong
90a2('bum): ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na stong pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na mtshan ma myed pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na
90a3('bum): smon pa myed pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na mngon par shes pa rnams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na ting nge 'dzin rnams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i
90a4('bum): slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na gzungs kyi sgo rnams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/
90a5('bum): ji ltar na myi 'jigs pa bzhi mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na snying rje chen po mthong ba ma
90a6('bum): mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad
90a7('bum): du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar
90a8('bum): na dgra bcom pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na rang byang chub mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis
90b1('bum): pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ ji ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nam gzugs la dmyigs
90b2('bum): pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ gzugs mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam tshor ba la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ tshor ba mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam 'du
90b3('bum): shes la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ 'du shes mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam 'du byed la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ 'du byed mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston
90b4('bum): pa'o/ /nam rnam par shes pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam myig la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ myig
90b5('bum): mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam rna ba la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ rna ba mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam sna la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/
90b6('bum): sna mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam lce la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ lce mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam lus la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/
90b7('bum): lus mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam yid la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ yid mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam gzugs la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi
90b8('bum): 'byung ba'i tshe/ gzugs mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam sgra dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ sgra mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam dri dmyigs pa'i rnam par
91a1('bum): shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ dri mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam ro la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ ro mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam reg la dmyigs pa'i rnam
91a2('bum): par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ reg mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam chos la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ chos mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam myig gi rnam par shes
91a3('bum): pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ myig gi rnam par shes pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ rna ba'i
91a4('bum): rnam par shes pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam sna'i rnam par shes pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ sna'i rnam par shes pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam lce'i rnam
91a5('bum): par shes pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ lce'i rnam par shes pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam lus kyi rnam par shes pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i
91a6('bum): tshe/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam yid kyi rnam par shes pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston
91a7('bum): pa'o/ /nam myig gi 'dus te reg pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes
91a8('bum): pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam sna'i 'dus te reg pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir
91b1('bum): ston pa'o/ /nam lce'i 'dus te reg pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par
91b2('bum): shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mthong ba
91b3('bum): myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /
91b4('bum): nam rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
91b5('bum): kyis tshor ba la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la dmyigs pa'i rnam
91b6('bum): par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/
91b7('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis
91b8('bum): tshor ba mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam sa'i khams la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ sa'i khams mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam chu'i khams la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes
92a1('bum): pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ chu'i khams mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam mye'i khams la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ mye'i khams mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam rlung
92a2('bum): gi khams la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ rlung gi khams mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam nam mkha'i khams la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ nam mkha'i khams
92a3('bum): mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam rnam par shes pa'i khams la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa'i khams mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam ma rig pa dmyigs
92a4('bum): pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ ma rig pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam 'du byed la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ 'du byed mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam rnam
92a5('bum): par shes pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam mying dang gzugs la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ mying dang
92a6('bum): gzugs mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam skye mched drug la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ skye mched drug mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam reg pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes
92a7('bum): pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ reg pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam tshor ba la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ tshor ba mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam sred pa la dmyigs pa'i
92a8('bum): rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ sred pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam len pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ len pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam srid pa la
92b1('bum): dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ srid pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam skye ba la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ skye ba mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /
92b2('bum): nam rga shi la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ rga shi mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
92b3('bum): phyin pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam
92b4('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dmyigs pa'i
92b5('bum): rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ bsam
92b6('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir
92b7('bum): ston pa'o/ /nam nang stong pa nyid la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ nang stong pa nyid mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam phyi stong pa nyid la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/
92b8('bum): phyi stong pa nyid mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam phyi nang stong pa nyid la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ phyi nang stong pa nyid mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam stong pa nyid stong pa
93a1('bum): nyid la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam chen po stong pa nyid la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ chen po
93a2('bum): stong pa nyid mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam don dam pa stong pa nyid la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ don dam pa stong pa nyid mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam 'dus byas stong pa
93a3('bum): nyid la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ 'dus
93a4('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /
93a5('bum): nam thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa'i stong pa nyid mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la dmyigs
93a6('bum): pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam rang bzhin stong pa nyid la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid
93a7('bum): mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam rang gi mtshan
93a8('bum): nyid stong pa nyid la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi
93b1('bum): 'byung ba'i tshe/ myi dmyigs pa'i stong pa nyid mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid mthong ba
93b2('bum): myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid
93b3('bum): stong pa nyid la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes
93b4('bum): pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam yang dag par spong ba la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ yang dag par spong ba rnams
93b5('bum): mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam dbang po la dmyigs
93b6('bum): pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ dbang po rnams mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam stobs la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ stobs rnams mthong ba myed pa'i phyir
93b7('bum): ston pa'o/ /nam byang chub kyi yan lag la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
93b8('bum): brgyad pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam 'phags pa'i bden pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes
94a1('bum): pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam bsam gtan la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ bsam gtan rnams
94a2('bum): mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam tshad myed pa rnams la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ tshad myed pa rnams mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam gzugs myed pa'i snyoms
94a3('bum): par 'jug pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam rnam par thar pa brgyad la dmyigs pa'i rnam
94a4('bum): par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ rnam par thar pa brgyad mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/
94a5('bum): mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes
94a6('bum): pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam mngon par shes pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi
94a7('bum): 'byung ba'i tshe/ mngon par shes pa rnams mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam ting nge 'dzin la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ ting nge 'dzin rnams mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston
94a8('bum): pa'o/ /nam gzungs kyi sgo la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la dmyigs pa'i
94b1('bum): rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam myi 'jigs pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ myi 'jigs pa rnams mthong
94b2('bum): ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam so so yang dag par rig pa la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam snying rje chen po la
94b3('bum): dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ snying rje chen po mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ sangs
94b4('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mthong ba myed pa'i
94b5('bum): phyir ston pa'o/ /nam lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras
94b6('bum): bu la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /dgra bcom pa nyid la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ dgra bcom pa
94b7('bum): nyid mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam rang byang chub la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ rang byang chub mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid la dmyigs
94b8('bum): pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/ lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dmyigs pa'i rnam par shes pa myi 'byung ba'i tshe/
95a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mthong ba myed pa'i phyir ston pa'o/ /rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di de bzhin gshegs pa skyed cing 'jig rten ston pa'o/ /rab 'byor
95a2('bum): gzhan yang ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa skyed cing 'jig rten ston pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'jig rten du stong pa zhes rjod de/ 'jig rten du ci
95a3('bum): stong pa zhes rjod ce na/ gzugs stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /tshor ba stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /'du shes stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /'du byed stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten
95a4('bum): du rjod do/ /rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /myig stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /rna ba stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /sna stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod
95a5('bum): do/ /lce stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /lus stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /yid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /gzugs stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /
95a6('bum): sgra stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /dri stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /ro stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /reg stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /chos stong ngo zhes bya bar
95a7('bum): 'jig rten du rjod do/ /myig gi rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig
95a8('bum): rten du rjod do/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du
95b1('bum): rjod do/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /lce'i 'dus
95b2('bum): te reg pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i
95b3('bum): rkyen kyis tshor ba stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /
95b4('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis
95b5('bum): tshor ba stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /sa'i khams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /chu'i khams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /mye'i khams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du
95b6('bum): rjod do/ /rlung gi khams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /nam mkha'i khams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /
95b7('bum): ma rig pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /'du byed stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /mying dang gzugs stong ngo zhes bya bar
95b8('bum): 'jig rten du rjod do/ /skye mched drug stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten tu rjod do/ /reg pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /tshor ba stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /sred pa stong ngo
96a1('bum): zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /len pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /srid pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /skye ba stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /rga shi
96a2('bum): stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol
96a3('bum): tu phyin pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du
96a4('bum): rjod do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /nang stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /phyi stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du
96a5('bum): rjod do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /chen po stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten
96a6('bum): du rjod do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong
96a7('bum): ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /
96a8('bum): dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /rang gi mtshan
96b1('bum): nyid stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /ngo bo nyid
96b2('bum): stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /
96b3('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /dbang po rnams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /stobs
96b4('bum): rnams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /
96b5('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /bsam gtan rnams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /tshad myed pa rnams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /gzugs
96b6('bum): myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu stong ngo
96b7('bum): zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams stong ngo zhes bya bar
96b8('bum): 'jig rten du rjod do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu stong ngo zhes bya bar
97a1('bum): 'jig rten du rjod do/ /myi 'jigs pa bzhi stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /byams pa chen po stong
97a2('bum): ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /snying rje chen po stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras
97a3('bum): bu stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /dgra bcom
97a4('bum): nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /rang byang chub stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /rnam pa thams cad
97a5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du rjod do/ /rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa skyed cing 'jig rten ston pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha
97a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten stong ngo zhes bya bar ston/ 'jig rten stong zhes bya bar rjod/ 'jig rten stong zhes bya bar shes par byed de/ rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu
97a7('bum): phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa skyed cing 'jig rten ston pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten stong zhes bya bar ston te/ 'jig rten stong zhes bya
97a8('bum): bar ji ltar ston ce na/ 'jig rten na gzugs stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na tshor ba stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na 'du shes stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na 'du byed stong zhes
97b1('bum): bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na myig stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na rna ba stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na sna stong zhes bya
97b2('bum): bar ston to/ /'jig rten na lce stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na lus stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na yid stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na gzugs stong zhes bya bar
97b3('bum): ston to/ /'jig rten na sgra stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na dri stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na ro stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na reg stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten
97b4('bum): na chos stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na myig gi rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na sna'i rnam par
97b5('bum): shes pa stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na lce'i rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na yid kyi rnam par shes
97b6('bum): pa stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na myig gi 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong
97b7('bum): zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong zhes
97b8('bum): bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na
98a1('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
98a2('bum): rkyen kyis tshor ba stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na sa'i khams stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na chu'i
98a3('bum): khams stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na mye'i khams stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na rlung gi khams stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na nam mkha'i khams stong zhes bya bar
98a4('bum): ston to/ /'jig rten na rnam par shes pa'i khams stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na ma rig pa stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na 'du byed stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na
98a5('bum): rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na mying dang gzugs stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na skye mched drug stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na reg pa stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig
98a6('bum): rten na tshor ba stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na sred pa stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na len pa stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na srid pa stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na skye ba
98a7('bum): stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na rga shi stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong
98a8('bum): zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na bsam gtan
98b1('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na nang stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na phyi stong pa nyid
98b2('bum): stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na phyi nang stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na chen po stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar ston
98b3('bum): to/ /'jig rten na don dam pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /
98b4('bum): 'jig rten na mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid stong zhes
98b5('bum): bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong
98b6('bum): zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong
98b7('bum): zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten
98b8('bum): na yang dag par spong ba rnams stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na dbang po rnams stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na
99a1('bum): stobs rnams stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na byang chub kyi yan lag rnams stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /
99a2('bum): 'jig rten na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na bsam gtan rnams stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na tshad myed pa rnams stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten
99a3('bum): na gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na rnam par thar pa brgyad stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
99a4('bum): pa dgu stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na mngon par shes pa rnams
99a5('bum): stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na ting nge 'dzin rnams stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na gzungs kyi sgo rnams stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu stong
99a6('bum): zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na myi 'jigs bzhi stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na byams pa chen po stong zhes bya bar
99a7('bum): ston to/ /'jig rten na snying rje chen po stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu stong
99a8('bum): zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na dgra bcom pa nyid
99b1('bum): stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na rang byang chub stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid stong zhes bya bar ston to/ /'jig rten na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid stong
99b2('bum): zhes bya bar ston to/ /rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa skyed cing 'jig rten ston pa'o// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bdun pa/
99b3('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /ji ltar 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston ce na/
99b4('bum): gzugs kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /tshor ba'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /'du shes kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston
99b5('bum): to/ /'du byed kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /myig gi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab
99b6('bum): ces bya bar ston to/ /rna ba'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /sna'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /lce'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces
99b7('bum): bya bar ston to/ /lus kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /yid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /gzugs kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces
99b8('bum): bya bar ston to/ /sgra'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /dri'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /ro'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /
100a1('bum): reg gi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /chos kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /myig gi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces
100a2('bum): bya bar ston to/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa'i
100a3('bum): 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston
100a4('bum): to/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten
100a5('bum): bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /yid
100a6('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i
100a7('bum): rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis
100a8('bum): tshor ba'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis
100b1('bum): tshor ba'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /sa'i khams kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /chu'i khams kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /
100b2('bum): mye'i khams kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /rlung gi khams kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /nam mkha'i khams kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces
100b3('bum): bya bar ston to/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /ma rig pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /'du byed kyi 'jig rten
100b4('bum): bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /mying dang gzugs kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /skye mched
100b5('bum): drug gi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /reg pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /tshor ba'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /sred pa'i
100b6('bum): 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /len pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /srid pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /skye ba'i
100b7('bum): 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /rga shi'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /
100b8('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
101a1('bum): pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten bsam
101a2('bum): gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /phyi stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig
101a3('bum): rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /chen po stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /don dam
101a4('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab
101a5('bum): ces bya bar ston to/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /dor ba
101a6('bum): myed pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis
101a7('bum): myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /dngos po myed
101a8('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab
101b1('bum): ces bya bar ston to/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
101b2('bum): kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /dbang po rnams kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /stobs rnams kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /byang chub kyi
101b3('bum): yan lag rnams kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi 'jig rten
101b4('bum): bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /bsam gtan rnams kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /tshad myed pa rnams kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /gzugs
101b5('bum): myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms
101b6('bum): par 'jug pa dgu'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /
101b7('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi
101b8('bum): khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /myi 'jigs pa bzhi'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /so so yang
102a1('bum): dag par rig pa bzhi'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /byams pa chen po'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /snying rje chen po'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi
102a2('bum): khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston
102a3('bum): to/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'jig rten
102a4('bum): bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /rang byang chub kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /rnam pa
102a5('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'jig rten bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya bar ston to/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo de ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston te/
102a6('bum): 'jig rten ji ltar dben zhes bya bar ston ce na/ gzugs kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /tshor ba'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /'du shes kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /'du byed
102a7('bum): kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /myig gi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /rna ba'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /sna'i 'jig rten
102a8('bum): dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /lce'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /lus kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /yid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /gzugs kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar
102b1('bum): ston to/ /sgra'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /dri'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /ro'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /reg gi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /chos kyi 'jig rten dben
102b2('bum): zhes bya bar ston to/ /myig gi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /
102b3('bum): lce'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /myig gi 'dus
102b4('bum): te reg pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten
102b5('bum): dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i
102b6('bum): 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /lce'i 'dus
102b7('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten
102b8('bum): dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /sa'i khams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /chu'i khams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /mye'i khams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /rlung gi
103a1('bum): khams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /nam mkha'i khams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /ma rig pa'i 'jig
103a2('bum): rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /'du byed kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /mying dang gzugs kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /skye mched
103a3('bum): drug gi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /reg pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /tshor ba'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /sred pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /len pa'i 'jig
103a4('bum): rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /srid pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /skye ba'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /rga shi'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i
103a5('bum): 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha
103a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /
103a7('bum): nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /phyi stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten
103a8('bum): dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /chen po stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben
103b1('bum): zhes bya bar ston to/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid
103b2('bum): kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /chos thams cad stong pa
103b3('bum): nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /dngos po myed pa stong
103b4('bum): pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /dran pa nye
103b5('bum): bar gzhag pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /
103b6('bum): dbang po rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /stobs rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /'phags
103b7('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /bsam gtan rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar
103b8('bum): ston to/ /tshad myed pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi 'jig rten
104a1('bum): dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa
104a2('bum): myed pa'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /mngon par shes pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi
104a3('bum): 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /so so yang dag par rig
104a4('bum): pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /byams pa chen po'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /snying rje chen po'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo
104a5('bum): brgyad kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /phyir myi 'ong
104a6('bum): ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /rang byang chub kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi 'jig
104a7('bum): rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to/ /rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa skyed cing 'jig rten ston pa'o/ /
104a8('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston te/ ji ltar 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston
104b1('bum): ce na/ gzugs kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /tshor ba'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /'du shes kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
104b2('bum): zhes bya bar ston to/ /'du byed kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /myig gi 'jig rten mtha' las
104b3('bum): 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rna ba'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /sna'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /lce'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong
104b4('bum): pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /lus kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /yid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /gzugs kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong
104b5('bum): pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /sgra'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /dri'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /ro'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes
104b6('bum): bya bar ston to/ /reg gi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /chos kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /myig gi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa
104b7('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /lce'i rnam
104b8('bum): par shes pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten
105a1('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong
105a2('bum): pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg
105a3('bum): pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten
105a4('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten
105a5('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten mtha'
105a6('bum): las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /sa'i khams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston
105a7('bum): to/ /chu'i khams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /mye'i khams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rlung gi khams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /
105a8('bum): nam mkha'i khams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /ma rig pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa
105b1('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /'du byed kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /mying dang gzugs kyi 'jig rten
105b2('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /skye mched drug gi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /reg pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /tshor ba'i 'jig
105b3('bum): rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /sred pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /len pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /srid pa'i
105b4('bum): 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /skye ba'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rga shi'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /sbyin pa'i pha
105b5('bum): rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten
105b6('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa
105b7('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /
105b8('bum): phyi stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha'
106a1('bum): las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /chen po stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes
106a2('bum): bya bar ston to/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /mtha'
106a3('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /dor ba myed pa
106a4('bum): stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha'
106a5('bum): las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes
106a6('bum): bya bar ston to/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /dngos po myed pa'i
106a7('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi
106a8('bum): 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /dbang po rnams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
106b1('bum): zhes bya bar ston to/ /stobs rnams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /'phags pa'i
106b2('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /bsam gtan rnams kyi
106b3('bum): 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /tshad myed pa rnams kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'jig rten mtha'

106b5('bum): 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /mngon par shes pa rnams kyi 'jig rten
