106b7('bum): to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /myi 'jigs pa bzhi'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /so so yang dag par rig
106b8('bum): pa bzhi'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /byams pa chen po'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /snying rje chen po'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya
107a1('bum): bar ston to/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar
107a2('bum): ston to/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /dgra bcom
107a3('bum): pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rang byang chub kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong
107a4('bum): pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig
107a5('bum): rten ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa zhes bya bar ston te/ /ji ltar 'jig rten ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa zhes bya bar ston ce na/ gzugs kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /tshor ba'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong
107a6('bum): pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /'du shes kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /'du byed kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar
107a7('bum): ston to/ /myig gi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rna ba'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /sna'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /lce'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid
107a8('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /lus kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /yid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /gzugs kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /

107b3('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston
107b4('bum): to/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid

107b6('bum): pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes

108a7('bum): nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /bzod pa'i
108a8('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo
108b1('bum): nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /phyi stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten
108b2('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /chen po stong pa nyid

108b6('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig
108b7('bum): rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /dngos po
108b8('bum): myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi 'jig
109a1('bum): rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /dbang po rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /stobs
109a2('bum): rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid
109a3('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /bsam gtan rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /tshad myed pa
109a4('bum): rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi 'jig
109a5('bum): rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma
109a6('bum): myed pa dang / /smon pa myed pa'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /mngon par shes pa rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo
109a7('bum): nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /
109a8('bum): myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /byams pa chen po'i 'jig rten ngo bo
109b1('bum): nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /snying rje chen po'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rgyun tu zhugs
109b2('bum): pa'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes
109b3('bum): bya bar ston to/ /dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rang byang chub kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi 'jig rten
109b4('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa
109b5('bum): la 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa la ji ltar 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar
109b6('bum): ston ce na/ gzugs kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /tshor ba'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /'du shes kyi 'jig rten dngos
109b7('bum): po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /'du byed kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar
109b8('bum): ston to/ /myig gi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rna ba'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /sna'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid
110a1('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /lce'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /lus kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /yid kyi
110a2('bum): 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /gzugs kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /sgra'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes
110a3('bum): bya bar ston to/ /dri'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /ro'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /reg gi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i
110a4('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /chos kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /myig gi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /
110a5('bum): rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /lce'i rnam par shes
110a6('bum): pa'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig
110a7('bum): rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten dngos po myed
110a8('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
110b1('bum): zhes bya bar ston to/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /
110b2('bum): myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes
110b3('bum): bya bar ston to/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i
110b4('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i
110b5('bum): 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /sa'i khams kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /chu'i khams kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed
110b6('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /mye'i khams kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rlung gi khams kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya
110b7('bum): bar ston to/ /nam mkha'i khams kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar
110b8('bum): ston to/ /ma rig pa'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /'du byed kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rnam par shes pa'i
111a1('bum): 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /mying dang gzugs kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /skye mched drug gi 'jig rten dngos
111a2('bum): po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /reg pa'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /tshor ba'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /
111a3('bum): sred pa'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /len pa'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /srid pa'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i

111a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /bzod
111a6('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /
111a7('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar
111a8('bum): ston to/ /nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /phyi stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /phyi nang stong
111b1('bum): pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /chen po stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten
111b2('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i
111b3('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i
111b4('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po
111b5('bum): myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i
111b6('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i
111b7('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid
111b8('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po
112a1('bum): myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi 'jig
112a2('bum): rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /dbang po rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /stobs rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo
112a3('bum): nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'jig rten dngos
112a4('bum): po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /bsam gtan rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po

112a6('bum): rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
112a7('bum): 'jug pa dgu'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i 'jig rten dngos po myed
112a8('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /mngon par shes pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i

112b2('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /myi 'jigs pa bzhi'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i 'jig rten dngos po
112b3('bum): myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /byams pa chen po'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /snying rje chen po'i 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa

112b6('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rang byang chub kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
112b7('bum): zhes bya bar ston to/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'jig rten dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo
112b8('bum): nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston te/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
113a1('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa la ji ltar 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston ce na/ gzugs kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /tshor ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /'du shes kyi 'jig
113a2('bum): rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /'du byed kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /myig gi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /rna ba'i 'jig
113a3('bum): rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /sna'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /lce'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /lus kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /yid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar

113a5('bum): 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /chos kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /myig gi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar
113a6('bum): ston to/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /
113a7('bum): yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /sna'i 'dus
113a8('bum): te reg pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
113b1('bum): 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /
113b2('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis
113b3('bum): tshor ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /sa'i khams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /chu'i khams
113b4('bum): kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /mye'i khams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /rlung gi khams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /nam mkha'i khams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar
113b5('bum): ston to/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /ma rig pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /'du byed kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /rnam par shes
113b6('bum): pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /mying dang gzugs kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /skye mched drug gi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /reg pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /
113b7('bum): tshor ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /sred pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /len pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /srid pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /skye ba'i
113b8('bum): 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /rga shi'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig
114a1('bum): rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /bsam gtan
114a2('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /phyi stong pa nyid
114a3('bum): kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /chen po stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten
114a4('bum): zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten
114a5('bum): zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /dor ba myed pa stong
114a6('bum): pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong
114a7('bum): pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa
114a8('bum): nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /
114b1('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /dbang po rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /stobs
114b2('bum): rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /
114b3('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /bsam gtan rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /tshad myed pa rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /gzugs
114b4('bum): myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
114b5('bum): dgu'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / /mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /mngon par shes pa
114b6('bum): rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i
114b7('bum): stobs bcu'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /myi 'jigs pa bzhi'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /byams pa chen
114b8('bum): po'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /snying rje chen po'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i
115a1('bum): 'bras bu'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /
115a2('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /rang byang chub kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /rnam pa thams
115a3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ /rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa skyed cing 'jig rten ston pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab
115a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston te/ ji ltar 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston ce na/ gzugs kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar
115a5('bum): ston to/ /tshor ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /'du shes kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /'du byed kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /rnam par shes
115a6('bum): pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /myig gi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /rna ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /sna'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /
115a7('bum): lce'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /lus kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /yid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /gzugs kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid
115a8('bum): ces bya bar ston to/ /sgra'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /dri'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /ro'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /reg gi 'jig rten stong
115b1('bum): pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /chos kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /myig gi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten stong
115b2('bum): pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /lus kyi rnam par shes
115b3('bum): pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /
115b4('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya
115b5('bum): bar ston to/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
115b6('bum): kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i
115b7('bum): 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten stong
115b8('bum): pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /sa'i khams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /chu'i khams kyi
116a1('bum): 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /mye'i khams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /rlung gi khams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /nam mkha'i khams
116a2('bum): kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /ma rig pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /'du byed kyi 'jig rten
116a3('bum): stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /rnam par shes pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /mying dang gzugs kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /skye mched drug gi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces
116a4('bum): bya bar ston to/ /reg pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /tshor ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /sred pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /len pa'i 'jig rten
116a5('bum): stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /srid pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /skye ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /rga shi'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /sbyin
116a6('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten stong pa
116a7('bum): nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /shes rab
116a8('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /nang stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /phyi stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /phyi nang stong
116b1('bum): pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /chen po stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /don dam
116b2('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /
116b3('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig
116b4('bum): rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /rang gi
116b5('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten
116b6('bum): stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /dran
116b7('bum): pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa
116b8('bum): nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /dbang po rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /stobs rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi 'jig rten
117a1('bum): stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces
117a2('bum): bya bar ston to/ /bsam gtan rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /tshad myed pa rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par
117a3('bum): 'jug pa rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
117a4('bum): dgu'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /mngon
117a5('bum): par shes pa rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces
117a6('bum): bya bar ston to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /myi 'jigs pa bzhi'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /so so yang dag par
117a7('bum): rig pa bzhi'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /byams pa chen po'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /snying rje chen po'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /sangs
117a8('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
117b1('bum): 'bras bu'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston
117b2('bum): to/ /rang byang chub kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'jig rten
117b3('bum): stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to/ /rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa skyed cing 'jig rten ston pa'o// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/
117b4('bum): bam po brgyad pa/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'jig rten ci ltar ston ce na/ ji nas kyang 'jig rten 'di'i 'du shes su yang myi 'gyur la/ 'jig rten pha rol gyi 'du
117b5('bum): shes su yang myi 'gyur ba de ltar ston te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang gis 'jig rten 'di'i 'du shes su 'gyur ba'am/ 'jig rten pha rol gyi 'du shes su 'gyur ba'i chos de lta bu
117b6('bum): myed do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don chen po'i slad du nye bar gnas so/ /bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bsam gyis
117b7('bum): myi khyab pa'i slad du nye bar gnas so/ /bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don dpag tu ma mchis pa'i slad du nye bar gnas so/ /bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
117b8('bum): pa 'di ni don gzhal du ma mchis pa'i slad du nye bar gnas so/ /bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i slad du nye bar gnas so/ /bcom ldan
118a1('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don chen po'i slad du nye bar gnas so/ /rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu
118a2('bum): phyin pa 'di ni don bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so/ /rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don dpag tu myed pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so/ /rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu
118a3('bum): phyin pa 'di ni don gzhal du myed pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so/ /rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so/ /rab 'byor ji ltar na shes rab
118a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don chen po'i phyir nye bar gnas pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi don chen po ste/ 'di ltar sems
118a5('bum): can thams cad bskyab pa'i don dang / sems can thams cad yongs su myi gtang ba'i don to/ /rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
118a6('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi don chen po'i phyir nye bar gnas so/ /rab 'byor ji ltar na shes rab kyi phyin pa don bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa yin zhe na/
118a7('bum): rab 'byor sangs rgyas nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang / rang byung nyid dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni bsam gyis myi khyab ste/ rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/ shes rab kyi pha
118a8('bum): rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi don bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so/ /rab 'byor ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu
118b1('bum): phyin pa don dpag tu myed pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor sems can du bsdu bas bsdus pa la gang gis sangs rgyas nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang / rang byung nyid dang /
118b2('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag par nus pa de lta bu gang yang myed de/ rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
118b3('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi don dpag tu myed pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so/ /rab 'byor ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don gzhal du myed pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa yin zhe na/ rab
118b4('bum): 'byor sangs rgyas nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang / rang byung nyid dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni gzhal du myed de/ sus kyang gzhal bar myi nus so/ /rab 'byor rnam grangs
118b5('bum): des na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi don gzhal du myed pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so/ /rab 'byor ji ltar na shes
118b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la mnyam pas
118b7('bum): mnyam pa yang su yang myed na/ lhag pa lta ci smos te/ rab 'byor rnam grangs des na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
118b8('bum): rnams kyi don myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang / rang byung nyid dang / thams cad
119a1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ni bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
119a2('bum): de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor sangs rgyas nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang / rang byung nyid dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni bsam gyis myi khyab bo/ /rab 'byor
119a3('bum): sangs rgyas nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang / rang byung nyid dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni dpag tu myed gzhal du myed de/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzugs
119a4('bum): kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor tshor ba yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa
119a5('bum): dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'du shes kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'du byed kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu
119a6('bum): myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor rnam par shes pa yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab
119a7('bum): 'byor myig kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor rna ba yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/
119a8('bum): myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor sna yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor lce yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag
119b1('bum): tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor lus kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor yid
119b2('bum): kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzugs kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa
119b3('bum): dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor sgra yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor dri yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du
119b4('bum): myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor ro yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor reg kyang bsam
119b5('bum): gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor chos kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /
119b6('bum): rab 'byor myig gi rnam par shes pa yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yang bsam gyis myi khyab
119b7('bum): dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor sna'i rnam par shes pa yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang
119b8('bum): mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor lce'i rnam par shes pa yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor lus kyi rnam par shes pa
120a1('bum): yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du
120a2('bum): myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor myig gi 'dus te reg pa yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor rna
120a3('bum): ba'i 'dus te reg pa yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor sna'i 'dus te reg pa yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed
120a4('bum): gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor lce'i 'dus te reg pa yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /
120a5('bum): rab 'byor lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang bsam
120a6('bum): gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed
120a7('bum): gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang
120a8('bum): mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor lce'i
120b1('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor
120b2('bum): ba yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang bsam gyis myi khyab
120b3('bum): dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor sa'i khams kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam
120b4('bum): pa'o/ /rab 'byor chu'i khams kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor mye'i khams kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed
120b5('bum): gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor rlung gi khams kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor
120b6('bum): nam mkha'i khams kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu
120b7('bum): myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor ma rig pa yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab
120b8('bum): 'byor 'du byed kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor rnam par shes pa yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal
121a1('bum): du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor mying dang gzugs kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor
121a2('bum): skye mched drug kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ /myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor reg pa yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam
121a3('bum): pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor tshor ba yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor sred pa yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed
121a4('bum): gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor len pa yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor srid pa yang
121a5('bum): bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor skye ba yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam
121a6('bum): pa'o/ /rab 'byor rga shi yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag
121a7('bum): tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam
121a8('bum): pa'o/ /rab 'byor bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
121b1('bum): yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du
121b2('bum): myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor
121b3('bum): nang stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor phyi stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa
121b4('bum): ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor stong pa nyid stong pa
121b5('bum): nyid kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor chen po stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/

121b7('bum): kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi
121b8('bum): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor thog ma dang
122a1('bum): tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag
122a2('bum): tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor
122a3('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ /myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag
122a4('bum): tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /
122a5('bum): rab 'byor dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag
122a6('bum): tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /
122a7('bum): rab 'byor dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang bsam gyis myi khyab
122a8('bum): dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ /myi mnyam pa dang mnyam
122b1('bum): pa'o/ /rab 'byor dbang po rnams kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor stobs rnams kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed
122b2('bum): gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /
122b3('bum): rab 'byor 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams
122b4('bum): kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor bsam gtan rnams kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/
122b5('bum): myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor tshad myed pa rnams kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzugs myed
122b6('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor rnam par thar pa brgyad kyang bsam gyis myi khyab
122b7('bum): dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed
122b8('bum): pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed
123a1('bum): pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor mngon shes pa rnams kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor
123a2('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed
123a3('bum): pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor myi 'jigs pa
123a4('bum): rnams kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed

123a6('bum): bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/

123a8('bum): 'bras bu yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du
123b1('bum): myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor dgra bcom pa nyid kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor rang byang chub kyang

123b3('bum): pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor chos thams cad kyang

123b5('bum): chos rnams kyang myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor gzugs bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor tshor ba bsam gyis
123b6('bum): myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor 'du shes bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang
123b7('bum): mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor 'du byed bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor rnam par shes pa
123b8('bum): bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor myig bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi
124a1('bum): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor rna ba bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor

124b5('bum): reg pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed

124b7('bum): mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor lce'i 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor lus
124b8('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu
125a1('bum): myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa
125a2('bum): ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam
125a3('bum): pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor lce'i
125a4('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba
125a5('bum): bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed
125a6('bum): gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor sa'i khams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs
125a7('bum): so/ /rab 'byor chu'i khams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor mye'i khams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du
125a8('bum): myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor rlung gi khams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ /myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor
125b1('bum): nam mkha'i khams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor rnam par shes pa'i khams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal
125b2('bum): du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor ma rig pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor
125b3('bum): 'du byed bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor rnam par shes pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/
125b4('bum): myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor mying dang gzugs bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor skye
125b5('bum): mched drug bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor reg pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi
125b6('bum): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor tshor ba bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor sred
125b7('bum): pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor len pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi
125b8('bum): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor srid pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor skye ba
126a1('bum): bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor rga shi bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ /myi mnyam
126a2('bum): pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor tshul
126a3('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis myi khyab
126a4('bum): dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa
126a5('bum): dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor shes
126a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed
126a7('bum): pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor phyi stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor phyi nang stong pa
126a8('bum): nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam
126b1('bum): pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor chen po stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor don dam pa stong pa nyid
126b2('bum): bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor 'dus byas stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa
126b3('bum): dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor mtha' las 'das
126b4('bum): pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal
126b5('bum): du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor
126b6('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor chos thams cad stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du
126b7('bum): myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /
126b8('bum): rab 'byor myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu
127a1('bum): myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs
127a2('bum): so/ /rab 'byor dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ /myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bsam gyis
127a3('bum): myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor yang dag par spong ba rnams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa
127a4('bum): yang myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ /myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor dbang po rnams bsam gyis myi khyab
127a5('bum): dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor stobs rnams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /
127a6('bum): rab 'byor byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsam gyis
127a7('bum): myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang
127a8('bum): mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor bsam gtan rnams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor tshad myed pa rnams bsam gyis myi
127b1('bum): khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/
127b2('bum): myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor rnam par thar pa brgyad bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ /myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor mthar kyis
127b3('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor rnam par thar pa sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed
127b4('bum): pa dang / smon pa myed pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor mngon par shes pa rnams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/
127b5('bum): myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin rnams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor gzungs kyi sgo
127b6('bum): rnams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa
127b7('bum): ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor myi 'jigs pa rnams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor so so yang
127b8('bum): dag par rig pa rnams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor byams pa chen po bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/
128a1('bum): myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor snying rje chen po bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi
128a2('bum): chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal
128a3('bum): du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /
128a4('bum): rab 'byor phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor dgra bcom pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du
128a5('bum): myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor rang byang chub bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor lam gyi
128a6('bum): rnam par shes pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal
128a7('bum): du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/ gzugs bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang
128a8('bum): mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du tshor ba bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du 'du shes bsam
128b1('bum): gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du 'du byed bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang
128b2('bum): mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rnam par shes pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du myig bsam gyis
128b3('bum): myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rna ba bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam
128b4('bum): pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du sna bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lce bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu
128b5('bum): ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lus bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/
128b6('bum): ci'i slad du yid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du gzugs bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal
128b7('bum): du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du sgra bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad
128b8('bum): du dri bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du ro bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing myi
129a1('bum): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du reg bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du chos
129a2('bum): bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du myig gi rnam par shes pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du
129a3('bum): ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rna ba'i rnam par shes pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/
129a4('bum): ci'i slad du sna'i rnam par shes pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lce'i rnam par shes pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag
129a5('bum): tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lus kyi rnam par shes pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa
129a6('bum): dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du yid kyi rnam par shes pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du myig gi 'dus
129a7('bum): te reg pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis
129a8('bum): shing myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du sna'i 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du
129b1('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lus kyi 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal
129b2('bum): du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/
129b3('bum): ci'i slad du myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
129b4('bum): kyis tshor ba bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma
129b5('bum): mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam
129b6('bum): pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/
