129b8('bum): myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du chu'i khams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang
130a1('bum): mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du mye'i khams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rlung gi khams
130a2('bum): bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du nam mkha'i khams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma
130a3('bum): mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rnam par shes pa'i khams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi
130a4('bum): dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du ma rig pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du 'du byed bsam
130a5('bum): gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rnam par shes pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du
130a6('bum): ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du mying dang gzugs bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi
130a7('bum): dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du skye mched drug bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du reg
130a8('bum): pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du tshor ba bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis
130b1('bum): gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du sred pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang
130b2('bum): mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du len pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du srid pa bsam
130b3('bum): gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du skye ba bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /
130b4('bum): myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rga shi bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i
130b5('bum): slad du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du tshul khrims kyi pha
130b6('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
130b7('bum): bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
130b8('bum): bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam
131a1('bum): gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis myi khyab
131a2('bum): dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du nang stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /
131a3('bum): myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du phyi stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs
131a4('bum): pa lags/ ci'i slad du phyi nang stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad
131a5('bum): du stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du chen po stong pa nyid
131a6('bum): bsam gyi myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du don dam stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab
131a7('bum): dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du 'dus byas stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma
131a8('bum): mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis
131b1('bum): gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /
131b2('bum): myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa
131b3('bum): myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i
131b4('bum): slad du rang bzhin stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du chos thams cad stong pa nyid
131b5('bum): bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma
131b6('bum): mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /
131b7('bum): myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam
131b8('bum): pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i
132a1('bum): slad du/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
132a2('bum): rnams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du yang dag par spong ba rnams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma
132a3('bum): mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam
132a4('bum): pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du dbang po rnams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du
132a5('bum): stobs rnams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu
132a6('bum): ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma
132a7('bum): mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa
132a8('bum): dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du bsam gtan rnams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du tshad myed pa
132b1('bum): rnams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsam gyis
132b2('bum): myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rnam par thar pa brgyad bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du
132b3('bum): ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis
132b4('bum): gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa bsam gyis
132b5('bum): myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du mngon par shes pa rnams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu
132b6('bum): ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du ting nge 'dzin rnams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma
132b7('bum): mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam
132b8('bum): pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang
133a1('bum): mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du myi 'jigs pa bzhi bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs
133a2('bum): pa lags/ ci'i slad du so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/
133a3('bum): ci'i slad du byams pa chen po bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du snying rje chen po bsam
133a4('bum): gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad bsam gyis myi
133a5('bum): khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu
133a6('bum): ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal
133a7('bum): du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /
133a8('bum): myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du dgra bcom pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa
133b1('bum): myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rang byang chub bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lam gyi rnam pa shes pa
133b2('bum): nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu
133b3('bum): ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po dgu pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka'
133b4('bum): stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor tshor ba la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi
133b5('bum): mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor 'du shes la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor 'du byed la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi
133b6('bum): mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor rnam par shes pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor myig la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam
133b7('bum): pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor rna ba la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor sna la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa
133b8('bum): dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor lce la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor lus la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa
134a1('bum): dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor yid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor gzugs la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad
134a2('bum): dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor sgra la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor dri la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam
134a3('bum): pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor ro la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor reg la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa
134a4('bum): dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor chos la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor myig gi rnam par shes pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa
134a5('bum): dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor sna'i rnam par
134a6('bum): shes pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor lce'i rnam par shes pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa
134a7('bum): myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor lus kyi rnam par shes pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor yid kyi rnam par shes pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag
134a8('bum): pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor myig gi 'dus te reg pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor rna ba'i
134b1('bum): 'dus te reg pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor sna'i 'dus te reg pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /
134b2('bum): rab 'byor lce'i 'dus te reg pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /
134b3('bum): rab 'byor yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa
134b4('bum): myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa
134b5('bum): dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor lus kyi 'dus te reg
134b6('bum): pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam
134b7('bum): pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor sa'i khams la yang bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang / myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor chu'i khams
134b8('bum): la yang bsam pa dang / dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor mye'i khams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor rlung gi khams la yang
135a1('bum): bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor nam mkha'i khams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam
135a2('bum): pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor rnam par shes pa'i khams la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor ma rig pa la yang bsam pa dang
135a3('bum): dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor 'du byed la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor
135a4('bum): rnam par shes pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor mying dang gzugs la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang
135a5('bum): mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor skye mched drug la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor reg pa la yang bsam
135a6('bum): pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor tshor ba la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab
135a7('bum): 'byor sred pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor len pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi
135a8('bum): mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor srid pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor skye ba la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /
135b1('bum): tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor rga shi la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
135b2('bum): phyin pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam
135b3('bum): pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor brtson 'grus
135b4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /
135b5('bum): tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor
135b6('bum): nang stong pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor phyi stong pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi
135b7('bum): mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor phyi nang stong pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
135b8('bum): la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor chen po stong pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang
136a1('bum): myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor don dam pa stong pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor 'dus byas
136a2('bum): stong pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam
136a3('bum): pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la yang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor thog ma

141b5('bum): pa'i stobs rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du myi 'jigs pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa
141b6('bum): dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du
141b7('bum): byams pa chen po la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du snying rje chen po la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi
141b8('bum): mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rgyun
142a1('bum): tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /
142a2('bum): tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du
142a3('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rang byang chub la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi
142a4('bum): dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ ci'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
142a5('bum): la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid/ bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed
142a6('bum): gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir gzugs la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi
142a7('bum): khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor 'du shes kyi ngo
142a8('bum): bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir 'du shes la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /
142b1('bum): rab 'byor 'du byed kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir 'du byed la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi
142b2('bum): dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /
142b3('bum): tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor myig gi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir myig la bsam pa dang dpag
142b4('bum): pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor rna ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rna ba la bsam pa
142b5('bum): dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor sna'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir sna la bsam
142b6('bum): pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor lce'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir lce la bsam
142b7('bum): pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor lus kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir lus la bsam
142b8('bum): pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor yid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir yid la bsam
143a1('bum): pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir
143a2('bum): gzugs la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor sgra'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/

143a6('bum): ste/ de'i phyir reg la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor chos kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa
143a7('bum): ste/ de'i phyir chos la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor myig gi rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang
143a8('bum): mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir myig gi rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu

143b7('bum): dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir myig gi 'dus te reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor rna ba'i
143b8('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi

144a6('bum): pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /
144a7('bum): tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/
144a8('bum): de'i phyir rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid

144b2('bum): dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor
144b3('bum): ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/

144b6('bum): pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor sa'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir sa'i khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa
144b7('bum): dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor chu'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir chu'i khams la bsam
144b8('bum): pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor mye'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam
145a1('bum): pa ste/ de'i phyir mye'i khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor rlung gi khams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/
145a2('bum): myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rlung gi khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor nam mkha'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab
145a3('bum): dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir nam mkha'i khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor rnam par
145a4('bum): shes pa'i khams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rnam par shes pa'i khams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam
145a5('bum): pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor ma rig pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir ma rig pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /
145a6('bum): tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor 'du byed kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir 'du byed la bsam pa
145a7('bum): dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/
145a8('bum): de'i phyir rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor mying dang gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal
145b1('bum): du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir mying dang gzugs la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor skye mched drug gi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi
145b2('bum): khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir skye mched drug la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor reg pa'i ngo bo nyid
145b3('bum): bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir reg pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor tshor
145b4('bum): ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir tshor ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /
145b5('bum): rab 'byor sred pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir sred pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi
145b6('bum): dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor len pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir len pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang
145b7('bum): myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor srid pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir srid pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad
145b8('bum): dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor skye ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir skye ba la bsam pa dang dpag
146a1('bum): pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor rga shi'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rga shi la
146a2('bum): bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang
146a3('bum): mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid
146a4('bum): bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /
146a5('bum): rab 'byor bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /
146a6('bum): tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i
146a7('bum): phyir brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi
146a8('bum): khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs
146b1('bum): so/ /rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /
146b2('bum): tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir nang stong pa nyid la
146b3('bum): bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor phyi stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam
146b4('bum): pa ste/ de'i phyir phyi stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed
146b5('bum): gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir phyi nang stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor stong pa nyid stong pa
146b6('bum): nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi
146b7('bum): mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor chen po stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir chen po stong pa nyid la bsam pa
146b8('bum): dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam
147a1('bum): pa ste/ de'i phyir don dam pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab
147a2('bum): dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir 'dus byas stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor 'dus ma byas
147a3('bum): stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi
147a4('bum): mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir mtha' las
147a5('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed
147a6('bum): la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid
147a7('bum): kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa
147a8('bum): myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rang bzhin stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang
147b1('bum): dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa
147b2('bum): ste/ de'i phyir chos thams cad stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab
147b3('bum): dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor
147b4('bum): myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /
147b5('bum): tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i
147b6('bum): phyir dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal
147b7('bum): du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid
147b8('bum): stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /
148a1('bum): tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam
148a2('bum): pa ste/ de'i phyir dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis
148a3('bum): myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir yang dag par spong ba rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor
148a4('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang /
148a5('bum): tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor dbang po rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir dbang po
148a6('bum): rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor stobs rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa
148a7('bum): dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir stobs rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis
148a8('bum): myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /
148b1('bum): rab 'byor 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la
148b2('bum): bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa
148b3('bum): dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor bsam gtan rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam
148b4('bum): gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir bsam gtan rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /
148b5('bum): rab 'byor tshad myed pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir tshad myed pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang
148b6('bum): mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam
148b7('bum): pa ste/ de'i phyir gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi ngo bo nyid
148b8('bum): bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /
149a1('bum): rab 'byor mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir mthar kyis gnas
149a2('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed
149a3('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa la bsam pa dang
149a4('bum): dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor mngon par shes pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/
149a5('bum): de'i phyir mngon par shes pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed
149a6('bum): gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir ting nge 'dzin rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor gzungs kyi sgo
149a7('bum): rnams kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir gzungs kyi sgo rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi
149a8('bum): mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs
149b1('bum): pa'i stobs bcu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor myi 'jigs pa bzhi'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang
149b2('bum): mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir myi 'jigs pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab
149b3('bum): dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab
149b4('bum): 'byor byams pa chen po'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir byams pa chen po la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang
149b5('bum): myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor snying rje chen po'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir snying rje chen po la bsam pa dang dpag
149b6('bum): pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam
149b7('bum): pa ste/ de'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid bsam
149b8('bum): gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /
150a1('bum): rab 'byor lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bsam pa dang
150a2('bum): dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i
150a3('bum): phyir phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor dgra bcom pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/
150a4('bum): myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir dgra bcom pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor rang byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu
150a5('bum): myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rang byang chub la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi
150a6('bum): ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rnam pa shes pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa
150a7('bum): myi dmyigs so/ /rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed la/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de'i phyir rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
150a8('bum): pa nyid la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang / tshad dang mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bcu pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam
150b1('bum): du sems/ gzugs gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la gzugs dmyigs su yod dam/ tshor ba gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed
150b2('bum): gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la tshor ba dmyigs su yod dam/ 'du shes gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la 'du shes
150b3('bum): dmyigs su yod dam/ 'du byed gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la 'du byed dmyigs su yod dam/ rnam par shes pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab
150b4('bum): dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rnam par shes pa dmyigs su yod dam/ myig gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam
150b5('bum): pa dang mnyam pa de la myig dmyigs su yod dam/ rna ba gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rna ba dmyigs su yod dam/ sna gang bsam
150b6('bum): gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la sna dmyigs su yod dam/ lce gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang
150b7('bum): mnyam pa de la lce dmyigs su yod dam/ lus gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la lus dmyigs su yod dam/ yid gang bsam gyis
150b8('bum): myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la yid dmyigs su yod dam/ gzugs gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam
151a1('bum): pa de la gzugs dmyigs su yod dam/ sgra gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la sgra dmyigs su yod dam/ dri gang bsam gyis myi
151a2('bum): khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la dri dmyigs su yod dam/ ro gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la ro
151a3('bum): dmyigs su yod dam/ reg gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la reg dmyigs su yod dam/ chos gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed
151a4('bum): gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la chos dmyigs su yod dam/ myig gi rnam par shes pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa
151a5('bum): de la myig gi rnam par shes pa dmyigs su yod dam/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa
151a6('bum): dmyigs su yod dam/ sna'i rnam par shes pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la sna'i rnam par shes pa dmyigs su yod dam/ lce'i rnam
151a7('bum): par shes pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la dmyigs su yod dam/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa gang bsam gyis
151a8('bum): myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la lus kyi rnam par shes pa dmyigs su yod dam/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal
151b1('bum): du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la yid kyi rnam par shes pa dmyigs su yod dam/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang
151b2('bum): mnyam pa de la myig gi 'dus te reg pa dmyigs su yod dam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg
151b3('bum): pa dmyigs su yod dam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa dmyigs su yod dam/ lce'i 'dus te
151b4('bum): reg pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa dmyigs su yod dam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag
151b5('bum): tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dmyigs su yod dam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/
151b6('bum): myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dmyigs su yod dam/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang
151b7('bum): mnyam pa de la myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dmyigs su yod dam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa
151b8('bum): dang mnyam pa de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dmyigs su yod dam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa
152a1('bum): dang mnyam pa de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dmyigs su yod dam/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi
152a2('bum): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dmyigs su yod dam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam
152a3('bum): pa dang mnyam pa de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dmyigs su yod dam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi
152a4('bum): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dmyigs su yod dam/ sa'i khams gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam
152a5('bum): pa de la sa'i khams dmyigs su yod dam/ chu'i khams gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la chu'i khams dmyigs su yod dam/ mye'i
152a6('bum): khams gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la mye'i khams dmyigs su yod dam/ rlung gi khams gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal
152a7('bum): du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rlung gi khams dmyigs su yod dam/ nam mkha'i khams gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam
152a8('bum): pa de la nam mkha'i khams dmyigs su yod dam/ rnam par shes pa'i khams gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rnam par shes
152b1('bum): pa'i khams dmyigs su yod dam/ ma rig pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la ma rig pa dmyigs su yod dam/ 'du byed gang bsam
152b2('bum): gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la 'du byed dmyigs su yod dam/ rnam par shes pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/
152b3('bum): myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rnam par shes pa dmyigs su yod dam/ mying dang gzugs gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la mying dang gzugs
152b4('bum): dmyigs su yod dam/ skye mched drug gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la skye mched drug dmyigs su yod dam/ reg pa gang bsam gyis
152b5('bum): myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la reg pa dmyigs su yod dam/ tshor ba gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam
152b6('bum): pa de la tshor ba dmyigs su yod dam/ sred pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la sred pa dmyigs su yod dam/ len pa gang bsam gyis
152b7('bum): myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la len pa dmyigs su yod dam/ srid pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam
152b8('bum): pa de la srid pa dmyigs su yod dam/ skye ba gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la skye ba dmyigs su yod dam/ rga shi gang bsam gyis myi
153a1('bum): khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rga shi dmyigs su yod dam/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa
153a2('bum): ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dmyigs su yod dam/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa
153a3('bum): dang mnyam pa de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmyigs su yod dam/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa
153a4('bum): de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dmyigs su yod dam/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la brtson 'grus
153a5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmyigs su yod dam/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
153a6('bum): pa dmyigs su yod dam/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmyigs su yod
153a7('bum): dam/ nang stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la nang stong pa nyid dmyigs su yod dam/ phyi stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis myi
153a8('bum): khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la phyi stong pa nyid dmyigs su yod dam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/
153b1('bum): myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la phyi nang stong pa nyid dmyigs su yod dam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la stong pa nyid
153b2('bum): stong pa nyid dmyigs su yod dam/ chen po stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la chen po stong pa nyid dmyigs su yod dam/ don
153b3('bum): dam pa stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la don dam pa stong pa nyid dmyigs su yod dam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis
153b4('bum): myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid dmyigs su yod dam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal
153b5('bum): du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dmyigs su yod dam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/
153b6('bum): myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dmyigs su yod dam/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam
153b7('bum): pa dang mnyam pa de la thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dmyigs su yod dam/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa
153b8('bum): de la dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dmyigs su yod dam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid dmyigs
154a1('bum): su yod dam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid dmyigs su
154a2('bum): yod dam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dmyigs su yod dam/
154a3('bum): myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dmyigs su yod dam/ dngos po myed pa
154a4('bum): stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dmyigs su yod dam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis myi
154a5('bum): khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmyigs su yod dam/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu
154a6('bum): myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmyigs su yod dam/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal
154a7('bum): du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dmyigs su yod dam/ yang dag par spong ba gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/
154a8('bum): myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la yang dag par spong ba rnams dmyigs su yod dam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa
154b1('bum): de dag la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dmyigs su yod dam/ dbang po gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la dbang po rnams dmyigs su yod
154b2('bum): dam/ stobs gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la stobs rnams dmyigs su yod dam/ byang chub kyi yan lag gang bsam
154b3('bum): gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la byang chub kyi yan lag dmyigs su yod dam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gang
154b4('bum): bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dmyigs su yod dam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa gang bsam gyis
154b5('bum): myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la 'phags pa'i bden pa dmyigs su yod dam/ bsam gtan gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/
154b6('bum): myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la bsam gtan rnams dmyigs su yod dam/ tshad myed pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la
154b7('bum): tshad myed pa rnams dmyigs su yod dam/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la gzugs myed
154b8('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dmyigs su yod dam/ rnam par thar pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la rnam par thar
155a1('bum): pa rnams dmyigs su yod dam/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag
155a2('bum): la mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dmyigs su yod dam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag
155a3('bum): tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dmyigs su yod dam/ mngon par shes pa gang bsam
155a4('bum): gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la mngon par shes pa rnams dmyigs su yod dam/ ting nge 'dzin gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed
155a5('bum): gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la ting nge 'dzin rnams dmyigs su yod dam/ gzungs kyi sgo gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa
155a6('bum): dang mnyam pa de dag la gzungs kyi sgo rnams dmyigs su yod dam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la
155a7('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dmyigs su yod dam/ myi 'jigs pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la myi 'jigs pa rnams
155a8('bum): dmyigs su yod dam/ so so yang dag par rig pa gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dmyigs
155b1('bum): su yod dam/ byams pa chen po gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la byams pa chen po dmyigs su yod dam/ snying rje chen po gang bsam
155b2('bum): gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la snying rje chen po dmyigs su yod dam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gang bsam gyis myi khyab
155b3('bum): dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de dag la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dmyigs su yod dam/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu gang bsam gyis myi
155b4('bum): khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dmyigs su yod dam/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu gang bsam gyis myi khyab
155b5('bum): dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dmyigs su yod dam/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed
155b6('bum): gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dmyigs su yod dam/ dgra bcom pa nyid gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam
155b7('bum): pa dang mnyam pa de la dgra bcom pa nyid dmyigs su yod dam/ rang byang chub gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rang byang chub dmyigs su
155b8('bum): yod dam/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dmyigs su yod dam/
156a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dmyigs su yod dam/ gsol
156a2('bum): pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bas na rnam grangs 'dis chos thams cad bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa
156a3('bum): dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'di dag ni bsam pa dang bral ba'i phyir bsam gyis myi khyab pa'o/ /dpag pa dang bral ba'i phyir dpag tu myed pa'o/ /tshad
156a4('bum): dang bral ba'i phyir gzhal du myed pa'o/ /mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa dang bral ba'i phyir myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ rab 'byor rnam grangs des na chos thams cad bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal
156a5('bum): du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'di dag ni bsam pa las yongs su 'das pas na/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa'o/ /
156a6('bum): dpag pa las yongs su 'das pas na dpag tu myed pa'o/ /tshad las yongs su 'das pas na gzhal du myed pa'o/ /mnyam pa dang myi mnyam pa las yongs su 'das pas na/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam
156a7('bum): pa'o/ /rab 'byor bsam gyis myi khyab ces bya ba 'di ni bsam du myed pa'i tshig bla dgas so/ /rab 'byor dpag tu myed ces bya ba 'di ni dpag tu myi rung ba'i tshig bla dgas te/ rab
156a8('bum): 'byor gzhal du myed ces bya ba 'di ni tshad myed pa'i tshig bla dgas so/ /rab 'byor myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mnyam pa myed pa'i tshig bla dgas te/
156b1('bum): rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'di dag ni bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed gzhal du myed pa ste/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/ /rab 'byor bsam gyis myi
156b2('bum): khyab ces bya ba ni nam mkha' bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i phyir ro/ /dpag tu myed ces bya ba ni nam mkha' dpag tu myed pa'i phyir ro/ /gzhal du myed ces bya ba ni nam mkha' tshad myed pa'i phyir ro/ /
156b3('bum): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos de dag ni bsam gyis myi khyab dpag tu myed
156b4('bum): gzhal du myed pa/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ de dag ni lha dang myi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis bsam pa'am dpag par myi nus te/ de ltar na sangs rgyas rnams ni gzhal
156b5('bum): du myed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni gzhal du myed do/ /de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa dang dpag tu myed pa dang gzhal du myed pa dang / myi
156b6('bum): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i le'u 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ dge slong lnga brgya nye bar len pa myed par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ /dge slong ma brgya phrag nyi shus nye bar len pa myed
156b7('bum): par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/ /dge bsnyen stong phrag drug cu dang / dge bsnyen ma stong phrag sum cus ni chos rnams la rdul dang bral zhing dri ma dang bral ba'i chos kyi myig rnam
156b8('bum): par dag go/ /byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag nyi shus ni myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob ste/ de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes lung
157a1('bum): bstan to/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u sum cu bzhi'o// // de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
157a2('bum): to/ /bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zab pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don chen po'i slad du nye bar gnas pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
157a3('bum): pa 'di ni don tshad ma mchis pa'i slad du nye bar gnas pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don dpag tu ma mchis pa'i slad du nye bar gnas pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don
157a4('bum): gzhal du ma mchis pa'i slad du nye bar gnas pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i slad du nye bar gnas pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das
157a5('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don chen po'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni
157a6('bum): don bsam gyi myi khyab pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don tshad myed pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don dpag tu myed
157a7('bum): pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab
157a8('bum): mo 'dir ni pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po 'dus so/ /rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dir ni nang stong pa nyid 'dus so/ /phyi stong pa nyid 'dus so/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid 'dus so/ /stong pa
157b1('bum): nyid stong pa nyid 'dus so/ /chen po stong pa nyid 'dus so/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid 'dus so/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid 'dus so/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'dus so/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
157b2('bum): 'dus so/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid 'dus so/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid 'dus so/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'dus so/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'dus so/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'dus
157b3('bum): so/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid 'dus so/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid 'dus so/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'dus so/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'dus so/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi
157b4('bum): 'dus so/ /yang dag par spong ba bzhi 'dus so/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi 'dus so/ /dbang po lnga 'dus so/ /stobs lnga 'dus so/ /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun 'dus so/ /'phags pa'i
157b5('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa 'dus so/ /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi 'dus so/ /bsam gtan bzhi 'dus so/ /tshad myed pa bzhi 'dus so/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi
157b6('bum): 'dus so/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad 'dus so/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu 'dus so/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa
157b7('bum): 'dus so/ /mngon par shes pa rnams 'dus so/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams 'dus so/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'dus so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'dus so/ /myi 'jigs pa bzhi
157b8('bum): 'dus so/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi 'dus so/ /byams pa chen po 'dus so/ /snying rje chen po 'dus so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad 'dus so/ /rgyun tu zhugs
158a1('bum): pa'i 'bras bu 'dus so/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'dus so/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'dus so/ /dgra bcom pa nyid 'dus so/ /rang byang chub 'dus so/ /lam gyi rnam
158a2('bum): pa shes pa nyid 'dus so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'dus so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba srid brtan par gyur pa'i rgyal
158a3('bum): po'i dgos pa 'am/ yul gyi dgos pa gang ci yang rung ste/ de dag thams cad la blon po las su bcug na/ de'i tshe rgyal po ni rgyal po'i dgos pa dang yul gyi dgos pa la snying las chung zhing khur
158a4('bum): bor ba yin/ rab 'byor de bzhin du nyan thos kyi chos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos gang yang rung ste/ de dag

193b3('bum): nem nur myi byed la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan par mngon par dga' zhing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos nas kyang yid la bya ba de dag dang myi 'bral la/ yid la bya
193b4('bum): ba de dag 'gro 'am/ 'ong ngam 'greng ngam/ 'dug gam nyal yang rung ste/ rtag tu rgyun myi 'chad par 'jig par myi byed cing / chos smra ba'i gang zag de la yang rtag tu rgyun myi 'chad par 'brang ste/ rab 'byor dper
193b5('bum): na ba drus ma be'u myi 'dor ba ltar/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di'i don du/ nam shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mngon du ma byas/ dran pas
193b6('bum): 'dris par ma byas/ yid kyis rtogs par ma byas/ lta bas shin tu khong du chud par ma byas kyi bar du chos smra ba de myi gtong na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag de ni myi'i nang
193b7('bum): nas shi 'phos nas myi'i nang du skyes pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu des sngon yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas bzung ba dang /
193b8('bum): bcangs pa dang / klags pa dang / kun chub par byas pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byas par gyur to/ /gong du yang bris shing glegs bam du byas te/ me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang /
194a1('bum): byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan mang pos rim gror byas par gyur to/ /bkur sti dang phu dud dang / mchod pa byas par gyur to/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis
194a2('bum): myi'i nang nas shi 'phos nas/ myi'i nang du skyes te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la yang thos ma thag tu mos par gyur par blta'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
194a3('bum): chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos ma thag tu mos shing / mos par gyur nas kyang 'dri ba dang / bris nas lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton bgyid cing / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa las
194a4('bum): yon tan 'di dag nyid dang ldan zhing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzhan dag la bsnyen bkur bgyid pa las shi 'phos te/ 'dir skyes pa de lta bu'i rnam grangs mchis sam/ ma mchis/ bcom ldan 'das
194a5('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzhan dag la bsnyen bkur byed de/ de byas pa las de nas shi
194a6('bum): 'phos te/ 'dir skyes pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos ma thag tu mos par 'gyur ro/ /mos par byas nas kyang 'dri'o/ /bris nas kyang lung 'bog go/ /kha ton byed do/ /tshul bzhin du
194a7('bum): yid la byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos so/ /thos nas bzung
194a8('bum): ngo bcangs so/ /yongs su bcangs so/ /klags so/ /kun chub par byas so/ /kha ton du byas so/ /tshul bzhin du yid la byas so/ /de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid dang / yid la byed pa de nyid kyis 'dir skyes
194b1('bum): pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' ldan gyi lha rnams dang / skal pa mnyam pa las shi 'phos nas/ myi'i nang du myi dang bskal pa mnyam par skyes na yang
194b2('bum): de ni yon tan de dag nyid dang ldan par rig par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la
194b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yongs su dri ba dang / yongs su brtag pa byas pas/ de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba des 'dir skyes par rig par bya'o// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag
194b4('bum): brgya pa/ bam po bcu gsum pa/ rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos kyang yongs su ma dris/ yongs su rtog pa
194b5('bum): ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gzhan
194b6('bum): yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos kyang yongs su ma dris/ yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
194b7('bum): zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis
194b8('bum): sngon gyi mthar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos kyang yongs su ma dris/ yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur
195a1('bum): sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam par gzhan du 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thos kyang yongs
195a2('bum): su ma dris/ yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du
195a3('bum): 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos kyang yongs su ma dris/ yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab
195a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i
195a5('bum): theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thos kyang yongs su ma dris/ yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par
195a6('bum): 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar nang stong pa nyid thos kyang yongs su ma dris/

195a8('bum): yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar phyi stong pa nyid thos kyang yongs su ma dris/ yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/

195b3('bum): 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar stong pa nyid stong pa nyid thos kyang yongs su ma dris/ yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu

195b5('bum): nyid thos kyang yongs su ma dris/ yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa
195b6('bum): gzhan du 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar don dam pa stong pa nyid thos kyang yongs su ma dris/ yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab
195b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i

196a7('bum): kyang yongs su ma dris/ yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi
196a8('bum): rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar rang bzhin stong pa nyid thos kyang yongs su ma dris/ yongs su brtag pa ma byas
196b1('bum): pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang
196b2('bum): chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar chos thams cad stong pa nyid thos kyang yongs su ma dris/ yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/
