196b4('bum): nyid stong pa nyid thos kyang yongs su ma dris/ yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par

196b6('bum): brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gzhan
196b7('bum): yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid thos kyang yongs su ma dris/ yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo
196b8('bum): 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis
197a1('bum): sngon gyi mthar ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid thos kyang / yongs su ma dris yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par

197a3('bum): yongs su ma dris/ yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du

197a6('bum): pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar yang dag par rig pa bzhi thos kyang yongs su ma dris/ yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/
197a7('bum): sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi thos kyang yongs su ma
197a8('bum): dris/ yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro/ /

197b2('bum): pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar

197b6('bum): gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa thos kyang yongs su ma dris/ yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol
197b7('bum): tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa
197b8('bum): gang gis sngon gyi mthar 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi thos kyang yongs su ma dris/ yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/

198a2('bum): kyang yongs su ma dris/ yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan

198a4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i

198a7('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu thos kyang yongs su ma dris/ yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par
198a8('bum): 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
198b1('bum): dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa thos kyang yongs su ma dris/ yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/
198b2('bum): rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar mngon par shes pa

198b4('bum): sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar ting nge 'dzin rnams thos kyang / yongs su ma dris/ yongs su brtag pa
198b5('bum): ma byas pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gzhan
198b6('bum): yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar gzungs kyi sgo rnams thos kyang yongs su ma dris/ yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab
198b7('bum): mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa
198b8('bum): gang gis sngon gyi mthar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu thos kyang yongs su ma dris/ yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ nem nur du
199a1('bum): 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar myi 'jigs
199a2('bum): pa bzhi thos kyang yongs su ma dris/ yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems
199a3('bum): kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thos kyang yongs su ma dris/ yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/
199a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub
199a5('bum): sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar byams pa chen po thos kyang yongs su ma dris/ yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ nem nur
199a6('bum): du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar/ snying rje chen po thos
199a7('bum): kyang yongs su ma dris/ yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam
199a8('bum): pa gzhan du 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad thos kyang yongs su ma dris/ yongs su brtag
199b1('bum): pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang
199b2('bum): gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar thams cad shes pa nyid thos kyang yongs su ma dris/ yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan
199b3('bum): pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar lam
199b4('bum): gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid thos kyang yongs su ma dris/ yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par
199b5('bum): 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thos kyang yongs su ma dris/
199b6('bum): yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ nem nur du 'gyur/ rmongs par 'gyur/ sems zhum par 'gyur/ sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro/ /
199b7('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis sngon gyi mthar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas/ yongs su brtag pa ma byas te/ nyi ma gcig gam/ gnyis sam/ gsum
199b8('bum): 'am/ bzhi 'am/ lngar rjes su ma 'brangs na/ gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri zhing brtag pa dang / nyi ma gcig gam/ gnyis sam/ gsum 'am/ bzhi
200a1('bum): 'am lngar rjes su 'brang bar byed pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di myi 'phrogs par myi 'gyur ro/ /yongs su dri ba dang yang myi ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
200a2('bum): rab 'byor de ni de ltar yang 'gyur te/ gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yongs su ma dris/ yongs su ma brtags/ rjes 'brang ba ma byas pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
200a3('bum): zab mo 'di mnyan pa la de tsam gyis dge ba'i bsam pa dang / mos pa skye bar 'gyur te/ de ni bar bar mos shing / bar bar mos pa myed par 'gyur te/ de ni ldam ldem gyi blo des 'phrogs shing / shing bal
200a4('bum): gyi 'dab ma bzhin du 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de ni yun ring po nas/ theg pa la zhugs pa ma yin par rig par bya ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su ma
200a5('bum): bzung ba'o/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur ma byas pa'o/ /rab 'byor gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di'i lung ma mnos/ kha
200a6('bum): ton du ma byas la tshul bzhin du yid la ma byas te/ des ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma bslabs so/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma bslabs so/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma
200a7('bum): bslabs so/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ma bslabs so/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma bslabs so/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ma bslabs so/ /nang stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so/ /phyi
200a8('bum): stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so/ /chen po stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid la ma bslabs
200b1('bum): so/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so/ /
200b2('bum): dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid
200b3('bum): la ma bslabs so/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la ma bslabs
200b4('bum): so/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams la ma bslabs so/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la ma bslabs so/ /dbang po rnams la ma bslabs so/ /stobs rnams la ma bslabs so/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la ma
200b5('bum): bslabs so/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la ma bslabs so/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la ma bslabs so/ /bsam gtan rnams la ma bslabs so/ /tshad myed pa rnams la ma bslabs so/ /
200b6('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la ma bslabs so/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad la ma bslabs so/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la ma bslabs so/ /rnam par thar pa'i
200b7('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa la ma bslabs so/ /mngon par shes pa rnams la ma bslabs so/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams la ma bslabs so/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams la ma
200b8('bum): bslabs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la ma bslabs so/ /myi 'jigs pa bzhi la ma bslabs so/ /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la bslabs so/ /byams pa chen po la ma bslabs so/ /
201a1('bum): snying rje chen po la ma bslabs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la ma bslabs so/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la ma bslabs so/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la ma
201a2('bum): bslabs so/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la ma bslabs so/ /dgra bcom pa nyid la ma bslabs so/ /rang byang chub la ma bslabs so/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la ma bslabs so/ /rnam pa thams
201a3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid la ma bslabs so/ /rab 'byor gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs par rig par bya ste/ de ni dad pa tsam dang / dga' ba tsam dang / mos pa
201a4('bum): tsam dang ldan par zad de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bri ba dang / klag pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton du bya ba dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bya bar myi nus so/ /rab 'byor byang
201a5('bum): chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di myi 'dri zhing lung myi 'bog pa dang / kha ton myi byed cing tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed la/ shes
201a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas gzhan la phan myi
201a7('bum): 'dogs pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas gzhan la phan myi 'dogs
201a8('bum): pa dang / nang stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa
201b1('bum): nyid kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la
201b2('bum): phan myi 'dogs pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyis gzhan
201b3('bum): la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs
201b4('bum): pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa
201b5('bum): dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis gzhan la phan myi
201b6('bum): 'dogs pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / dbang po rnams kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs
201b7('bum): pa dang / stobs rnams kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas gzhan la phan myi 'dogs
201b8('bum): pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / bsam gtan rnams kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / tshad myed pa rnams kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa
202a1('bum): dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms
202a2('bum): par 'jug pa dgus gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pas gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams kyis
202a3('bum): gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus gzhan
202a4('bum): la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / byams pa chen pos gzhan la phan myi
202a5('bum): 'dogs pa dang / snying rje chen pos gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bus gzhan la
202a6('bum): phan myi 'dogs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid kyis gzhan
202a7('bum): la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / rang byang chub kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis
202a8('bum): gzhan la phan myi 'dogs pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun par myi spyod/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun par myi spyod/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun
202b1('bum): par myi spyod/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun par myi spyod/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun par myi spyod/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun par myi spyod/ nang stong pa nyid dang mthun par
202b2('bum): myi spyod/ phyi stong pa nyid dang mthun par myi spyod/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dang mthun par myi spyod/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang mthun par myi spyod/ chen po stong pa nyid dang mthun par myi spyod/ don dam pa stong pa
202b3('bum): nyid dang mthun par myi spyod/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang mthun par myi spyod/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang mthun par myi spyod/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang mthun par myi spyod/ thog ma dang
202b4('bum): tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang mthun par myi spyod/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang mthun par myi spyod/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang 'thun par myi spyod/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang 'thun par myi spyod/ rang gi
202b5('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang mthun par myi spyod/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang 'thun par myi spyod/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang 'thun par myi spyod/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang 'thun par myi spyod/ dngos po myed
202b6('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang 'thun par myi spyod/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang 'thun par myi spyod/ yang dag par spong ba rnams dang 'thun par myi spyod/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang 'thun par myi spyod/
202b7('bum): dbang po rnams dang 'thun par myi spyod/ stobs rnams dang 'thun par myi spyod/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang 'thun par myi spyod/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang 'thun par myi spyod/
202b8('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang 'thun par myi spyod/ bsam gtan rnams dang 'thun par myi spyod/ tshad myed pa rnams dang 'thun par myi spyod/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang
203a1('bum): 'thun par myi spyod/ rnam par thar pa brgyad dang 'thun par myi spyod/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang 'thun par myi spyod/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed
203a2('bum): pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang 'thun par myi spyod/ mngon par shes pa rnams dang 'thun par myi spyod/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dang 'thun par myi spyod/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang 'thun par myi spyod/ de bzhin
203a3('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang 'thun par myi spyod/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang 'thun par myi spyod/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang 'thun par myi spyod/ byams pa chen po dang 'thun par myi spyod/ snying rje
203a4('bum): chen po dang 'thun par myi spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang 'thun par myi spyod/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang 'thun par myi spyod/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang 'thun par myi
203a5('bum): spyod/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang 'thun par myi spyod/ dgra bcom pa nyid dang 'thun par myi spyod/ rang byang chub dang 'thun par myi spyod/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang 'thun par myi spyod/ rnam
203a6('bum): par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang 'thun par myi spyod na/ de ni gnas gnyis dang / sa gnyis po las sa cig la gnas par 'gyur te/ de ni 'di ltar nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'o/ /
203a7('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis sngon gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ma bris ma bstan/ kha ton du ma byas/ tshul bzhin du yid la ma
203a8('bum): byas la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phan ma btags/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang 'thun par ma
203b1('bum): spyad pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des gnas gnyis dang / sa gnyis po de las cig la gnas par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o/ /shes rab
203b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u sum bcu lnga'o// // rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ rgya mtsho'i dbus su gru zhig la myi rnams shing ngam/ shing dum 'am/ shing leb 'am/
203b3('bum): rkyal pa 'am/ ro la myi 'ju myi 'dzin na/ rab 'byor myi de dag ni rgya mtsho chen po'i pha rol gyi 'gram du ma phyin par dus byed par rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor myi gang rgya mtsho'i dbus su gru zhig pa'i tshe
203b4('bum): shing ngam shing dum 'am/ shing leb 'am/ rkyal pa 'am/ ro la 'ju zhing 'dzin pa de dag ni rgya mtshor dus byed par myi 'gyur te/ bde zhing nyam nyes myed par rgya mtsho chen po nas pha rol kyi 'gram du
203b5('bum): phyin par 'gyur te/ ma nyes ma nyams par thang la phyin par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo dad pa tsam dang dga' ba tsam dang / mos
203b6('bum): pa tsam dang ldan pa gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di myi 'dri myi ston/ kha ton du myi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rten pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa myi 'dri myi ston
203b7('bum): kha ton du myi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rten pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myi 'dri myi ston/ kha ton du myi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rten pa dang /
203b8('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myi 'dri myi ston/ kha ton du myi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rten pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myi 'dri myi ston/ kha ton du myi byed/
204a1('bum): tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rten pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myi 'dri myi ston/ kha ton du myi byed tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rten pa dang / nang stong pa nyid myi 'dri
204a2('bum): myi ston/ kha ton du myi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rten pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid myi 'dri myi ston/ kha ton du myi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rten pa dang / phyi
204a3('bum): nang stong pa nyid myi 'dri myi ston/ kha ton du myi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rten pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myi 'dri myi ston/ kha ton du myi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid
204a4('bum): la myi byed cing myi rten pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid myi 'dri myi ston/ kha ton du myi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rten pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid myi 'dri myi ston/ kha
204a5('bum): ton du myi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rten pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid myi 'dri myi ston/ kha ton du myi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rten pa dang / 'dus ma byas
204a6('bum): stong pa nyid myi 'dri myi ston/ kha ton du myi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rten pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid myi 'dri myi ston/ kha ton du myi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid
204a7('bum): la myi byed cing myi rten pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid myi 'dri myi ston/ kha ton du myi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rten pa dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid myi 'dri
204a8('bum): myi ston kha ton du myi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rten pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid myi 'dri myi ston/ kha ton du myi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rten pa dang /
204b1('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid myi 'dri myi ston/ kha ton du myi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rten pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myi 'dri myi ston/ kha ton du myi byed/ tshul bzhin
204b2('bum): du yid la myi byed cing myi rten pa dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myi 'dri myi ston/ kha ton du myi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rten pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid myi 'dri myi
204b3('bum): ston/ kha ton du myi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rten pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi 'dri myi ston/ kha ton du myi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rten pa dang /
204b4('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi 'dri myi ston/ kha ton du myi byed tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rten pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams myi 'dri myi ston/ kha ton du
204b5('bum): myi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rten pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams myi 'dri myi ston kha ton du myi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rten pa dang / rdzu 'phrul
204b6('bum): gyi rkang pa rnams myi 'dri myi ston/ kha ton du myi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rten pa dang / dbang po rnams myi 'dri myi ston kha ton du myi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la myi
204b7('bum): byed cing myi rten pa dang / stobs rnams myi 'dri myi ston kha ton du myi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rten pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams myi 'dri myi ston/ kha ton du myi
204b8('bum): byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rten pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myi 'dri myi ston/ kha ton du myi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rten pa dang /
205a1('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams myi 'dri myi ston/ kha ton du myi byed tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rten pa dang / bsam gtan rnams myi 'dri myi ston/ kha ton du myi byed/ tshul bzhin du
205a2('bum): yid la myi byed cing myi rten pa dang / tshad myed pa rnams myi 'dri myi ston/ kha ton du myi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rten pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams myi
205a3('bum): 'dri myi ston/ kha ton du myi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rten pa dang / rnam par thar pa rnams myi 'dri myi ston/ kha ton du myi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rten pa dang / mthar
205a4('bum): kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu myi 'dri myi ston/ kha ton du myi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rten pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang /
205a5('bum): smon pa myed pa myi 'dri myi ston/ kha ton du myi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rten pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams myi 'dri myi ston/ kha ton du myi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing
205a6('bum): myi rten pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams myi 'dri myi ston/ kha ton du myi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rten pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams myi 'dri myi ston/ kha ton du myi byed/ tshul bzhin du
205a7('bum): yid la myi byed cing myi rten pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu myi 'dri myi ston/ kha ton du myi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rten pa dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi myi 'dri myi ston/
205a8('bum): kha ton du myi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing / myi rten pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi myi 'dri myi ston/ kha ton du myi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rten pa dang /
205b1('bum): byams pa chen po myi 'dri myi ston/ kha ton du myi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rten pa dang / snying rje chen po myi 'dri myi ston/ kha ton du myi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing
205b2('bum): myi rten pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad myi 'dri myi ston/ kha ton du myi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rten pa dang / thams cad shes pa nyid myi 'dri myi ston/ kha ton du
205b3('bum): myi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rten pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid myi 'dri myi ston/ kha ton du myi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rten pa dang / rnam pa thams
205b4('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid myi 'dri myi ston/ kha ton du myi byed/ tshul bzhin du yid la myi byed cing myi rten pa de dag ni bar ma dor byang chub las nyams par 'gyur te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
205b5('bum): nyid ma thob par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa mngon du byed par 'gyur/ rab 'byor gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
205b6('bum): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i don du dad pa yod cing / bzod pa dang mos pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / dga' ba dang / spro ba dang / myi gtong ba yang yod cing / brtson 'grus myi 'dor ba de
205b7('bum): dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri'o/ /lung 'bog go/ /kha ton du byed do/ /tshul bzhin du yid la byed do/ /rten par byed do/ /de ltar na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni bla
205b8('bum): na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dad pa yod/ bzod pa yod/ mos pa yod/ lhag pa'i bsam pa yod/ dga' ba yod/ spro ba yod/ myi gtong ba yod/ brtson 'grus myi 'dor ba
206a1('bum): yod pa yin te/ de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas/ yongs su bzung ba dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas
206a2('bum): yongs su bzung ba dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba dang / nang stong pa
206a3('bum): nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / chen po
206a4('bum): stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su
206a5('bum): bzung ba dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /
206a6('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / myi dmyigs pa stong
206a7('bum): pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis
206a8('bum): yongs su bzung ba dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / yang dag par spong bas yongs su bzung ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pas yongs su bzung ba dang / dbang
206b1('bum): pos yongs su bzung ba dang / stobs kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / byang chub kyi yan lag gis yongs su bzung ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yongs su bzung ba dang / 'phags pa'i bden
206b2('bum): pas yongs su bzung ba dang / bsam gtan gyis yongs su bzung ba dang / tshad myed pas yongs su bzung ba dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pas yongs su bzung ba dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad
206b3('bum): kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus yongs su bzung ba dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pas yongs su bzung
206b4('bum): ba dang / mngon par shes pas yongs su bzung ba dang / ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs su bzung ba dang / gzungs kyi sgos yongs su bzung ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yongs su bzung ba
206b5('bum): dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhis yongs su bzung ba dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis yongs su bzung ba dang / byams pa chen pos yongs su bzung ba dang / snying rje chen pos yongs su bzung ba dang / sangs
206b6('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres bco brgyad kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / rnam pa thams cad
206b7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas/ bar ma dor nye zho myed par nyan thos kyi sa las 'das/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das te/ sems can yongs su smin par byas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs
206b8('bum): su dag par byas te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na/ bud myed dam skyes pa la la zhig gis
207a1('bum): bum pa ma bsregs shing / so ma btang bas chu bcu bar sems na/ rab 'byor bum pa de ni ring por myi gnas te/ myur tu gyes shing 'jig par rig par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni
207a2('bum): bum pa de so ma btang ba'i phyir te/ de ni tha mar sa nyid du 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag la yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
207a3('bum): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i phyir dad pa yang yod/ bzod pa yang yod/ mos pa yang yod/ lhag pa'i bsam pa yang yod/ dga' ba yang yod/ spro ba yang yod/ myi gtong ba
207a4('bum): yang yod/ brtson 'grus myi 'dor ba yang yod mod kyi/ de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / thabs mkhas pas yongs su ma bzung / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma
207a5('bum): bzung / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
207a6('bum): pas yongs su ma bzung / nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su
207a7('bum): ma bzung / chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su
207a8('bum): ma bzung / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / rang bzhin
207b1('bum): stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /
207b2('bum): dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis yongs
207b3('bum): su ma bzung / yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / dbang po rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / stobs rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /
207b4('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yongs su ma bzung / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / bsam gtan rnams kyis yongs
207b5('bum): su ma bzung / tshad myed pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis yongs su ma bzung / mthar kyis
207b6('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus yongs su ma bzung / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pas yongs su ma bzung / mngon par shes pa lngas yongs su ma
207b7('bum): bzung / ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yongs su ma bzung / myi 'jigs pa bzhis yongs su
207b8('bum): ma bzung / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis yongs su ma bzung / byams pa chen pos yongs su ma bzung / snying rje chen pos yongs su ma bzung / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis
208a1('bum): yongs su ma bzung / thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongs su
208a2('bum): ma bzung na/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni bar ma dor nye zhor 'gyur bar shes par bya'o// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/
208a3('bum): bam po bcu bzhi pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis bar ma dor nye zhor 'byung ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas
208a4('bum): kyi sa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na skyes pa 'am/ bud myed la la zhig bum pa so legs par btang bas chu klung ngam/ 'tsho 'am mtshe'u 'am/ khron pa nas chu 'chu na/ rab 'byor chu 'chu ba de'i bum
208a5('bum): pa des ni bde bar khyim du phyin par rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir dad pa yang yod/ bzod
208a6('bum): pa yang yod/ mos pa yang yod/ lhag pa'i bsam pa yang yod/ dga' ba yang yod/ spro ba yang yod/ myi gtong ba yang yod/ brtson 'grus myi 'dor ba yang yod la de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
208a7('bum): phyin pas yongs su bzung / thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung / bzod pa'i pha rol
208a8('bum): tu phyin pas yongs su bzung / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung / nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / phyi stong pa nyid kyis
208b1('bum): yongs su bzung / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /
208b2('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su
208b3('bum): bzung / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /
208b4('bum): myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung /
208b5('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pas yongs su bzung / yang dag par spong bas yongs su bzung / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pas yongs su bzung / dbang pos yongs su bzung / stobs kyis yongs su bzung / byang chub kyi
208b6('bum): yan lag gis yongs su bzung / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yongs su bzung / 'phags pa'i bden pas yongs su bzung / bsam gtan gyis yongs su bzung / tshad myed pas yongs su
208b7('bum): bzung / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pas yongs su bzung / rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis yongs su bzung / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus yongs su bzung / rnam par thar
208b8('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pas yongs su bzung / mngon par shes pas yongs su bzung / ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs su bzung / gzungs kyi sgos yongs su bzung / de bzhin
209a1('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yongs su bzung / myi 'jigs pa bzhis yongs su bzung / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis yongs su bzung / byams pa chen pos yongs su bzung / snying rje chen
209a2('bum): pos yongs su bzung / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyis yongs su bzung / thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / rnam pa thams
209a3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar bar ma dor nye zhor myi 'gyur te/ ma nyes ma nyams
209a4('bum): par bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ rgya mtsho'i gru ma bsdams shing / zag klan ma byas par rdzas bcug
209a5('bum): te chu la btang na/ rab 'byor gru de zhig par 'gyur te/ gru yang logs shig /rdzas kyang logs shig tu song nas/ de ltar tshong pa de thabs myi mkhas pas/ gnod pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyur zhing /
209a6('bum): rin po che chen po las yongs su 'phang bar rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir dad pa yang
209a7('bum): yod/ bzod pa yang yod/ mos pa yang yod/ lhag pa'i bsam pa yang yod/ dga' ba yang yod/ spro ba yang yod/ myi gtong ba yang yod/ brtson 'grus myi gtong ba yang yod mod kyi/ de shes rab kyi
209a8('bum): pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / thabs mkhas pas yongs su ma bzung / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung /
209b1('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /
209b2('bum): phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / don dam pa stong pa
209b3('bum): nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / thog ma dang
209b4('bum): tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung /
209b5('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su
209b6('bum): ma bzung / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / rdzu 'phrul
209b7('bum): gyi rkang pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / dbang po rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / stobs rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / 'phags pa'i lam
209b8('bum): yan lag brgyad pas yongs su ma bzung / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / bsam gtan rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / tshad myed pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / gzugs myed
210a1('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis yongs su ma bzung / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus yongs su ma bzung / rnam par
210a2('bum): thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pas yongs su ma bzung / mngon par shes pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / gzungs kyi sgo
210a3('bum): rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yongs su ma bzung / myi 'jigs pa bzhis yongs su ma bzung / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis yongs su ma bzung / byams pa
210a4('bum): chen pos yongs su ma bzung / snying rje chen pos yongs su ma bzung / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyis yongs su ma bzung / thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / lam gyi
210a5('bum): rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bar ma dor nye zhor 'gyur te/
210a6('bum): 'di ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rin po che'i don chen po dang bral zhing rin po che chen po las 'phang bar rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bar ma
210a7('bum): dor nye zhor gang zhe na/ 'di ltar ste nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can la la zhig rgya mtsho chen po'i gru shin tu bsdams shing
210a8('bum): shin tu bstar ba chu la gtong zhing rdzas 'jug na/ rab 'byor rgya mtsho'i gru de ni bar ma dor zhig par myi 'gyur te/ gru des phyogs gang du bgrod pa der phyin par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor de
210b1('bum): bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir dad pa yang yod/ bzod pa yang yod/ mos pa yang yod/ lhag pa'i bsam pa yang yod/ dga'
210b2('bum): ba yang yod/ spro ba yang yod/ myi gtong ba yang yod/ brtson 'grus myi 'dor ba yang yod la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung / thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung / bsam gtan gyi pha rol
210b3('bum): tu phyin pas yongs su bzung / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas
210b4('bum): yongs su bzung / nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / chen po stong pa nyid kyis
210b5('bum): yongs su bzung / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su bzung / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis
210b6('bum): yongs su bzung / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / chos thams cad stong pa nyid
210b7('bum): kyis yongs su bzung / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis
210b8('bum): yongs su bzung / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung / yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis yongs su bzung / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
211a1('bum): pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung / dbang po rnams kyis yongs su bzung / stobs rnams kyis yongs su bzung / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongs su bzung / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
211a2('bum): brgyad pas yongs su bzung / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung / bsam gtan rnams kyis yongs su bzung / tshad myed pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par
211a3('bum): 'jug pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung / rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis yongs su bzung / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus yongs su bzung / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
211a4('bum): ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pas yongs su bzung / mngon par shes pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung / ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis yongs su bzung / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis yongs su bzung / de bzhin
211a5('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yongs su bzung / myi 'jigs pa bzhis yongs su bzung / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis yongs su bzung / byams pa chen pos yongs su bzung / snying rje chen pos
211a6('bum): yongs su bzung / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyis yongs su bzung / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / rnam pa thams
211a7('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bar ma dor nye zhor myi 'gyur bar rig par bya'o/ /
211a8('bum): rab 'byor de ni de ltar yang 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir dad pa yang yod/ bzod pa yang yod/ mos pa yang yod/

212b2('bum): sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das de ni khri las ldang nus su lags kyang / rgyang grags cig gam/ rgyang grags gnyis su yang mchi bar myi nus te/ de rgas pa dang / bro

215b1('bum): su bzung / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis yongs su bzung / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yongs su bzung / myi 'jigs pa bzhis yongs su bzung / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis yongs su bzung / byams
