215b3('bum): nyid kyis yongs su bzung / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bar ma dor nye zhor myi 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
215b4('bum): chen po de ni 'di lta ste/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi gnas der phyin par nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ltar des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa dang ma bral ba'i phyir ro/ /
215b5('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa dang ma bral bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ba lags/
215b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor khyod de ltar gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnams kyi don du de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di 'dri bar sems dpa' legs so/ /legs so/ /rab 'byor
215b7('bum): 'di la gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa thog mar sbyin pa yongs su gtong na/ de bdag dang bdag gir ltung ba'i sems kyis sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing / tshul khrims srung ba dang / bzod pa sgom
215b8('bum): pa dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / shes rab sgom na/ de yang bdag dang bdag gir lhung ba'i sems kyis shes rab sgom ste/ de sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/
216a1('bum): 'di snyam du sems te bdag ni sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo / /'di la sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo / /bdag ni sbyin pa byed pa'o/ /bdag ni tshul khrims srung ngo / /tshul khrims ni 'di srung ngo / /bdag ni tshul khrims
216a2('bum): dang ldan no/ /bdag ni bzod pa sgom mo/ /bzod pa ni 'di sgom mo/ /bdag ni bzod pa dang ldan pa'o/ /bdag ni brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /brtson 'grus ni 'di rtsom mo/ /bdag ni brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'o/ /bdag ni
216a3('bum): bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug go/ /bsam gtan 'di dag la snyoms par 'jug go/ /bdag ni bsam gtan dang ldan pa'o/ /bdag ni shes rab sgom mo/ /shes rab ni 'di sgom mo/ /bdag ni shes rab dang ldan pa'o snyam
216a4('bum): nas/ de sbyin pa rlom sems su byed/ sbyin pas rlom sems su byed/ bdag ni sbyin pa byed pa'o zhes rlom sems su byed/ de tshul khrims rlom sems su byed/ tshul khrims kyis rloms su byed/ bdag ni tshul
216a5('bum): khrims dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su byed/ de bzod pa rlom sems su byed/ bzod pas rlom sems su byed/ bdag ni bzod pa dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su byed/ de brtson 'grus rlom sems su byed/
216a6('bum): brtson 'grus kyis rlom sems su byed/ bdag ni brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su byed/ de bsam gtan rlom sems su byed/ bsam gtan gyis rlom sems su byed/ bdag ni bsam
216a7('bum): gtan dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su byed/ de shes rab rlom sems su byed/ shes rab kyis rlom sems su byed/ bdag ni shes rab dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su byed do/ /de ci'i phyir
216a8('bum): zhe na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa de dag myed de/ ring du song bas ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa de dag myed de/ ring du song ba ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol
216b1('bum): tu phyin pa'o/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa de dag myed de/ ring du song ba ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa de dag myed de/ ring du song ba ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
216b2('bum): phyin pa'o/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa de dag myed de/ ring du song ba ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog pa de dag myed de/ ring du song ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol
216b3('bum): tu phyin pa'o/ /de lta yin yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de ni ring du song ba yang myi shes/ pha rol yang myi shes te/ de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
216b4('bum): phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / shes
216b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis
216b6('bum): yongs su ma bzung / chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs
216b7('bum): su ma bzung / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / rang bzhin stong pa nyid
216b8('bum): kyis yongs su ma bzung / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / dngos po myed pa
217a1('bum): stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung /
217a2('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / dbang po rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / stobs rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
217a3('bum): kyis yongs su ma bzung / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yongs su ma bzung / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / bsam gtan rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / tshad myed pa rnams
217a4('bum): kyis yongs su ma bzung / gzugs myed pa snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis yongs su ma bzung / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus yongs su ma
217a5('bum): bzung / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pas yongs su ma bzung / mngon par shes pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / gzungs
217a6('bum): kyi sgo rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yongs su ma bzung / myi 'jigs pa bzhis yongs su ma bzung / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis yongs su ma bzung / byams pa
217a7('bum): chen pos yongs su ma bzung / snying rje chen pos yongs su ma bzung / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyis yongs su ma bzung / thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / lam gyi rnam
217a8('bum): par shes pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
217b1('bum): nyid du myi 'byung ngo / /rab 'byor de ji ltar na gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa thabs myi mkhas pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa thog mar thabs myed par sbyin pa
217b2('bum): yongs su gtong / thabs myed par tshul khrims srung / thabs myed par bzod par sgom/ thabs myed par brtson 'grus rtsom/ thabs myed par bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug /thabs myed par shes
217b3('bum): rab sgom zhing / de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag ni sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo / /sbyin pa ni 'di yongs su gtong ngo / /'di la ni sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo / /bdag ni tshul khrims srung ngo / /tshul khrims ni 'di srung ngo / /bdag
217b4('bum): ni bzod pa sgom mo/ /bzod pa ni 'di sgom mo/ /bdag ni brtson 'grus brtsom mo/ /brtson 'grus ni 'di rtsom mo/ /bdag ni bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug go/ /bsam gtan ni 'di dag la snyoms par 'jug go/ /
217b5('bum): bdag ni shes rab sgom mo/ /shes rab ni 'di sgom mo/ /zhes de sbyin pa rlom sems su byed/ sbyin pas rlom sems su byed/ bdag ni sbyin pa byed pa'o/ /zhes rlom sems su byed/ de tshul khrims rlom sems su byed/
217b6('bum): tshul khrims kyis rlom sems su byed/ bdag ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su byed/ de bzod pa rlom sems su byed/ bzod pas rlom sems su byed/ bdag ni bzod pa dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems
217b7('bum): su byed/ de brtson 'grus rlom sems su byed/ brtson 'grus kyis rlom sems su byed/ bdag ni brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su byed/ de bsam gtan rlom sems su byed/ bsam gtan gyis rlom
217b8('bum): sems su byed/ bdag ni bsam gtan dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su byed/ de shes rab rlom sems su byed/ shes rab kyis rlom sems su byed/ bdag ni shes rab dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su
218a1('bum): byed pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ji ltar de rnam par rtog pa'i rtog pa de dag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa myed
218a2('bum): pa'o/ /ji ltar de rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa'o/ /ji ltar
218a3('bum): de rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa'o/ /ji ltar de rnam par rtog pa'i rnam
218a4('bum): par rtog pa de dag brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa'o/ /ji ltar de rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par rtog pa de
218a5('bum): dag bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa'o/ /ji ltar de rnam pa rtog pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag shes rab
218a6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa'o/ /de ltar yin yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de ni ring du song ba yang myi shes/
218a7('bum): pha rol kyang myi shes te/ de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
218a8('bum): phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung / nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma
218b1('bum): bzung / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su
218b2('bum): ma bzung / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyis
218b3('bum): yongs su ma bzung / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyis
218b4('bum): yongs su ma bzung / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams
218b5('bum): kyis yongs su ma bzung / yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / dbang po rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / stobs rnams kyis yongs
218b6('bum): su ma bzung / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yongs su ma bzung / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / bsam gtan
218b7('bum): rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / tshad myed pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis yongs su ma bzung / mthar kyis gnas
218b8('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus yongs su ma bzung / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pas yongs su ma bzung / mngon par shes pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis
219a1('bum): yongs su ma bzung / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yongs su ma bzung / myi 'jigs pa bzhis yongs su ma bzung / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis yongs su
219a2('bum): ma bzung / byams pa chen pos yongs su ma bzung / snying rje chen pos yongs su ma bzung / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis yongs su ma bzung / thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / lam gyi rnam par shes
219a3('bum): pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung bas nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du myi 'byung ngo / /rab 'byor ji ltar gang zag
219a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung ba nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung zhing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'grub par
219a5('bum): 'gyur ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa thog mar sbyin pa yongs su gtong na/ bdag dang bdag gir bya bar ma ltung ba'i sems kyis sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo / /tshul
219a6('bum): khrims srung na/ bdag dang bdag gir bya bar ma lhung ba'i sems kyis tshul khrims srung ngo / /bzod pa sgom na/ bdag dang bdag gir bya bar ma lhung ba'i sems kyis bzod pa sgom mo/ /brtson 'grus rtsom na bdag
219a7('bum): dang bdag gir bya bar ma lhung ba'i sems kyis brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /bsam gtan sgom na/ bdag dang bdag gir bya bar ma lhung ba'i sems kyis bsam gtan sgom mo/ /shes rab sgom na/ bdag dang bdag gir bya bar
219a8('bum): ma lhung ba'i sems kyis shes rab sgom ste/ de 'di snyam du bdag ni sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo / /'di la sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhes bya bar myi sems so/ /bdag ni tshul khrims srung ngo / /tshul khrims ni 'di srung ngo / /
219b1('bum): zhes bya bar myi sems so/ /bdag ni bzod pa sgom mo/ /bzod pa ni 'di sgom mo zhes bya bar myi sems so/ /bdag ni brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /brtson 'grus ni 'di rtsom mo zhes bya bar myi sems so/ /bdag ni bsam gtan la snyoms
219b2('bum): par 'jug go/ /bsam gtan ni 'di dag la snyoms par 'jug go zhes bya bar myi sems so/ /bdag ni shes rab sgom mo/ /shes rab ni 'di sgom mo zhes bya bar myi sems te/ de sbyin pa rlom sems su myi byed sbyin pas rlom sems su myi
219b3('bum): byed/ bdag ni sbyin pa byed pa'o zhes bya bar rlom sems su myi byed do/ /tshul khrims rlom sems su myi byed/ tshul khrims kyis rlom sems su myi byed/ bdag ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o zhes bya bar rlom sems su myi byed
219b4('bum): do/ /bzod pa rlom sems su myi byed/ bzod pas rloms su myi byed/ bdag ni bzod pa dang ldan pa'o zhes bya bar sems su myi byed do/ /brtson 'grus rlom sems su myi byed/ brtson 'grus kyis rlom sems su myi byed/
219b5('bum): bdag ni brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'o zhes bya bar rlom sems su myi byed do/ /bsam gtan rlom sems su myi byed/ bsam gtan gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ bdag ni bsam gtan dang ldan pa'o zhes bya bar rlom sems su myi
219b6('bum): byed do/ /shes rab rlom sems su myi byed/ shes rab kyis rlom sems su myi byed/ bdag ni shes rab dang ldan pa'o zhes bya bar rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang gis de rlom sems su byed
219b7('bum): pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la myed de/ 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa'o/ /de ni 'di ltar de rlom sems su byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
219b8('bum): pa la myed de/ 'di ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa'o/ /de ni 'di ltar de rlom sems su byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la myed de/ 'di ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
220a1('bum): pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa'o/ /de ni 'di ltar de rlom sems su byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag ni/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myed de/ 'di ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa'o/ /
220a2('bum): de ni 'di ltar de rlom sems su byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myed de/ 'di ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa'o/ /de ni 'di ltar de rlom sems su byed pa'i rnam par
220a3('bum): rtog pa de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myed de/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa'o/ /de ltar yin la gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de yang ring du song ba shes shing pha rol shes
220a4('bum): te/ des kyang rlom sems su myi byed cing / de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /tshul
220a5('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung
220a6('bum): bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/
220a7('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/
220a8('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
220b1('bum): pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /phyi stong pa nyid
220b2('bum): kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
220b3('bum): kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
220b4('bum): pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /don
220b5('bum): dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su
220b6('bum): bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/
220b7('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/
220b8('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
221a1('bum): pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang
221a2('bum): 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /
221a3('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /rang gi mtshan nyid
221a4('bum): stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs
221a5('bum): su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan
221a6('bum): thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs
221a7('bum): rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang
221a8('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
221b1('bum): sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa
221b2('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
221b3('bum): kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /dbang po rnams kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /stobs rnams
221b4('bum): kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongs su bzung bas/
221b5('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/
221b6('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/
221b7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /bsam gtan bzhis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub
221b8('bum): par 'gyur ro/ /tshad myed pa bzhis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms
222a1('bum): par 'jug pa bzhis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /rnam pa thar pa brgyad kyis yongs su
222a2('bum): bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus yongs su bzung bas/
222a3('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed
222a4('bum): pas yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /mngon par shes pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan
222a5('bum): thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
222a6('bum): sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa
222a7('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad
222a8('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /myi 'jigs pa bzhis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /
222b1('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /byams pa chen
222b2('bum): pos yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /snying rje chen pos yongs su bzung bas/ nyan
222b3('bum): thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan
222b4('bum): thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/
222b5('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
222b6('bum): kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
222b7('bum): sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bcwo lnga pa/
222b8('bum): rab 'byor de ltar gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba/ thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung ba/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs
223a1('bum): su bzung ba/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba/
223a2('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba/ nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ stong pa nyid
223a3('bum): stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ 'dus
223a4('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid
223a5('bum): kyis yongs su bzung ba/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ myi dmyigs
223a6('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis
223a7('bum): yongs su bzung ba/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba/
223a8('bum): dbang po rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba/ stobs rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yongs su bzung
223b1('bum): ba/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba/ bsam gtan rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba/ tshad myed pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba/ gzugs myed pa snyoms par 'jug pa
223b2('bum): rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba/ rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis yongs su bzung ba/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus yongs su bzung ba/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
223b3('bum): mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pas yongs su bzung ba/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis yongs
223b4('bum): su bzung ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yongs su bzung ba/ myi 'jigs pa bzhis yongs su bzung ba/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis yongs su bzung ba/ byams pa
223b5('bum): chen pos yongs su bzung ba/ snying rje chen pos yongs su bzung ba/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyis yongs su bzung ba/ thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongs
223b6('bum): su bzung ba/ lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba de nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ngo / /rab 'byor ji ltar na
223b7('bum): gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa thog mar thabs dang ldan par sbyin pa
223b8('bum): yongs su gtong / thabs dang ldan par tshul khrims srung / thabs dang ldan par bzod pa sgom/ thabs dang ldan par brtson 'grus rtsom/ thabs dang ldan par bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug /thabs
224a1('bum): dang ldan par shes rab sgom zhing / 'di ltar de bdag ni sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo / /sbyin pa 'di yongs su gtong ngo / /'di la sbyin pa yongs su gtang ngo snyam du myi sems
224a2('bum): so/ /'di ltar bdag ni tshul khrims srung ngo / /tshul khrims ni 'di srung ngo snyam du myi sems so/ /'di ltar bdag ni bzod pa bsgom mo/ /bzod pa ni 'di sgom mo snyam du myi sems so/ /
224a3('bum): 'di ltar bdag ni brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /brtson 'grus ni 'di rtsom mo snyam du myi sems so/ /'di ltar bdag ni bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug go/ /bsam gtan ni 'di dag
224a4('bum): la snyoms par 'jug go snyam du myi sems so/ /'di ltar bdag ni shes rab sgom mo/ /shes rab ni 'di sgom mo snyam du myi sems so/ /de sbyin pa rlom sems su myi byed/ sbyin pas
224a5('bum): rlom sems su myi byed/ bdag ni sbyin pa byed pa'o zhes rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de tshul khrims rlom sems su myi byed/ tshul khrims kyis rlom sems su myi byed/ bdag ni tshul
224a6('bum): khrims dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de bzod pa rlom sems su myi byed/ bzod pas rlom sems su myi byed/ bdag ni bzod pa dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su
224a7('bum): myi byed do/ /de brtson 'grus rlom sems su myi byed/ brtson 'grus kyis rlom sems su myi byed/ bdag ni brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de bsam
224a8('bum): gtan rlom sems su myi byed/ bsam gtan gyis rlom sems su myi byed do/ /bdag ni bsam gtan pa'o zhes rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de shes rab rlom sems su myi byed/
224b1('bum): shes rab kyis rlom sems su myi byed/ bdag ni shes rab dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su myi byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ltar de rnam par myi rtog pas sbyin pa'i pha rol
224b2('bum): tu phyin pa la rnam par rtog pa de dag myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa'o/ /de ltar de rnam
224b3('bum): par myi rtog pas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la rnam par rtog pa de dag myed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
224b4('bum): de ni pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa'o/ /de ltar de rnam par myi rtog pas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par rtog pa de dag myed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'di
224b5('bum): lta ste/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa'o/ /de ltar de rnam par myi rtog pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par rtog pa de dag myed de/
224b6('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa'o/ /de ltar de rnam par rtog pas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
224b7('bum): phyin pa la rnam par rtog pa de dag myed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa'o/ /de ltar de rnam par myi
224b8('bum): rtog pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par rtog pa de dag myed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa'o/ /
225a1('bum): de lta yang yin la/ gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de ring du song ba yang shes shing / pha rol shes kyang des rlom sems myed de/ de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas
225a2('bum): yongs su bzung ba dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs
225a3('bum): su bzung ba dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba dang / thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung ba dang /
225a4('bum): nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba
225a5('bum): dang / chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa
225a6('bum): nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / dor ba myed pa stong
225a7('bum): pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
225a8('bum): kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs
225b1('bum): su bzung ba dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams
225b2('bum): kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / dbang po rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / stobs rnams kyis yongs su bzung
225b3('bum): ba dang / byang chub kyis yan lag rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yongs su bzung ba dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhis
225b4('bum): yongs su bzung ba dang / bsam gtan bzhis yongs su bzung ba dang / tshad myed pa bzhis yongs su bzung ba dang / gzugs myed pa snyoms par 'jug pa bzhis yongs
225b5('bum): su bzung ba dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus yongs su bzung ba dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo
225b6('bum): stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pas yongs su bzung ba dang / mngon par shes pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis yongs su
225b7('bum): bzung ba dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yongs su bzung ba dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhis yongs su bzung ba
225b8('bum): dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis yongs su bzung ba dang / byams pa chen pos yongs su bzung ba dang / snying rje chen pos yongs su bzung ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos
226a1('bum): ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /
226a2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /
226a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u sum cu rtsa drug go// // de nas tshe dang ldan par rab 'byor kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
226a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol
226a5('bum): tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar tshul khrims
226a6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la las dang po pa'i byang chub
226a7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par 'dod pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par 'dod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
226a8('bum): phyin pa la bslab par 'dod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par 'dod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par 'dod pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
226b1('bum): phyin pa la bslab par 'dod pas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
226b2('bum): phyin pa ston pa/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin ston pa/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa/ de dag la bsten par bya'o/ /bsnyen par bya'o/ /
226b3('bum): bsnyen bkur bar bya'o/ /de dag de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu sbyin pa gang dang gang sbyin pa de thams cad bla na myed pa yang dag par
226b4('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngos shig / tshur rigs kyi bu tshul khrims gang dang gang srung ba de thams cad bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngos
226b5('bum): shig / tshur rigs kyi bu bzod pa gang dang gang sgrub pa de thams cad bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sngos shig /tshur rigs kyi bu brtson 'grus gang dang
226b6('bum): gang rtsom pa de thams cad bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngos shig / tshur rigs kyi bu bsam gtan gang dang gang la snyoms par 'jug pa de thams
226b7('bum): cad bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngos shig / tshur rigs kyi bu shes rab gang dang gang sgom pa de thams cad bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
226b8('bum): tu sngos shig / tshur rigs kyi bu khyod bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub gzugs su rtog par ma byed cig /tshor ba rtog par ma byed cig /'du shes su rtog par
227a1('bum): ma byed cig / 'du byed du rtog par ma byed cig /rnam par shes par rtog par ma byed cig /myig tu rtog par ma byed cig /rna bar rtog par ma byed cig /snar rtog par ma
227a2('bum): byed cig / lcer rtog par ma byed cig /lus su rtog par ma byed cig /yid du rtog par ma byed cig /gzugs su rtog par ma byed cig /sgrar rtog par ma byed cig /drir rtog par
227a3('bum): ma byed cig / ror rtog par ma byed cig /reg tu rtog par ma byed cig /chos su rtog par ma byed cig /myig gi rnam par shes par rtog par ma byed cig /rna ba'i rnam par shes par
227a4('bum): rtog par ma byed cig / sna'i rnam par shes par rtog par ma byed cig /lce'i rnam par shes par rtog par ma byed cig /lus kyi rnam par shes par rtog par ma byed cig /yid kyi
227a5('bum): rnam par shes par rtog par ma byed cig / myig gi 'dus te reg par rtog par ma byed cig /rna ba'i 'dus te reg par rtog par ma byed cig /sna'i 'dus te reg par rtog par ma byed cig /
227a6('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg par rtog par ma byed cig /lus kyi 'dus te reg par rtog par ma byed cig /yid kyi 'dus te reg par rtog par ma byed cig /myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar
227a7('bum): rtog par ma byed cig / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar rtog par ma byed cig /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar rtog par ma byed cig /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis
227a8('bum): tshor bar rtog par ma byed cig / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar rtog par ma byed cig /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar rtog par ma byed cig /rigs kyi bu khyod

238a5('bum): na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa/ 'khor ba na yod pa'i sdug bsngal gang ci yang rung ste/ de dag las sems can rnams yongs su skyob cing /

238a7('bum): sems dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas 'jig rten gyi mgon byed pa yin no/ /rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
238a8('bum): sems dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa/ 'jig rten gyi skyabs su gyur pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems
238b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa/ sems can skye ba'i chos can dang sems can rga ba'i chos can dang /
238b2('bum): sems can na ba'i chos can dang / sems can 'chi ba'i chos can dang / sems can mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid myi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa'i chos can rnams skye
238b3('bum): ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid myi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs su bkrol zhing / phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan
238b4('bum): las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las zlo ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
238b5('bum): rgya bar 'dod pa/ 'jig rten gyi skyabs su gyur pa yin no/ /rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
238b6('bum): 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa/ sems can rnams kyi rten du gyur pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
238b7('bum): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa/ chos thams cad 'dre ba myed par chos ston te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
238b8('bum): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa/ sems can rnams kyi rten du gyur pa yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na chos thams cad 'dre ba ma mchis pa lags/
239a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs kyi 'dre ba myed pa gang yin pa de ni/ gzugs kyi 'brel ba myed pa'o/ /gzugs kyi 'brel pa myed pa gang yin pa de ni/
239a2('bum): gzugs kyi skye ba myed pa'o/ /gzugs kyi skye ba myed pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs kyi 'gag pa myed pa'o/ /gzugs kyi 'gag pa myed pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs kyi 'dre ba myed pa'o/ /tshor ba'i 'dre ba
239a3('bum): myed pa gang yin pa de ni tshor ba'i 'brel ba myed pa'o/ /tshor ba'i 'brel pa myed pa gang yin pa de ni tshor ba'i skye ba myed pa'o/ /tshor ba'i skye ba myed pa gang yin pa de ni/ tshor ba'i 'gag pa myed pa'o/ /tshor
239a4('bum): ba'i 'gag pa myed pa gang yin pa de ni tshor ba'i 'dre ba myed pa'o/ /'du shes kyi 'dre ba myed pa gang yin pa de ni 'du shes kyi 'brel pa myed pa'o/ /'du shes kyi 'brel pa myed pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'du shes
239a5('bum): kyi skye ba myed pa'o/ /'du shes kyi skye ba myed pa gang yin pa de ni 'du shes kyi 'gag pa myed pa'o/ /'du shes kyi 'gag pa myed pa gang yin pa de ni 'du shes kyi 'dre ba myed pa'o/ /'du byed kyi 'dre ba myed pa
239a6('bum): gang yin pa de ni/ 'du byed kyi 'brel pa myed pa'o/ /'du byed kyi 'brel pa myed pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'du byed kyi skye ba myed pa'o/ /'du byed kyi skye ba myed pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'du byed kyi 'gag pa myed pa'o/ /
239a7('bum): 'du byed kyi 'gag pa myed pa gang yin pa de ni 'du byed kyi 'dre ba myed pa'o/ /rnam par shes pa'i 'dre ba myed pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa'i 'brel pa myed pa'o/ /rnam par shes pa'i 'brel pa myed
239a8('bum): pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa'i skye ba myed pa'o/ /rnam par shes pa'i skye ba myed pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa'i 'gag pa myed pa'o/ /rnam par shes pa'i 'gag pa myed pa gang
239b1('bum): yin pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa'i 'dre ba myed pa'o/ /myig gi 'dre ba myed pa gang yin pa de ni myig gi 'brel pa myed pa'o/ /myig gi 'brel pa myed pa gang yin pa de ni myig gi skye ba myed pa'o/ /
239b2('bum): myig gi skye ba myed pa gang yin pa de ni/ myig gi 'gag pa myed pa'o/ /myig gi 'gag pa myed pa gang yin pa de ni myig gi 'dre ba myed pa'o/ /rna ba'i 'dre ba myed pa gang yin pa de ni rna ba'i 'brel pa myed pa
239b3('bum): 'o/ /rna ba'i 'brel pa myed pa gang yin pa de ni rna ba'i skye ba myed pa'o/ /rna ba'i skye ba myed pa gang yin pa de ni rna ba'i 'gag pa myed pa'o/ /rna ba'i 'gag pa'i myed pa gang yin pa de ni rna ba'i 'dre ba myed pa'o/ /
239b4('bum): sna'i 'dre ba myed pa gang yin pa de ni sna'i 'brel pa myed pa'o/ /sna'i 'brel pa myed pa gang yin pa de ni sna'i skye ba myed pa'o/ /sna'i skye ba myed pa gang yin pa de ni sna'i 'gag pa myed pa'o/ /sna'i

239b6('bum): pa gang yin pa de ni lce'i 'gag pa myed pa'o/ /lce'i 'gag pa myed pa gang yin pa de ni lce'i 'dre ba myed pa'o/ /lus kyi 'dre ba myed pa gang yin pa de ni lus kyi 'brel pa myed pa'o/ /lus kyi
239b7('bum): 'brel pa myed pa gang yin pa de ni lus kyi skye ba myed pa'o/ /lus kyi skye ba myed pa gang yin pa de ni lus kyi 'gag pa myed pa'o/ /lus kyi 'gag pa myed pa gang yin pa de ni lus kyi 'dre ba
239b8('bum): myed pa'o/ /yid kyi 'dre ba myed pa gang yin pa de ni yid kyi 'brel pa myed pa'o/ /yid kyi 'brel pa myed pa gang yin pa de ni yid kyi skye ba myed pa'o/ /yid kyi skye ba myed pa gang yin pa de ni
240a1('bum): yid kyi 'gag pa myed pa'o/ /yid kyi 'gag pa myed pa gang yin pa de ni yid kyi 'dre ba myed pa'o/ /gzugs kyi 'dre ba myed pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs kyi 'brel pa myed pa'o/ /
240a2('bum): gzugs kyi 'brel pa myed pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs kyi skye ba myed pa'o/ /gzugs kyi skye ba myed pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs kyi 'gag pa myed pa'o/ /gzugs kyi 'gag pa myed pa gang

249a1('bum): pa rnams kyi 'brel ba myed pa gang yin pa de ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi skye ba myed pa'o/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi skye ba myed pa gang yin pa de ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
249a2('bum): kyi 'gag pa myed pa'o/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi 'gag pa myed pa gang yin pa de ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi 'dre ba myed pa'o/ /dbang po rnams kyi 'dre ba myed pa gang yin pa de ni/ dbang
249a3('bum): po rnams kyi 'brel ba myed pa'o/ /dbang po rnams kyi 'brel ba myed pa gang yin pa de ni/ dbang po rnams kyi skye ba myed pa'o/ /dbang po rnams kyi skye ba myed pa gang yin pa de ni/ dbang po rnams
249a4('bum): kyi 'gag pa myed pa'o/ /dbang po rnams kyi 'gag pa myed pa gang yin pa de ni/ dbang po rnams kyi 'dre ba myed pa'o/ /stobs rnams kyi 'dre ba myed pa gang yin pa de ni/ stobs rnams kyi 'brel
249a5('bum): ba myed pa'o/ /stobs rnams kyi 'brel ba myed pa gang yin pa de ni/ stobs rnams kyi skye ba myed pa'o/ /stobs rnams kyi skye ba myed pa gang yin pa de ni/ stobs rnams kyi 'gag pa myed pa'o/ /
249a6('bum): stobs rnams kyi 'gag pa myed pa gang yin pa de ni/ stobs rnams kyi 'dre ba myed pa'o/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi 'dre ba myed pa gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi 'brel ba
249a7('bum): myed pa'o/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi 'brel ba myed pa gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi skye ba myed pa'o/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi skye ba myed pa gang yin pa de ni/

250a7('bum): 'gag pa myed pa'o/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi 'gag pa myed pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi 'dre ba myed pa'o/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i

253a1('bum): ba myed pa'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'dre ba myed pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'brel ba myed pa'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'brel
253a2('bum): ba myed pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba myed pa'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba myed pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'gag pa
253a3('bum): myed pa'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'gag pa myed pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'dre ba myed pa'o/ /rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems
253a4('bum): dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/ chos thams cad 'dre ba myed par chos ston to// //
253a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bcu bdun pa/ rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
253a6('bum): tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa/ sems can rnams kyi dpung gnyen du gyur pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bla na myed pa yang dag par
253a7('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can rnams la 'di ltar chos ston to/ /gzugs kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin no/ /tshor ba'i pha rol gang yin
253a8('bum): pa de ni tshor ba ma yin no/ /'du shes kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni 'du shes ma yin no/ /'du byed kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni 'du byed ma yin no/ /rnam par shes pa'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa
253b1('bum): ma yin no/ /myig gi pha rol gang yin pa de ni myig ma yin no/ /rna ba'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni rna ba ma yin no/ /sna'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni sna ma yin no/ /lce'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni lce ma yin
253b2('bum): no/ /lus kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni lus ma yin no/ /yid kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni yid ma yin no/ /gzugs kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin no/ /sgra'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni
253b3('bum): sgra ma yin no/ /dri'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni dri ma yin no/ /ro'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni ro ma yin no/ /reg gi pha rol gang yin pa de ni reg ma yin no/ /chos kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni chos ma
253b4('bum): yin no/ /myig gi rnam par shes pa'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni/ myig gi rnam par shes pa ma yin no/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no/ /sna
253b5('bum): 'i rnam par shes pa'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni sna'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni lce'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i pha
253b6('bum): rol gang yin pa de ni/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin no/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin no/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i pha rol gang yin pa
253b7('bum): de ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni/ sna'i 'dus te
253b8('bum): reg pa ma yin no/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no/ /yid kyi
254a1('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
254a2('bum): kyis tshor ba ma yin no/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin no/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i pha
254a3('bum): rol gang yin pa de ni/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin no/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin
254a4('bum): no/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i pha rol gang yin pa de ni/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin no/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i pha rol gang
254a5('bum): yin pa de ni/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin no/ /sa'i khams kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni sa'i khams ma yin no/ /chu'i khams kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni chu'i khams ma yin

259b3('bum): 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /'di ni nang stong pa nyid do/ /'di ni phyi stong pa nyid do/ /'di ni phyi nang stong pa nyid do/ /'di ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do/ /'di ni chen po stong pa nyid do/ /'di ni don dam
259b4('bum): pa stong pa nyid do/ /'di ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid do/ /'di ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do/ /'di ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do/ /'di ni thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid do/ /'di ni dor ba myed pa
259b5('bum): stong pa nyid do/ /'di ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /'di ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid do/ /'di ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do/ /'di ni myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid do/ /'di ni dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid
259b6('bum): do/ /'di ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do/ /'di ni dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do/ /'di ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so/ /'di ni yang dag par spong ba rnams so/ /'di ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
259b7('bum): so/ /'di ni dbang po rnams so/ /'di ni stobs rnams so/ /'di ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so/ /'di ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o/ /'di ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so/ /'di ni
259b8('bum): bsam gtan rnams so/ /'di ni tshad myed pa rnams so/ /'di ni gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so/ /'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad do/ /'di ni mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
260a1('bum): pa dgu'o/ /'di ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'o/ /'di ni mngon par shes pa rnams so/ /'di ni ting nge 'dzin rnams so/ /'di ni gzungs
260a2('bum): kyi sgo rnams so/ /'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'o/ /'di ni myi 'jigs pa bzhi'o/ /'di ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'o/ /'di ni byams pa chen po'o/ /'di ni snying rje chen po'o/ /
260a3('bum): 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad do/ /'di ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o/ /'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/ /'di ni phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/ /'di ni dgra bcom
260a4('bum): pa nyid do/ /'di ni rang byang chub bo/ /'di ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid do/ /'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /zhes bgyi ba'i rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das
260a5('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ gzugs kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /tshor ba'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /'du shes kyi pha rol na
260a6('bum): rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /'du byed kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /rnam par shes pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /myig gi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang
260a7('bum): yang ma mchis so/ /rna ba'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /sna'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /lce'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /lus kyi pha rol na rnam
260a8('bum): par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /yid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /gzugs kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /sgra'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /
260b1('bum): dri'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /ro'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /reg gi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /chos kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed
260b2('bum): do/ /myig gi rnam par shes pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog
260b3('bum): pa gang yang myed do/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i pha rol na
260b4('bum): rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /sna'i 'dus te reg
260b5('bum): pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /yid kyi
260b6('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor
260b7('bum): ba'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i pha rol na rnam par
260b8('bum): rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang
261a1('bum): myed do/ /sa'i khams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /chu'i khams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /mye'i khams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang
261a2('bum): myed do/ /rlung gi khams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /nam mkha'i khams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi pha rol na rnam par
261a3('bum): rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /ma rig pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /'du byed kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /rnam par shes pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang
261a4('bum): myed do/ /mying dang gzugs kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /skye mched drug gi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /reg pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /
261a5('bum): tshor ba'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /sred pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /len pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /srid pa'i pha rol na rnam par
261a6('bum): rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /skye ba'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /rga shi'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa
261a7('bum): gang yang myed do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /brtson 'grus kyi
261a8('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i pha rol na rnam
261b1('bum): par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /nang stong pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /phyi stong pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par
261b2('bum): rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /chen po stong pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol
261b3('bum): na rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /mtha' las
261b4('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par
261b5('bum): rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi
261b6('bum): pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /ngo bo nyid
261b7('bum): stong pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi pha rol na rnam par
261b8('bum): rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /dbang po rnams kyi pha
262a1('bum): rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /stobs rnams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /
262a2('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /bsam gtan rnams kyi pha rol
262a3('bum): na rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /tshad myed pa rnams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /
262a4('bum): rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /rnam par thar pa'i
262a5('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /ting nge 'dzin
262a6('bum): rnams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi pha rol na rnam par
262a7('bum): rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /byams pa chen po'i
262a8('bum): pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /snying rje chen po'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed
262b1('bum): do/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i pha
262b2('bum): rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /rang byang chub kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid
262b3('bum): kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi pha rol na rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed do/ /'di ni gzugs so/ /'di ni tshor ba'o/ /'di ni 'du shes so/ /'di ni 'du
262b4('bum): byed do/ /'di ni rnam par shes pa'o/ /'di ni myig go/ /'di ni rna ba'o/ /'di ni sna'o/ /'di ni lce'o/ /'di ni lus so/ /'di ni yid do/ /'di ni gzugs so/ /'di ni sgra'o/ /
262b5('bum): 'di ni dri'o/ /'di ni ro'o/ /'di ni reg go/ /'di ni chos so/ /'di ni myig gi rnam par shes pa'o/ /'di ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o/ /'di ni sna'i rnam par shes pa'o/ /'di ni lce'i rnam par
262b6('bum): shes pa'o/ /'di ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o/ /'di ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o/ /'di ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa'o/ /'di ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o/ /'di ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o/ /
262b7('bum): 'di ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o/ /'di ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o/ /'di ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o/ /'di ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/ /'di ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i
262b8('bum): rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/ /'di ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/ /'di ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/ /'di ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/ /'di ni
263a1('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/ /'di ni sa'i khams so/ /'di ni chu'i khams so/ /'di ni mye'i khams so/ /'di ni rlung gi khams so/ /'di ni nam mkha'i khams so/ /
263a2('bum): 'di ni rnam par shes pa'i khams so/ /'di ni ma rig pa'o/ /'di ni 'du byed do/ /'di ni rnam par shes pa'o/ /'di ni mying dang gzugs so/ /'di ni skye mched drug go/ /'di ni reg pa'o/ /'di ni tshor
263a3('bum): ba'o/ /'di ni sred pa'o/ /'di ni len pa'o/ /'di ni srid pa'o/ /'di ni skye ba'o/ /'di ni rga shi'o/ /'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /'di ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /'di ni
263a4('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /'di ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /'di ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /'di ni nang stong pa nyid
263a5('bum): do/ /'di ni phyi stong pa nyid do/ /'di ni phyi nang stong pa nyid do/ /'di ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do/ /'di ni chen po stong pa nyid do/ /'di ni don dam pa stong pa nyid do/ /'di ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid do/ /
263a6('bum): 'di ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do/ /'di ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do/ /'di ni thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid do/ /'di ni dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid do/ /'di ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /'di
263a7('bum): ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid do/ /'di ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do/ /'di ni myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid do/ /'di ni dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid do/ /'di ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do/ /'di ni dngos po
263a8('bum): myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so/ /'di ni yang dag par spong ba rnams so/ /'di ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so/ /'di ni dbang po rnams so/ /'di ni stobs
263b1('bum): rnams so/ /'di ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so/ /'di ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o/ /'di ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so/ /'di ni bsam gtan rnams so/ /'di ni
263b2('bum): tshad myed pa rnams so/ /'di ni gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so/ /'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad do/ /'di ni mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so/ /'di ni rnam
263b3('bum): par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'o/ /'di ni mngon par shes pa'o/ /'di ni ting nge 'dzin rnams so/ /'di ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams so/ /'di ni de
263b4('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so/ /'di ni myi 'jigs pa rnams so/ /'di ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so/ /'di ni byams pa chen po'o/ /'di ni snying rje chen po'o/ /'di ni sangs rgyas
263b5('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad do/ /'di ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o/ /'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/ /'di ni phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/ /'di ni dgra bcom pa nyid do/ /'di
263b6('bum): ni rang byang chub bo/ /'di ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid do/ /'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog pa gang yang myed de/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems
263b7('bum): dpa' chen po rnams chos de ltar zhi ba dag la rtog kyang zhum par myi 'gyur zhing / bdag gis chos de dag ni 'di ltar mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par bya'o/ /bla na myed pa yang dag par
263b8('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ni 'di ltar mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ chos de ltar zhi ba dang de ltar bzang ba de dag bshad par bya'o snyam du sems dpa' ni dka' ba byed pa ste/ de ltar
264a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ 'jig rten gyi dpung gnyen du gyur pa yin no/ /rab 'byor
264a2('bum): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ 'jig rten gyi gling du gyur pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor
264a3('bum): 'di lta ste/ dper na/ chu klung ngam/ chu bran nam/ rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na chus yongs su bcad pa'i gnas gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag ni gling zhes bya ste/ rab 'byor de bzhin du gzugs
264a4('bum): ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /tshor ba ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /'du shes ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /'du byed ni
264a5('bum): sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /rnam par shes pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /myig ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /rna ba ni
264a6('bum): sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /sna ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /lce ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /lus ni sngon
264a7('bum): gyi mtha' dad phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /yid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /gzugs ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /sgra ni
264a8('bum): sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /dri ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /ro ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /reg ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /chos ni
264b1('bum): sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /myig gi rnam par shes pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i
264b2('bum): mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /
264b3('bum): lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /myig gi 'dus te
264b4('bum): reg pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang /
264b5('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su
264b6('bum): chad pa'o/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha'
264b7('bum): yongs su chad pa'o/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni sngon gyi mtha' dang /
264b8('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni/ sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni sngon
265a1('bum): gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /sa'i khams ni sngon gyi
265a2('bum): mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /chu'i khams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /mye'i khams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /rlung gi
265a3('bum): khams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /nam mkha'i khams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi
265a4('bum): ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /ma rig pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /'du byed ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /rnam par shes pa ni sngon
265a5('bum): gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /mying dang gzugs ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /skye mched drug ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad
265a6('bum): pa'o/ /reg pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /tshor ba ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /sred pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs
265a7('bum): su chad pa'o/ /len pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /srid pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /skye ba ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha'
265a8('bum): yongs su chad pa'o/ /rga shi ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /tshul khrims kyi pha
265b1('bum): rol tu phyin pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
265b2('bum): pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sngon gyi mtha'
265b3('bum): dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /nang stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /phyi stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /phyi nang stong
265b4('bum): pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /chen po stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi
265b5('bum): ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /
265b6('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /thog ma dang tha ma
265b7('bum): myed pa stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha'
265b8('bum): dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha'
266a1('bum): yongs su chad pa'o/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad
266a2('bum): pa'o/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /dran pa nye bar
266a3('bum): gzhag pa rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni sngon
266a4('bum): gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /dbang po rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /stobs rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /byang chub
266a5('bum): kyi yan lag rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /'phags pa'i bden pa
266a6('bum): rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /bsam gtan rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /tshad myed pa rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha'
266a7('bum): yongs su chad pa'o/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /rnam par thar pa rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su
266a8('bum): chad pa'o/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa ni
266b1('bum): sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /mngon par shes pa rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su

266b3('bum): pa rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /byams pa chen po ni sngon gyi mtha' dang

266b6('bum): myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /dgra bcom pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /rang byang chub ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha'
266b7('bum): yongs su chad pa'o/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o/ /
266b8('bum): rab 'byor sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa 'dis chos thams cad yongs su chad pa ste/ rab 'byor chos thams cad kyi sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad
267a1('bum): pa gang yin pa de ni zhi ba'o/ /de ni bzang po'o/ /de ni yang dag pa ste/ 'di ltar stong pa nyid dang / dmyigs su myed pa dang / lam gyi rgyun chad pa dang / sred pa zad pa dang / 'dre ba myed pa dang /
267a2('bum): 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / 'gog pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa ste/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
267a3('bum): rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ de ltar zhi ba dang / de ltar bzang po'i chos de dag ston te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
267a4('bum): tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can rnams kyi gling du gyur pa yin no/ / //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bco brgyad pa/ rab 'byor ji ltar na
267a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ 'jig rten gyi snang ba gyur pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang
267a6('bum): c hub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yun ring du ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs kyi rab rib kyis kun nas 'khris shing mun pas zil gyis non pa'i sems can rnams la shes rab kyis snang bar byed
267a7('bum): cing / gti mug gi mun pa dang / ma rig pa'i mun nag dang / myi shes pa'i rab rib sel te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
267a8('bum): chub tu mngon par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nas/ 'jig rten gyi snang bar gyur pa yin no/ /rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

267b2('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ mdo sde pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa/ byin kyi rlabs bzhi dang ldan pa/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi dang ldan
267b3('bum): pa de dag ni don ma nor bar sems can rnams la yang dag par ston te/ sems can rnams kyang de la yang dag par skul zhing sbyor la/ gzhog cing rab tu 'god de/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub
267b4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can rnams kyi sgron ma 'dzin cing 'od 'byin pa yin no/ /rab 'byor
267b5('bum): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can rnams kyi ded dpon du gyur pa yin zhe na/
