297b6('bum): ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'dus ma byas
297b7('bum): stong pa nyid kyang shin tu myed la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
297b8('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang shin tu myed la/ byang chub sems dpa'i
298a1('bum): go cha yang myed pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni thog ma dang
298a2('bum): tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang shin tu myed la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas/ de'i phyir go cha de
298a3('bum): ni thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i
298a4('bum): phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang shin tu myed la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o/ /
298a5('bum): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang shin tu myed la/ byang chub
298a6('bum): sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni chos thams cad
298a7('bum): stong pa nyid dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang shin tu myed la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni chos thams
298a8('bum): cad stong pa nyid dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
298b1('bum): rab 'byor rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang shin tu myed la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor
298b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang shin tu myed la/ byang chub
298b3('bum): sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni dngos po myed
298b4('bum): pa stong pa nyid dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang shin tu myed la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni dngos po myed pa
298b5('bum): stong pa nyid dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor ngo bo nyid
298b6('bum): stong pa nyid kyang shin tu myed la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
298b7('bum): chen po'i go cha de ni dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang shin tu myed la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha
298b8('bum): yang myed pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po nyi shu pa/
299a1('bum): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang shin
299a2('bum): tu myed la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni
299a3('bum): yang dag par spong ba dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang shin tu myed la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni yang dag par
299a4('bum): spong ba dang 'brel ba ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rdzu 'phrul gyi
299a5('bum): rkang pa rnams kyang shin tu myed la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems
299a6('bum): dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni/ dbang po dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dbang po rnams kyang shin tu myed la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni dbang
299a7('bum): po dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni stobs dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor stobs rnams kyang shin tu myed la/
299a8('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni stobs dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni/ byang chub kyi
299b1('bum): yan lag dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang shin tu myed la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni byang chub kyi yan
299b2('bum): lag dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
299b3('bum): rab 'byor 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rnams kyang shin tu myed la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang 'brel pa ma yin
299b4('bum): zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni/ 'phags pa'i bden pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang
299b5('bum): shin tu myed la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni 'phags pa'i bden pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
299b6('bum): go cha de ni/ bsam gtan dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor bsam gtan rnams kyang shin tu myed la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni bsam
299b7('bum): gtan dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni/ tshad myed pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor tshad myed pa rnams
299b8('bum): kyang shin tu myed la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni tshad myed pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha
300a1('bum): de ni/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang shin tu myed la/ byang chub
300a2('bum): sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni/
300a3('bum): rnam par thar pa brgyad dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rnam par thar pa brgyad kyang shin tu myed la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni rnam par
300a4('bum): thar pa brgyad dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang 'brel pa ma yin te/
300a5('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yang shin tu myed la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni mthar kyis gnas pa'i
300a6('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang /
300a7('bum): smon pa myed pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa yang shin tu myed la/ byang chub sems dpa'i
300a8('bum): go cha yang myed pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems
300b1('bum): dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni/ mngon par shes pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mngon par shes pa rnams kyang shin tu myed la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas/
300b2('bum): de'i phyir go cha de ni mngon par shes pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni ting nge 'dzin dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
300b3('bum): rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang shin tu myed la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni ting nge 'dzin dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
300b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni/ gzungs kyi sgo dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang shin tu myed la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas/ de'i
300b5('bum): phyir go cha de ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang 'brel pa ma yin te/
300b6('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang shin tu myed la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang
300b7('bum): 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni/ myi 'jigs pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor myi 'jigs pa rnams
300b8('bum): kyang shin tu myed la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni myi 'jigs pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
301a1('bum): go cha de ni/ so so yang dag par rig pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang shin tu myed la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed
301a2('bum): pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni so so yang dag par rig pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni byams pa chen po dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i
301a3('bum): phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor byams pa chen po yang shin tu myed la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni byams pa chen po dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub
301a4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni snying rje chen po dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor snying rje chen po yang shin tu myed la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas/
301a5('bum): de'i phyir go cha de ni snying rje chen po dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i
301a6('bum): phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang shin tu myed la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang 'brel
301a7('bum): pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rgyun tu
301a8('bum): zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang shin tu myed la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /
301b1('bum): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang shin tu myed
301b2('bum): la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni/
301b3('bum): phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang shin tu myed la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang
301b4('bum): 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni/ dgra bcom pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dgra bcom pa nyid kyang shin tu myed
301b5('bum): la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni dgra bcom pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni/ rang byang
301b6('bum): chub dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rang byang chub kyang shin tu myed la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni rang byang chub dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes
301b7('bum): bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang
301b8('bum): shin tu myed la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
302a1('bum): po'i go cha de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang shin tu myed la/ byang chub sems dpa'i
302a2('bum): go cha yang myed pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di
302a3('bum): la spyod pa gang dag gis/ sems can thams cad bdag gis yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes/ go ca bgos pa de dag gi go cha ni chos thams cad dang 'brel ba ma yin no/ /gsol pa/
302a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes/ go cha 'tshal ba des nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
302a5('bum): sa'i gnas gnyis su dogs par myi bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes/ go cha 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
302a6('bum): po de nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ba'i gnas dang skabs ma mchis te/ de ni gnas ma mchis so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
302a7('bum): pos sa 'tshams bcad de/ sems can gyi don du go cha 'tshal pa ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor khyod kyis don gyi dbang gang zhig mthong na/ de skad du byang chub
302a8('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar go cha bgos shing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa des/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i gnas gnyis su dogs
302b1('bum): par myi bya'o zhes smras/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des/ sems can nyi tshe nyung zad zhig gi slad du go cha 'tshal pa ma lags/ ye shes nyung zad
302b2('bum): nyi tshe zhig gi slad du go cha 'tshal pa ma lags te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i slad du go cha
302b3('bum): 'tshal to/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi slad du go cha 'tshal to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no/ /
302b4('bum): de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni sems can nyung zad nyi tshe'i don du go cha bgos pa ma yin/ ye shes cung zad nyi tshe'i don du go cha bgos pa ma yin gyi rab 'byor byang
302b5('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi don du go cha bgos so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes
302b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni shin tu zab pa ste/ de ni sus kyang bsgom par myi bgyi/ ci yang bsgom par myi bgyi/ gang du yang bsgom par myi bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab
302b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la gang bsgom pa 'am/ gang bsgom par bgyi ba 'am/ gang gis bsgom par bgyi ba'i chos gang yang yongs su grub par dmyigs su ma mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das
302b8('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ nam mkha' bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ chos thams cad bsgom pa'o/ /
303a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ ma mchis pa bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ yongs su
303a2('bum): 'dzin pa ma mchis pa bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de
303a3('bum): ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de gang bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa yin/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ gzugs bsgom
303a4('bum): pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
303a5('bum): phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 'du shes bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 'du byed bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom
303a6('bum): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di
303a7('bum): ni/ myig bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rna ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
303a8('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sna bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lce bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /
303b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lus bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ yid
303b2('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ gzugs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
303b3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sgra bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ dri bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan
303b4('bum): 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ ro bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ reg bsgom pa
303b5('bum): rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ chos bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol
303b6('bum): tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ myig gi rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa
303b7('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sna'i rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta
303b8('bum): ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lce'i rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lus kyi
304a1('bum): rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /
304a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
304a3('bum): bsgom pa 'di ni/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par
304a4('bum): bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha
304a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa
304a6('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /
304a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
304a8('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/
304b1('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bsgom
304b2('bum): pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das
304b3('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sa'i khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ chu'i
304b4('bum): khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ mye'i khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta
304b5('bum): ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rlung gi khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ nam mkha'i
304b6('bum): khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /
304b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ ma rig pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
304b8('bum): bsgom pa 'di ni/ 'du byed bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /
305a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ mying dang gzugs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
305a2('bum): phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ skye mched drug bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /
305a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di
305a4('bum): ni/ sred pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ len pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta
305a5('bum): ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ srid pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ skye ba bsgom pa rnam par
305a6('bum): bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rga shi bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
305a7('bum): bsgom pa 'di ni/ bdag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sems can bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom
305a8('bum): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ srog bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/
305b1('bum): 'gro ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ gso ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes
305b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ skyes bu bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ gang zag bsgom pa rnam par
305b3('bum): bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ shed can bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
305b4('bum): pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ shed bdag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ byed pa po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom
305b5('bum): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ tshor ba po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/
305b6('bum): shes pa po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ mthong ba po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das
305b7('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa
305b8('bum): 'di ni/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
306a1('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /
306a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha
306a3('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ nang stong pa nyid
306a4('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ phyi stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di
306a5('bum): lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ phyi nang stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/
306a6('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ chen po stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /
306a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ don dam pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
306a8('bum): pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bsgom pa
306b1('bum): rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/
306b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di
306b3('bum): ni/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom
306b4('bum): pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha
306b5('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ myi dmyigs pa stong
306b6('bum): pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan
306b7('bum): 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/
306b8('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bsgom pa rnam par
307a1('bum): bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ yang dag par spong ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha
307a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ dbang po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /
307a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ stobs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/
307a4('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom
307a5('bum): pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol
307a6('bum): tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ bsam gtan bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ tshad myed pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom
307a7('bum): pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/
307a8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rnam par thar pa brgyad bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ mthar
307b1('bum): kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
307b2('bum): mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ mngon par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom
307b3('bum): pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
307b4('bum): bsgom pa 'di ni/ gzungs kyi sgo bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bsgom pa
307b5('bum): rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ myi 'jigs pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab
307b6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ so so yang dag par rig pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ byams pa
307b7('bum): chen po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ snying rje chen po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta
307b8('bum): ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
308a1('bum): bsgom pa 'di ni/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
308a2('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/
308a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ dgra bcom pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rang byang chub bsgom pa rnam
308a4('bum): par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab
308a5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor
308a6('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ gzugs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ tshor ba bsgom
308a7('bum): pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 'du shes bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
308a8('bum): bsgom pa 'di ni/ 'du byed bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor
308b1('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ myig bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rna ba bsgom pa rnam par
308b2('bum): bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sna bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lce
308b3('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lus bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
308b4('bum): bsgom pa 'di ni/ yid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ gzugs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/
308b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sgra bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ dri bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab
308b6('bum): 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ ro bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ reg bsgom pa rnam
308b7('bum): par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ chos bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
308b8('bum): pa 'di ni/ myig gi rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom
309a1('bum): pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sna'i rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
309a2('bum): bsgom pa 'di ni/ lce'i rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /
309a3('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di
309a4('bum): ni/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /
309a5('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di
309a6('bum): ni/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /
309a7('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
309a8('bum): pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rna ba'i 'dus te
309b1('bum): reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par
309b2('bum): bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab
309b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ yid
309b4('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sa'i khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor
309b5('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ chu'i khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ mye'i khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom
309b6('bum): pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rlung gi khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ nam
309b7('bum): mkha'i khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rnam par shes pa'i khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor
309b8('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ ma rig pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 'du byed bsgom
310a1('bum): pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/
310a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ mying dang gzugs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ skye
310a3('bum): mched drug bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/
310a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sred pa bsgom pa rnam par
310a5('bum): bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ len pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
310a6('bum): pa 'di ni/ srid pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ skye ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/
310a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rga shi bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ bdag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom
310a8('bum): pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sems can bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
310b1('bum): pa 'di ni/ srog bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 'gro ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di
310b2('bum): lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ gso ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ skyes bu
310b3('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ gang zag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes
310b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ shed can bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ shed bdag bsgom pa rnam
310b5('bum): par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ byed pa po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa
310b6('bum): 'di ni/ tshor ba po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ shes pa po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/
310b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ mthong ba po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam
310b8('bum): par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/
311a1('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam
311a2('bum): par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
311a3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ nang stong pa nyid bsgom
311a4('bum): pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ phyi stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha
311a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ phyi nang stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par
311a6('bum): bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ chen po stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
311a7('bum): bsgom pa 'di ni/ don dam pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom
311a8('bum): pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
311b1('bum): bsgom pa 'di ni/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid bsgom
311b2('bum): pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol
311b3('bum): tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid bsgom pa
311b4('bum): rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
311b5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ dngos po myed pa stong pa
311b6('bum): nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/
311b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa
311b8('bum): 'di ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ yang dag par spong ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /
312a1('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol
312a2('bum): tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ dbang po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ stobs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /
312a3('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ byang chub kyi yan lag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
312a4('bum): phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/
312a5('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ bsam gtan bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /
312a6('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ tshad myed pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
312a7('bum): pa 'di ni/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rnam par thar pa bsgom
312a8('bum): pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /
312b1('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /
312b2('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ mngon par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
312b3('bum): pa 'di ni/ ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ gzungs kyi sgo bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor
312b4('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa
312b5('bum): 'di ni/ myi 'jigs pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ so so yang dag par rig pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/
312b6('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ byams pa chen po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
312b7('bum): pa 'di ni/ snying rje chen po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bsgom pa rnam par
312b8('bum): bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/
313a1('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /
313a2('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ dgra bcom pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rang byang chub
313a3('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes
313a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /
313a5('bum): rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la phyir myi ldog pa'i
313a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes
313a7('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
313a8('bum): la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
313b1('bum): po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub
313b2('bum): s ems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs
313b3('bum): su brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la byang chub sems
313b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ nang stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes nang stong pa nyid la byang chub
313b5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyi stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes phyi stong pa nyid la
313b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyi nang stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes phyi nang
313b7('bum): stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa myed
313b8('bum): dam zhes stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chen po stong pa nyid la mngon
314a1('bum): par chags pa myed dam zhes chen po stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don
314a2('bum): dam pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes don dam pa stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
314a3('bum): sems dpa' chen po 'dus byas stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes 'dus byas stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /
314a4('bum): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems
314a5('bum): dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes/ mtha' las 'das
314a6('bum): pa stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la
314a7('bum): mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems
314a8('bum): dpa' chen po/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor
314b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs
314b2('bum): su brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes chos thams cad stong pa nyid la byang chub sems
314b3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes rang gi mtshan nyid
314b4('bum): stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la mngon par
314b5('bum): chags pa myed dam zhes/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
314b6('bum): po dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor
314b7('bum): b yang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag
314b8('bum): par bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la
315a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la mngon par chags
315a2('bum): pa myed dam zhes/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
315a3('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes yang dag par spong ba rnams la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub
315a4('bum): s ems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su
315a5('bum): brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbang po rnams la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes dbang po rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
315a6('bum): chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stobs rnams la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes stobs rnams la byang chub sems dpa'
315a7('bum): sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes/ byang chub
315a8('bum): kyi yan lag rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
315b1('bum): la mngon par chags par myed dam zhes/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems
315b2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su
315b3('bum): brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan rnams la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes bsam gtan rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems
315b4('bum): dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ tshad myed pa rnams la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes tshad myed pa rnams la/ byang
315b5('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la
315b6('bum): mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
315b7('bum): sems dpa' chen po/ rnam par thar pa rnams la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes rnam par thar pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab
315b8('bum): ' byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
316a1('bum): la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnam par thar
316a2('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon
316a3('bum): pa myed pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa rnams
316a4('bum): la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes mngon par shes pa rnams la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub
316a5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin rnams la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs
316a6('bum): su brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mngon par chags pa myed dam/ zhes gzungs kyi sgo rnams
316a7('bum): la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i
316a8('bum): stobs rnams la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par
316b1('bum): bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myi 'jigs pa rnams la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes/ myi 'jigs pa rnams la byang chub
316b2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la mngon par
316b3('bum): chags pa myed dam zhes/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
316b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po byams pa chen po la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes byams pa chen po la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /
316b5('bum): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes snying rje chen po la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
316b6('bum): po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes/ sangs
316b7('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
316b8('bum): po thams cad shes pa nyid la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes/ thams cad shes pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par
317a1('bum): bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes/ lam gyi rnam
317a2('bum): pa shes pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnam pa thams
317a3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o/ /dge'o// //
